title: FBI investiga novo possível atentado contra Trump após tiroteio em campo de golfe
content: Mundo 0 O FBI investiga uma nova tentativa de assassinato contra o ex-presidente Donald Trump. Agentes do serviço secreto dispararam contra um suspeito que portava um fuzil de assalto Kalashnikov com luneta de precisão em um campo de golfe a 370 metros de onde o ex-presidente jogava. O Serviço Secreto dos Estados Unidos confirmou durante coletiva na tarde deste domingo (15) que prendeu um homem suspeito que fugiu do campo de golfe do republicano em West Palm Beach, na Flórida, após ser identificado pelos agentes. Trump não ficou ferido, está seguro e o FBI assumiu a investigação pelo planejamento do atentado. Segundo informações do Serviço Secreto, os tiros foram ouvidos por volta das 13h30 (horário local) e a área foi isolada. Uma testemunha afirmou que viu um homem suspeito saindo da mata e entrando em um carro preto. Conforme os agentes, a testemunha chegou a fotografar o veículo e a imagem foi usada para localização do suspeito. Dentro do matagal, próximo a propriedade de Trump, foram encontrados “uma arma similar a uma AK-47, duas mochilas e uma câmera GoPro”, conforme as informações prestadas pelo Serviço Secreto na coletiva de imprensa. O carro do suspeito foi abordado em uma rodovia em direção ao condado de Martin, onde o xerife local fez a prisão do homem que não resistiu. O Serviço Secreto ainda esclareceu que o esquema de segurança prevê que um agente verifique o campo de golfe a cada buraco antes da chegada do ex-presidente, o que...

title: Tres incendios forestales en el ande de la región La Libertad
creator: Redacción Diario Correo
content: Tres incendios forestales se registraron en las últimas horas en las provincias de Sánchez Carrión y Pataz, lo que afectó cultivos y viviendas, reportó el Centro de Emergencia Regional (COER) de La Libertad . VER MÁS: La Libertad: Incendio forestal afecta Marcahuamachuco Ocurrencias Dos de estos hechos ocurrieron en Sánchez Carrión . Uno se dio en la localidad de Pampa Grande, en el distrito de Sartimbamba. Ahí quedaron afectados bosques de eucalipto, pinos, cultivos de legumbres y pastizales naturales. Las llamas, además, dejaron dos viviendas destruidas, lo que dejó a igual número de personas damnificadas. Defensa Civil de este lugar detalló que el fuego inició el 11 de setiembre, pero recién se reportó tres días después. “El incendio fue controlado a las 00:00 horas (14 de setiembre), volviéndose a activar en horas de la mañana, comprometiendo áreas de flora del caserío de Pampa Grande, sectores Cushuro y La Conga, con riesgo de extenderse a la localidad de Marcabal Grande”, detalló. Otro siniestro ocurrió en el caserío Cuyomalca, en el distrito de Curgos. Acá, las llamas iniciaron a las 11 de la mañana de ayer y, hasta el cierre de esta edición, afectó bosques de eucalipto. En la provincia de Pataz , en tanto, Defensa Civil informó que se registró un incendio forestal en la localidad de Suyubamba. El evento habría iniciado el 8 de setiembre, pero, debido a lo alejado de la zona, recién se reportó seis días después. Hasta el momento, el...

title: Turnovers catch up to UVA in fourth quarter vs. Maryland
content: CHARLOTTESVILLE — Even with three turnovers in the first three quarters, Virginia was in the hunt in a winnable game against Maryland on Saturday night at Scott Stadium. The fourth quarter began with the Cavaliers down by only four points. Like the week before in a comeback road victory, UVA withstood some costly mistakes and still had a chance to overtake the Terrapins. Then came the fourth and final turnover. Alas, it was a blow from which the Cavaliers couldn’t recover. “I think this team is well aware that we beat ourselves, and I think this team is well aware of what we can do,” said tight end Tyler Neville, a former Lafayette High star who had three catches for 57 yards, including a 39-yard reception that set up UVA’s only touchdown in the second quarter. “We put ourselves in great positions. We just need to finish.” UVA’s defense limited Maryland to a total of three points following the first three turnovers, but the Cavaliers couldn’t hold the Terrapins in check after wide receiver Malachi Fields lost a fumble near midfield with 11:19 remaining. Maryland turned the takeaway into points when quarterback Billy Edwards Jr. ran for a 1-yard touchdown to push the lead to 27-13 midway through the final period. That score would hold up until the end, as UVA (2-1) missed an opportunity to improve to 3-0 for the first time since 2019, the year it played for the ACC championship. “We got it to the fourth quarter, one-possession game. That’s where we want to be, and we just...

title: Iran FM appoints his deputy for legal, int’l affairs
content: Gharibabadi previously served as Iran's Permanent Representative to Vienna-based UN organizations, Ambassador of the Islamic Republic of Iran to the Netherlands as well as deputy judiciary chief for international affairs and head of its human rights office. He was also the advisor to the minister for nuclear affairs and the secretary of the JCPOA committee that has been in charge of the secretariat of the Supreme National Security Council. Also on Sunday, the top Iranian diplomat appointed Reza Najafi, the former legal and international deputy of the Foreign Ministry, to the position of one of his advisors. 4399

title: الدوري الإيطالي: مونزا يخنق إنتر ميلان بالتعادل
creator: كاتب
content: فرض مونزا التعادل 1-1 على ضيفه إنتر ميلان الأحد ضمن الجولة الرابعة من دوري الدرجة الأولى الإيطالي لكرة القدم، ليحرم حامل اللقب من الصعود إلى الصدارة. وتقدم مونزا في الدقيقة 81 بهدف سجله المهاجم البديل داني موتا الذي سدد الكرة في الزاوية العليا للمرمى، لكن دينزل دمفريس سجل هدف التعادل لإنتر في الدقيقة 88 بتسديدة من مسافة قريبة. ورفع إنتر ميلان رصيده إلى ثماني نقاط محتلا المركز الثاني بفارق نقطة واحدة خلف نابولي الذي فاز 4-صفر على كالياري.

title: همه چیز درباره دومین تیراندازی به سوی ترامپ | ضارب چند متر با رئیس جمهور سابق آمریکا فاصله داشت؟ | افشای نام سلاح روسی کشنده‌ای که ضارب به همراه داشت
content: به گزارش رسانه‌های آمریکا گزارش داده‌اند فردی که قصد تیراندازی به سمت دونالد ترامپ داشت بین ۴۰۰ تا ۵۰۰ یارد (حدود ۳۶۵ تا ۴۵۷ متر) با او فاصله داشت. گفته شده برد سلاح مورد استفاده این فرد دونالد ترامپ را در تیررس قرار می‌داده است. سرویس مخفی آمریکا تأیید کرد به سمت فرد مظنون تیراندازی کرده است. طبق گزارش روزنامه «نیویورک‌پست»، «استیون چونگ»، سخنگوی کارزار انتخاباتی ترامپ شامگاه یکشنبه گفت: «رئیس‌جمهور ترامپ پس از شلیک گلوله در اطراف خود در امان است. جزئیات بیشتری در حال حاضر وجود ندارد.» سی‌ان‌ان خبر داده یک فرد مسلح قصد داشته ترامپ را هدف قرار دهد. «لیندسی گراهام» سناتور جمهوری‌خواه نیز در واکنش به این خبر، از گفتگوی خود با ترامپ خبر داد و نوشت: «من همین الان با ترامپ صحبت کردم، حال او خوب است و از همیشه برای نجات آمریکا مصمم‌تر است.» «دونالد ترامپ جونیور»، پسر بزرگ ترامپ در شبکه اجتماعی «ایکس» نیز اعلام کرد و مدعی شد که این تیراندازی در زمین گلف ترامپ در فلوریدا رخ داده و یک اسلحه «ای‌کی۴۷ یا همان کلاشینکف» در بوته‌های محل کشف شده است. به گفته او، یک مظنون نیز در این رابطه بازداشت شده است. نیویورک‌پست همچنین نوشت: «۲ نفر در خارج از زمین گلف بین‌المللی ترامپ به یکدیگر تیراندازی کرده‌اند. به گفته منابع، این ۲ فرد، یکدیگر را هدف قرار گرفتند و ترامپ هدف ترور قرار نگرفته است، تیراندازی در منطقه‌ای رخ داد که به داشتن نرخ بالای جرم و جنایت معروف است.» طبق گزارش‌ها، یک نفر در این ارتباط بازداشت شده است. ترامپ در پیامی اعلام کرد حالش خوب است، «هرگز تسلیم نمی‌شوم و هیچ چیز نمی‌تواند من را متوقف کند». هریس و بایدن در جریان این حادثه قرار گرفته‌اند. سی ان ان به نقل از منابع...

title: AP Sports SummaryBrief at 5:49 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Carr, Kamara help Saints end Cowboys' 16-game home win streak in regular season with 44-19 win ARLINGTON, Texas (AP) — Alvin Kamara scored four touchdowns, including a 57-yarder on a screen pass, and the New Orleans Saints ended Dallas’ 16-game home win streak in the regular season with a 44-19 victory. Derek Carr threw for 243 yards and two TDs with a 1-yard sneak for a score. The Saints got touchdowns on their first six drives a week after setting a franchise record by starting the season with points on nine consecutive possessions in a 47-10 rout of Carolina. It was actually the second straight loss at AT&T Stadium for the Cowboys after the 48-32 wild-card shocker against Green Bay last January. Sam Darnold and an attacking defense drive the undefeated Vikings in a 23-17 win over the 49ers MINNEAPOLIS (AP) — Sam Darnold passed for 268 yards and two touchdowns against his former team, including a 97-yard strike in the second quarter to Justin Jefferson, and an attacking defense again fueled the Minnesota Vikings in a 23-17 victory over the San Francisco 49ers. Darnold won his second straight start. The Vikings got three field goals by rookie Will Reichard and six sacks and two interceptions against Brock Purdy to overcome two turnovers and a quadriceps injury that forced Jefferson out of the game in the third quarter. Texas on top! Longhorns take over at No. 1 in AP Top 25 for first time in 16 years, jumping Georgia Texas is No. 1 in The Associated Press college football...

title: Paso a paso para eliminar los resultados sobre ti en Google
content: En la era digital, la privacidad en línea es una preocupación creciente para muchos usuarios. La exposición de información personal en los motores de búsqueda puede tener implicaciones significativas para la seguridad y la reputación, por ello es importante conocer cómo eliminar los resultados personales en Google . Suscríbete a nuestro canal de Telegram y lleva la información en tus manos. ¿Cómo eliminar contenido en Google? Google , uno de los motores de búsqueda más utilizados, ofrece herramientas y procesos para ayudar a eliminar resultados que contengan información no deseada sobre las personas. A continuación, se detalla una guía paso a paso para gestionarlos y eliminarlos: Revisión de resultados de búsqueda: El primer paso para eliminar resultados personales en Google es identificar qué información se desea eliminar. Realizar una búsqueda del nombre titular en Google y checar los resultados para localizar las páginas que contienen información que es preferible que no esté disponible públicamente. Uso de la herramienta de eliminación de contenidos: Google proporciona una herramienta de eliminación de contenidos que se puede utilizar para solicitar la eliminación de ciertos resultados de búsqueda. Es posible seguir las instrucciones para presentar una solicitud. Aquí se puede requerir la eliminación de resultados que incluyen información personal , como direcciones físicas, números de teléfono o información bancaria. Solicitar la...

title: Raiders score 13 unanswered points to stun Ravens
creator: Field Level Media

title: Raiders score 13 unanswered points to stun Ravens
creator: Field Level Media
content: BALTIMORE - Davante Adams caught nine passes for 110 yards with a touchdown, Daniel Carlson made a 38-yard field goal with 27 seconds left and the Las Vegas Raiders rallied to beat the Baltimore Ravens 26-23 on Sunday. The Ravens are 0-2 for the first time since 2015 after a 27-20 loss to the two-time defending champion Kansas City Chiefs in the NFL opener Sept. 5. Las Vegas (1-1) was focused on Derrick Henry, who barreled through the defensive line for a 29-yard gain on the first possession of the third quarter. That set up an 8-yard touchdown pass from Lamar Jackson to Zay Flowers to put the Ravens (1-1) ahead 16-6. Henry finished with 84 yards and a touchdown on 18 carries. Jackson was 21 of 34 for 247 yards with a touchdown and an interception. The Raiders capitalized after Robert Spillane intercepted Jackson at the Baltimore 46-yard line with Las Vegas down 16-6 midway through the third quarter. Alexander Mattison capped the Raiders' ensuing 7-play drive with a 1-yard plunge with 2:36 left in the third. Las Vegas managed 27 yards on 17 carries Sunday. Henry responded for the Ravens with a three-yard touchdown run early in the fourth quarter to give Baltimore some breathing room at 23-13. Carlson made a 25-yard field goal before the Raiders pulled even at 23 on Adams' 1-yard touchdown catch from Gardner Minshew with 3:54 left in the game. The Ravens' next drive stalled, and a poor punt coupled with a penalty situated Las Vegas at the Baltimore 43-yard line with 2:21 to...

title: Chargers hammer Panthers 26-3 to remain unbeaten
creator: By The Associated Press
content: CHARLOTTE, N.C. (AP) — Justin Herbert threw two touchdown passes to Quentin Johnston, J.K Dobbins ran for 131 yards, including a 43-yard touchdown, and the Los Angeles Chargers drubbed the Carolina Panthers. The Chargers (2-0) methodically wore down the Panthers, piling up 219 yards on the ground while holding Carolina to just 159 total yards and seven first downs.

Carlson made a 25-yard field goal before the Raiders pulled even at 23 on Adams' 1-yard touchdown catch from Gardner Minshew with 3:54 left in the game. The Ravens' next drive stalled, and a poor punt coupled with a penalty situated Las Vegas at the Baltimore 43-yard line with 2:21 to...

title: Raiders score 13 unanswered points to stun Ravens
creator: Field Level Media
content: BALTIMORE - Davante Adams caught nine passes for 110 yards with a touchdown, Daniel Carlson made a 38-yard field goal with 27 seconds left and the Las Vegas Raiders rallied to beat the Baltimore Ravens 26-23 on Sunday. The Ravens are 0-2 for the first time since 2015 after a 27-20 loss to the two-time defending champion Kansas City Chiefs in the NFL opener Sept. 5. Las Vegas (1-1) was focused on Derrick Henry, who barreled through the defensive line for a 29-yard gain on the first possession of the third quarter. That set up an 8-yard touchdown pass from Lamar Jackson to Zay Flowers to put the Ravens (1-1) ahead 16-6. Henry finished with 84 yards and a touchdown on 18 carries. Jackson was 21 of 34 for 247 yards with a touchdown and an interception. The Raiders capitalized after Robert Spillane intercepted Jackson at the Baltimore 46-yard line with Las Vegas down 16-6 midway through the third quarter. Alexander Mattison capped the Raiders' ensuing 7-play drive with a 1-yard plunge with 2:36 left in the third. Las Vegas managed 27 yards on 17 carries Sunday. Henry responded for the Ravens with a three-yard touchdown run early in the fourth quarter to give Baltimore some breathing room at 23-13. Carlson made a 25-yard field goal before the Raiders pulled even at 23 on Adams' 1-yard touchdown catch from Gardner Minshew with 3:54 left in the game. The Ravens' next drive stalled, and a poor punt coupled with a penalty situated Las Vegas at the Baltimore 43-yard line with 2:21 to...

title: Myers anota gol de campo de 31 yardas en tiempo extra y Seahawks ganan 23-20 a Patriots
creator: Por BRENDAN McGAIR
content: FOXBOROUGH, Massachusetts, EE.UU. (AP) — Jason Myers conectó un gol de campo de 31 yardas en tiempo extra para que los Seahawks de Seattle vencieran el domingo 23-20 a los Patriots de Nueva Inglaterra. La patada selló un día de tres de tres para Myers, quien también anotó desde 44 yardas en el segundo cuarto. El quarterback de los Seahawks Geno Smith lideró a Seattle en una serie de ocho jugadas y 71 yardas. Completó 33 de 44 pases para 327 yardas en el día, con un touchdown de 56 yardas a DK Metcalf en la primera mitad. Metcalf terminó con 10 recepciones para 129 yardas. Los Seahawks (2-0) también consiguieron una tarde de 100 yardas de recepción de Jaxon Smith-Njigba (12 atrapadas para 117 yardas). Jugando en su primer partido en casa bajo el entrenador en jefe de primer año Jerod Mayo, los Patriots (1-1) obtuvieron 81 yardas terrestres y un touchdown de Stevenson y 96 yardas terrestres de Antonio Gibson. El quarterback Jacoby Brissett completó 15 de 27 pases para 149 yardas y un touchdown al novato Ja’Lynn Polk. Los Seahawks mantuvieron vivas sus esperanzas de una victoria al final del partido después de que Julian Love bloqueó un intento de gol de campo de 48 yardas que habría puesto a los Patriots arriba por seis con 3:59 por jugar en el tiempo reglamentario.

title: Fitri Tropica dan Suami Gelar Acara Ultah Pernikahan dengan Pesta Pengantin
content: Presenter dan suaminya, Irvan Hanafi menggelar acara ulang tahun ( ) ke-10 dengan pesta . Sehingga dan Irvan Hanafi kembali naik ke pelaminan bak baru yang sedang gelar pesta . Pesta tersebut sebagai selebrasi dan Irvan Hakim yang sudah 10 tahun berumah tangga. Fitri Tropica mengungkap ide untuk menggelar acara resepsi tersebut setelah Irvan Hanafi meminta supaya foto mereka kembali diulang. Bukan tanpa alasan, suami itu melihat kondisi tubuhnya di masa lalu tidaklah tampak ideal. “Jadi kalau aku tuh awal mulanya gini, dulu tuh suami aku pernah bilang, ‘eh kita kapan yu foto lagi. Karena dulu waktu nikah aku kurus, sekarang aku udah berotot gitu’, kata ketika ditemui di Kawasan Kemang, Jakarta Selatan, Sabtu (14/9/2024). Permintaan sang suami kala itu kemudian tidak disetujui oleh lantaran dirinya baru saja melahirkan anak keduanya. “Terus cuma waktu itu aku masih baru melahirkan kan, masih gede,” ujar Fitrop biasa disapa. Keinginan tersebut kemudian baru bisa diwujudkan oleh pemilik nama asli Fitri Rakhmawati itu ketika merayakan 10 tahun mereka. Bahakan Fitri memberikan kejutan kepada sang suaminya itu. “Nah pas kemarin tuh kayak inget-inget, eh sekarang kan ulang tahun yang ke-10 Ya sudah oke, kita jangan cuma bikin foto , kita bikin acara nya,”ungkap Fitri. Perayaan ini kemudian menjadi selebrasi Fitri dan Irvan selama menjalani rumah tangga selama 10 tahun. “Justru yang membuat aku semangat bikin ini Aku tuh mikirnya gini, orang yang pacaran aja setiap bulannya...

title: La Policía confirma que el detenido por intentar atentar contra Trump tenía un rifle AK-47
creator: EFE
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, MIAMI, ESTADOS UNIDOS. – La Policía confirmó este domingo que una persona fue detenida en las inmediaciones donde el expresidente estadounidense Donald Trump estaba jugando al golf y que se encontró un rifle AK-47 con una mira telescópica con el que presumiblemente quería atacar al candidato republicano. Según informó en una rueda de prensa el sheriff Ric Bradshaw, la persona, que llevaba también dos mochilas y una cámara deportiva GoPro, fue arrestada después de que el Servicio Secreto lo divisara y gracias a que un testigo hizo fotografías de su matrícula. En torno a las 13:30 (17:30 GMT) agentes del Servicio Secreto vieron a un hombre con un rifle junto a la valla del campo de golf perteneciente a Trump, donde se encontraba el expresidente (2017-2021) y candidato republicano jugando. Estaba a unos 300-500 metros de Trump. El Servicio Secreto le disparó y salió corriendo de entre unos arbustos en los que se estaba escondiendo, hasta el vehículo en el que intentó huir, una camioneta negra cuya matrícula logró fotografiar un testigo. Gracias a esto, el individuo, cuya identidad todavía no se ha hecho pública, fue detenido unos minutos después en la carretera. La Oficina Federal de Investigación (FBI, en inglés) confirmó este domingo que el suceso está siendo investigado como un aparente «intento de asesinato». «El FBI ha respondido a West Palm Beach, Florida, y está investigando lo que parece ser un intento de asesinato del...

title: Loose lap belt for Power helps Palou cruise to 3rd IndyCar season championship
creator: By JENNA FRYER - AP Auto Racing Writer
content: LEBANON, Tenn. (AP) — Alex Palou easily drove to his third IndyCar championship in four years when challenger Will Power's seatbelt came loose minutes into the season-deciding finale Sunday at Nashville Superspeedway. Colton Herta, who earlier this year moved to Nashville, won the Music City Grand Prix for his first career victory on an oval and second win of the season for Andretti Global. Herta topped Pato O’Ward in a wheel-to-wheel battle in the closing laps. But all attention was on the championship race as Palou, a Spaniard who won his first title in 2021 in his first season driving for Chip Ganassi Racing, won back-to-back IndyCar titles. The competition for the crown was only between Palou and Power, the two-time champion from Australia who won his last title in 2022 sandwiched between Palou's run. Power had two chances in the last two races to reclaim the crown but failed to capitalize both times. Palou had an engine issue two weeks ago at the Milwaukee Mile and Power was briefly in position to win the race until the Australian spun on his own and finished a disappointing 10th. That allowed Palou to take a 33-point lead into Nashville, where the downtown street race had been shifted 35 miles away to the existing concrete oval because of construction on the Tennessee Titans' new stadium. Palou had never before raced on a concrete oval, while Power finished 11th in his only career race at the superspeedway, IndyCar's final visit in 2008. But things began looking up for...

title: Prisión preventiva para imputado por secuestro en Castro: al ser capturado poseía armamento, municiones y otras especies ligadas al ilícito
content: En prisión preventiva quedó un sujeto acusado de haber concretado el secuestro de dos personas en Castro , Chiloé , Región de Los Lagos . De acuerdo a lo informado por Carabineros de Chile , el 8 de septiembre , dos personas llegaron hasta la 1a Comisaría Puerto Varas para denunciar que al llegar a su parcela, uno de los trabajadores de un predio vecino subió a su vehículo y luego de un rato los intimidó con un arma de fuego. Lo anterior para obligarlos a dirigirse al interior de un terreno y, una vez en el lugar, los esposó y amenazó con matarlos. Posteriormente, el sujeto realizó una videollamada a una tercera persona, quien los extorsionó y ordenó liberarlos . Al mismo tiempo, les advirtió que conocía sus domicilios y que si denunciaban los hechos enviaría a alguien a asesinarlos. Luego que la institución policial se puso en conocimiento de dichos antecedentes, el OS9 y la Fiscalía comenzaron a investigar los hechos. Conforme avanzó la indagatoria, se logró identificar el sitio del suceso y la identidad del presunto autor del secuestro , por lo cual se pudo solicitar una orden de detención contra el individuo. En prisión preventiva quedan dos imputados por homicidio, receptación de vehículos e incendio en la comuna de Quilicura 14 sep 2024 “Estoy cansada”: Cathy Barriga aborda reformalización y apunta contra Vodanovic 13 sep 2024 Tras un operativo se logró dar con el imputado, quien fue identificado como un hombre de 18 años de nacionalidad...

title: الفرد الذي بنى أمة !!
content: يعتز المسيحي العربي، بالقيادات المؤثرة المغَيّرة، التي أنجبتها أمته العربية، سواء أكانت قيادات عربية مسلمة، أم كانت قيادات عربية مسيحية !! وينطبق هذا الوضع، على اعتزاز الفلسطينيين، ونحن معهم، بالنبي الفلسطيني، ابن بيت لحم والناصرة والقدس، السيد المسيح عليه الصلاة والسلام. نحتفل اليوم بمولد محمد بن عبد الله، نبيُّ الله وحبيبه وحامل رسالته ومبلغها، خاتم رسله ونبييه، نبي النور والهدى والرحمة، المتممُ لمكارم الاخلاق. نحتفل اليوم بذكرى الرجل الذي ثبت على العقيدة، وصمد على المبدأ، وضحى من أجل نصرة الحق والخير، في وجه الطغيان والجهل والخرافة. الرجل الذي برهن على إمكانية انتصار الضحية على الجلاد، وانتصاف الحق من الباطل، وعلو مكانة التوحيد، وهزيمة الظلام والوثنية والظلم. نحتفل اليوم بالذكرى الشريفة، التي تحمل أعظم القيم والرسائل والدلالات والدروس، لكل بني البشر، فهي وان كانت ذكرى مولد نبينا، فإنها رسالة إلى المظلومين بأن نصر الله قريب. قال تعال: {أَلَا إِنَّ نَصرَ اللَّهِ قَرِيب}. صمد محمدٌ في أحلك الظروف وأقساها وأكثرها وحشية، عندما كان معتنقو الإسلام المناضلون الأبطال، كوكبةً من الرجال والنساء، بنوا دولة عظيمة لأنها قامت على العدل والخير والحق والرحمة والعلم والإيمان. نحتفل اليوم بذكرى المولد النبوي وأبناء شعبنا العربي الفلسطيني يواصلون المقاومة والبطولة والتضحية، رغم ما يتعرضون له من ظلم وبغي ومجازر وجرائم إبادة جماعية إسرائيلية موصوفة ممتدة منذ أكثر من قرن. فليقتفِ من يريد لهذا الدين العظيم أن يسترد دوره وبهاءه وألقه وصفاءه ونورانيته، أَثرَ الرسول العربي الهاشمي العظيم وصحبه الكرام، الذين نصروا دينَ الله وأعلوه، عندما ابتعدوا عن الفظاظة والتنفير،...

title: Gladys La Bomba Tucumana habló de su negocio de empanadas en Buenos Aires: Parece una boutique
creator: Redacción LAVOZ
content: La cantante y actriz Gladys La Bomba Tucumana estuvo este domingo en el programa de Juana Viale y habló de un emprendimiento muy especial: el local de empanadas que inauguró en la ciudad de Buenos Aires hace un mes. Emprendedora. Gladys La Bomba Tucumana cambió de rumbo: de qué se trata su nuevo negocio “Estoy muy feliz y muy agradecida a toda la gente que me apoyó, a la gente que fue a probarla y que ahora son clientes. Está en la calle Paraguay 2387, que vendría a ser Barrio Norte o La Recoleta”, precisó la artista y ahora emprendedora gastronómica. “La verdad que estoy muy feliz. Yo creo en Dios, soy muy católica, no soy de ir a la iglesia pero creo en Dios y le atribuyo todo lo lindo que me pasa en la vida y todas las cosas que puedo hacer realidad que yo sueño y que me impongo a mí misma. A pesar de que soy una mujer de 59 años todavía tengo muchos proyectos...”, resaltó. “Yo soy una figura de los ‘90, sin embargo, estamos en el año 2024 y yo sigo hoy comiendo con vos, sigo sentándome con Mirtha (Legrand), estoy siempre activa. Me encanta además hacerlo y este era un sueño que yo tenía hace un montón”, reveló luego, antes de aclarar que la empanada tucumana no lleva papa (esa es la salteña). “No tiene pasas, no tiene aceitunas y no tiene papa. (Lleva) carne cortada a cuchillo, morrón, cebolla normal, cebolla de verdeo y buenos condimentos. Y una masa que tiene que ser espectacular, es todo”, explicitó sobre la receta tradicional de esa provincia...

title: Lecco, Baldini: "Beltrame? È semplicemente un giocatore che ci ha chiesto di allenarsi"
content: In casa Lecco tiene banco la situazione di Stefano Beltrame , attaccante classe 1993 svincolato che attualmente si sta allenando proprio con il club bluceleste. Oggi ne ha parlato il tecnico Francesco Baldini alla vigilia della sfida contro il Novara: “È semplicemente un giocatore che ci ha chiesto di allenarsi e noi gli abbiamo dato la disponibilità per farlo. Naturalmente, quando un giocatore si allena con te viene valutato tutti i giorni, ma in questo momento la posizione di Beltrame è semplicemente quella di un giocatore che ha chiesto di allenarsi con noi”, le parole riportate da LeccoChannelNews . Cresciuto nel settore giovanile della Juventus; Beltrame negli ultimi anni ha sempre giocato all’estero prima vestendo la maglia del CSKA Sofia in Bulgaria dove ha collezionato 31 presenze con quattro reti, per poi proseguire al Maritimo in Portogallo, 45 presenze e due reti, e infine al Persib Bandung in Indonesia dove nella passata stagione ha messo a segno quatto gol in 16 presenze. Precedentemente aveva vestito anche la maglia di due club olandesi come Go Ahead Eagles (5 reti in 33 presenze) e Den Bosch (16 gol in 67 gare). In Italia il giocatore ha vestito anche le maglie di Pordenone (9 presenze e 2 gol), Pro Vercelli (10 presenze), Modena (23 gare e una rete) e Bari (24 presenze e un gol).

title: బాధితులను కేంద్రం ఆదుకుంటుంది
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: : రాష్ట్రంలో ఇటీవల సంభవించిన వరదల కారణంగా నష్టపోయిన వారిని ఆదుకోవడానికి కేంద్రం సానుకూలంగా ఉందని కేంద్ర ఉక్కు, భారీ పరిశ్రమల శాఖ సహాయ మంత్రి భూపతిరాజు శ్రీనివాసవర్మ అన్నారు. ఆదివారం తూర్పుగోదావరి జిల్లా రాజమహేంద్రవరంలో ఒక ప్రైవేట్‌ కార్యక్రమంలో పాల్గొన్న ఆయన తనను కలసిన మీడియాతో మాట్లాడుతూ వరద నష్టానికి సంబంధించి పూర్తి వివరాలు రాగానే సహాయం అందించడానికి కేంద్రం సిద్ధంగా ఉందన్నారు. ఇప్పటికే కేంద్రం తాత్కాలిక సాయం అందించిందని, కేంద్ర వ్యవసాయశాఖ మంత్రి చౌహాన్‌ వచ్చి పరిశీలించి వెళ్లారని అన్నారు. రాష్ట్రాభివృద్ధికి కేంద్రం అన్నివిధాలుగా కట్టుబడి ఉందని పేర్కొన్నారు. అమరావతి అభివృద్ధికి, పోలవరం ప్రాజెక్టు నిర్మాణానికి భారీగా నిధులు కేటాయించిందని, రాష్ట్రంలోని పెండింగ్‌ ప్రాజెక్టులపై సమీక్ష చేస్తున్నదని తెలిపారు. సమస్యల సుడిగుండంలో ఉన్న విశాఖ స్టీల్‌ప్లాంటును ఏ విధంగా బయటకు తీసుకురావాలనే దానిపై కేంద్ర ప్రభుత్వం ఆలోచన చేస్తుందన్నారు. ఈ ప్రైవేట్‌ కార్యక్రమంలో రాష్ట్ర పర్యాటక శాఖ మంత్రి కందుల దుర్గేష్‌, ఎమ్మెల్యేలు రఘురామకృష్ణంరాజు, గోరంట్ల బుచ్చయ్యచౌదరి, ఆదిరెడ్డి శ్రీనివాస్‌, బత్తుల బలరామకృష్ణ, నల్లమిల్లి రామకృష్ణారెడ్డి, దాట్ల బుచ్చిరాజు, బీజేపీ జాతీయ కార్యవర్గ సభ్యుడు సోము వీర్రాజు తదితరులు పాల్గొన్నారు.

title: Fan de Shakira se hace un creativo tatuaje con símbolos e imágenes de la canción “Día de enero”
creator: Edgardo Prat
content: Nadie puede negar que la reconocida reina del pop latino , Shakira , ha dejado un legado impresionante con una serie de álbumes que transformaron la música en español. “Día de enero” es una de las canciones más queridas por los fans de Shakira . Este tema, incluido en su sexto álbum de estudio Fijación Oral Vol. 1 , fue lanzado como sencillo el 23 de enero de 2006. En varias ocasiones, Shakira ha mencionado que “Día de enero” es una de sus canciones más personales , pues está inspirada en su relación con su entonces novio, el argentino Antonio de la Rúa . También te puede interesar: Esta es la razón por la que Shakira y Piqué no han podido vender su casa en España Recientemente, una gran fan de Shakira compartió en TikTok una idea muy original para un tatuaje relacionado con la letra de esta canción. La usuaria, cuyo nombre de usuario es Yandu Perfetto , se tatuó una serie de símbolos a lo largo de su brazo, colocados en orden según las palabras y elementos que aparecen en el primer verso de la canción. Entre los tatuajes, se encuentran la palabra “enero”, una luna, un ojo, un dulce, un mundo, unos rasguños, la palabra “amor”, un estetoscopio con un corazón, una curita, la palabra “nuevo”, un sol y una carita feliz. Este video llamó la atención de los fieles seguidores de Shakira , acumulando 1.6 millones de reproducciones en pocos días . En los comentarios, algunos usuarios consideraron la idea tan buena que expresaron su deseo de replicarla con...

title: Shots Fired in Apparent Second Attempted Assassination of Trump, FBI Says
creator: Julianne McShane
content: Sheriff vehicles near Trump International Golf Club on Sunday, after gunshots were reported in the vicinity of former President Donald Trump. Stephanie Matat/AP The FBI is investigating what officials believe is another attempted assassination of former President Trump, and a “potential suspect” is in custody. Shots were fired near Trump International Golf Club in West Palm Beach, Florida, where the president was golfing, at about 1:30 p.m. The Trump campaign’s communications director, Steven Cheung, said in a statement Sunday afternoon that Trump “is safe following gunshots in his vicinity.” Secret Service personnel who were walking ahead of Trump on the golf course opened fire after seeing a rifle barrel sticking out of a fence, Palm Beach County Sheriff Ric Bradshaw told reporters Sunday afternoon. The suspect—who Bradshaw said was 300 to 500 yards from Trump, around the length of three to four football fields—fled on foot before getting in a car, Bradshaw said. As of Sunday afternoon, it was unclear whether the suspect had fired any shots back at the Secret Service. A witness provided a photo and details of the license plate, which allowed the Martin County Sheriff’s office to identify the vehicle and detain the suspect soon after on the I-95 freeway, authorities said. Law enforcement found an AK-47 assault rifle with a scope—a device used to improve aim—two backpacks, and a GoPro camera in the shrubbery where the victim fled from. “With a rifle and a scope like that,”...

title: நாற்காலி ஆசைக்காக நான் இங்கு அரசியலுக்கு வரவில்லை: முன்னாள் துணை முதல்வா் மனீஷ் சிசோடியா
creator: Din
content: நாற்காலி ஆசைக்காக நான் இங்கு அரசியலுக்கு வரவில்லை’ என்று ஆம் ஆத்மி கட்சியின் மூத்த தலைவரும், தில்லி முன்னாள் துணை முதல்வருமான மனீஷ் சிசோடியா ஞாயிற்றுக்கிழமை தெரிவித்தாா்.

title: اتلتیکو مادرید ۳-۰ والنسیا/ پیروزی با درخشش ستاره های جدید
creator: info@yjc.ir
content: در ادامه هفته پنجم لالیگای اسپانیا، تیم اتلتیکو مادرید میزبان والنسیا بود که با سه گل به پیروزی دست یافت. کانر گلگر هافبک جدید اتلتیکو مادرید که با ژائو فلیکس در تیم چلسی معاوضه شده، در دقیقه ۳۹ گل اول بازی را برای این تیم به ثمر رساند. آنتوان گریزمن در دقیقه ۵۴ گل دوم را زد و خولیان آلوارز دیگر ستاره جدید روخی بلانکوس که از منچسترسیتی به مادرید آمده، در دقیقه ۹۴ گل سوم را زد. اتلتیکو با این پیروزی همچون رئال مادرید ۱۱ امتیازی شد و پشت سر بارسلونای ۱۵ امتیازی در رتبه دوم قرار دارد.

title: Vivienda social en renta para jóvenes en CDMX: conoce los requisitos y fechas para aplicar
creator: ximena.ochoa@tvazteca.com.mx (Ximena Ochoa)
content: El Gobierno de la Ciudad de México anunció un nuevo programa de renta de vivienda social para jóvenes, donde se espera garantizar el acceso a la vivienda para todas las personas capitalinas entre 18 y 29 años. Con el programa Vivienda Social en Renta , se busca que los universitarios , recién graduados y quienes estudian y trabajan o aquellos que desean tener un espacio propio e independendizarse de sus padres. adn40 Siempre Conmigo . Suscríbete a nuestro canal de Telegram y lleva la información en tus manos. ¡La vivienda es un derecho, no una mercancía! 💪🏼🏠 🗣️ El #JefeDeGobierno , @martibatres , encabezó el inicio de obra del primer proyecto del Programa Piloto de Vivienda Social en Renta para jóvenes, con el objetivo de brindarles un hogar digno, con alquiler a bajo costo, a... pic.twitter.com/CkEz0nxXfM — Gobierno de la Ciudad de México (@GobCDMX) September 12, 2024 ¿Cuáles son los requisitos para la vivienda social? El programa, a través de la Secretaría de Desarrollo Urbano y Vivienda de la capital del país, dio a conocer cuáles son los requisitos para aplicar a la convocatoria: Personas entre 18 a 29 años . Vivir en la Ciudad de México . Estudien o trabajen en la capital. Cuenten con ingresos no mayores a dos salarios mínimos (entre siete y 14 mil pesos ). No ser propietarios de alguna vivienda. title: Tensions voire début de bagarre et suspense haletant mais la malédiction de La Rochelle se poursuit à Toulouse
content: Les traits de Ronan O'Gara disent tout de son dépit. Ce ne sera pas pour cette fois pour l'Irlandais et ses Rochelais, décidément maudits face au Stade toulousain. Les Maritimes ont une nouvelle fois été défaits par les champions de France en titre (35-27) à Ernest-Wallon ce dimanche 15 septembre, à l'occasion de la 2e journée de Top 14. Le match a basculé à l'heure de jeu, lorsque Luc Ramos a dégainé un carton jaune à Will Skelton. Le 2e ligne australien, entré à la mi-temps, venait d'enchaîner les fautes à cinq mètres de sa ligne d'en-but. Il a justement écopé d'une sanction de dix minutes et grandement pénalisé les siens. Comme trop souvent, les Rochelais payent leur indiscipline. En demi-finale, l'an passé, ils menaient contre Toulouse, mais avaient fini par exploser, terminant la rencontre à 13. Cette fois encore, ils pourront nourrir des regrets. Rien ne le laissait pourtant présager après une première mi-temps largement toulousaine (22-10, trois essais à un). Mais les hommes de Ronan O'Gara - six ont été remplacés à la pause - sont revenus avec de bien meilleures intentions. Et dès la 48e minute, le jeu s'est largement équilibré. Les esprits se sont aussi échauffés: Julien Marchand a été sanctionné par l'arbitre pour un geste qui aurait pu être dangereux, ce qui lui a valu de s'attirer les foudres du public haut-garonnais. Trois minutes plus tard, Aleksandre Kuntelia offrait aux champions d'Europe 2022 et 2023 leur deuxième...

title: PM Modi : ఝార్ఖండ్‌కు చొరబాట్ల ముప్పు
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: ఝార్ఖండ్‌ ముక్తి మోర్చా కూటమి సర్కారు ఓటు బ్యాంకు రాజకీయాలు, అధికార దాహం కోసం బంగ్లాదేశ్‌ నుంచి అక్రమ వలసలను.. ఆ దేశం నుంచి రోహింగ్యాల రూపంలో చొరబాట్లను ప్రోత్సహిస్తోందని ప్రధాని మోదీ ఆరోపించారు. ఈ చొరబాటుదారులు ఝార్ఖండ్‌కు పెను ముప్పు అని.. ఫలితంగా ఆ రాష్ట్రంలోని సంతాల్‌ పరగణాలు, కొల్హాన్‌ ప్రాంతాల్లో జనాభా సంతులనం దెబ్బతింటుందని ఆందోళన వ్యక్తం చేశారు. ఈ ప్రాంతాల్లోని భూములను రోహింగ్యాలు, బంగ్లాదేశీయులు తమ గుప్పిట్లోకి తెచ్చుకున్నారని, తద్వారా గ్రామాలపై పట్టుసాధించారని ఆడబిడ్డలపై అఘాయిత్యాలకు పాల్పడుతున్నారని పేర్కొన్నారు. నవంబరులో ఝార్ఖండ్‌ అసెంబ్లీ ఎన్నికల నేపథ్యంలో ఆ రాష్ట్రంలోని జంషెడ్‌పూర్‌ గోపాల్‌ మైదానంలో ఆదివారం ‘పరివర్తన్‌ మహార్యాలీ’ పేరుతో జరిగిన బహిరంగసభలో మోదీ ప్రసంగించారు. బంగ్లాదేశ్‌ నుంచి అక్రమ వలసలపై స్వతంత్ర కమిటీతో దర్యాప్తు చేయించాలని హైకోర్టు ఉత్తర్వులిచ్చినా రోహింగ్యాల చొరబాట్లను ఝార్ఖండ్‌ ప్రభుత్వం పట్టించుకోవడం లేదన్నారు. ఆదివాసీ ఓటు బ్యాంకుతో అధికారంలోకొచ్చిన జేఎంఎం.. అడవులను ఆక్రమించుకుంటున్న బడాబాబులకు దన్నుగా నిలుస్తోందన్నారు.

title: Jim Harbaugh resurrects former draft flop with two touchdowns
creator: Jarrod Castillo
content: Jim Harbaugh's against the Carolina Panthers paid dividends Sunday. In the Los Angeles Chargers' first game of the season, Johnston had three receptions for 38 yards with zero touchdowns. Facing off against the rebuilding Panthers, however, Johnston had arguably the best game of his young career, taking advantage of Carolina's lackluster defensive unit. Johnston had five receptions for 51 yards. More impressively, he showed chemistry with quarterback Justin Herbert, with the star targeting Johnston the most of all his options and having two touchdowns in the 26-3 win over Carolina. And after a less-than-stellar rookie year, Johnston needed a standout game to show fans that the Chargers did not make a mistake in drafting the wide receiver. After the game, Harbaugh spoke to reporters and explained how happy he was for Johnston for being able to deal with the noise and perform when needed. "Nobody I'm more excited for than Quentin Johnston," Harbaugh said [ ]. "He's kind of been picked on by a lot of people, and it doesn't phase him." that Johnston's teammates are also enjoying how much freer as a result, : "Everybody on the team really likes Q. Loves him. Respects him. ... He continues to make tough catches across the middle. Not many people do that." The criticism toward Johnston stemmed from his production during his rookie year, which left much to be desired considering he was selected No. 21 overall in the 2023 NFL Draft. In 17 games last season, Johnston had 38 receptions...

title: White Sox win back-to-back games for first time in nearly 3 months, beat Athletics 4-3
creator: By SARAH TROTTO - Associated Press
content: CHICAGO (AP) — The White Sox won back-to-back games for the first time in nearly three months, beating the Oakland Athletics 4-3 on Sunday behind home runs from Gavin Sheets and Bryan Ramos to end a streak of 20 consecutive series losses. A day after scoring in the ninth to win 7-6 and stop a 16-game home losing streak, the White Sox took a 3-0 first-inning lead and strung together wins for the first time since three in a row against Atlanta and Colorado from June 27-29. Chicago hadn't won a series since taking two of three from the Rockies. Chicago is 35-115 with 12 games left and is trying to avoid the post-1900 record of 120 losses by the 1962 expansion New York Mets. The White Sox are 20-58 at home, one shy of the post-1900 mark for home losses shared by the 1939 St. Louis Browns and 2019 Detroit Tigers. Sean Burke (1-0) allowed two runs and five in five innings. The 24-year-old right-hander, making his first big league start and second appearance, struck out five and walked two. Ramos and Lenyn Sosa had two hits apiece for the White Sox. Brent Rooker and Shea Langeliers homered for the Athletics (65-85). JJ Bleday and Nick Allen each had two hits. JP Sears (11-11) gave up four runs and seven hits in six innings. Andrew Vaughn's RBI single and Sheets' two-run homer built the early lead. Sheets has 10 homers after going deep in consecutive games. Rooker hit his 37th homer, a two-run drive in the fifth, but Ramos boosted the lead with his sixth-inning homer. Pinch hitter...

title: Зеленский заявил, что не может вооружить четыре из 14 армейских бригад
creator: Газета.Ru
content: Зеленский заявил, что не может вооружить четыре из 14 армейских бригад Президент Украины Владимир Зеленский снова пожаловался на медленные поставки вооружений западными партнерами. Об этом сообщает CNN . Зеленский пояснил изданию, почему после принятия крупного пакета помощи от США и поставок из Европы у Вооруженных сил Украины остается дефицит вооружений. «Во-первых, все идет очень медленно. Во-вторых, нам нужно 14 бригад, чтобы быть готовыми. Мы не оснастили даже четырех», - заявил украинский лидер. Зеленский напомнил, что пока Конгресс США принимал решение о помощи Украине, страна исчерпала все резервы. По его словам, армия использовала все, что могла. В течение последних двух лет западные страны многократно нарастили поставки вооружений Украине. При этом украинские власти постоянно просит у партнеров более современные образцы и дальнобойные ракеты.

title: Affidavit: Man charged with intent to distribute meth, fentanyl after police find him nodding in pickup outside Greeley gas station
creator: Chris Bolin
content: A man faces a pair of felony charges after police say they found meth, fentanyl and several pieces of drug paraphernalia with him after he was found sleeping in his pickup outside a Greeley gas station last month. Police arrested 45-year-old James Hill on Aug. 25 on charges of possession of narcotics with intent to distribute — for both the meth and fentanyl; and possession of drug paraphernalia, according to Colorado Court records. On Aug. 25, Greeley police were dispatched to a convenience store in the 200 block of 22nd Street on a report of a man asleep in his truck outside the store. When officers arrived, they say they saw a man — later identified as Hill — nodding off in the driver’s seat of a black pickup, according to an affidavit for his arrest. While one officer spoke with Hill, another noticed drug paraphernalia in plain view in the truck’s passenger seat, according to the affidavit. Police say they also learned he had an outstanding warrant from Longmont for violation of a protection order from 2023. When police arrested him on the warrant, they found an apparent meth pipe in his front left pocket, according to the affidavit. Police say a search of the pickup uncovered a black satchel bag that contained suspected meth in a bag and three fentanyl pills. Officers also found three scales, several empty small bags indicative of drug distribution, as well as “countless foils” and multiple glass pipes, according to the affidavit. The meth later tested presumptive...

title: Judge eleva a 53 su cifra líder en jonrones; Yankees estiran liderato al vencer 5-2 a Medias Rojas
creator: Por LARRY FLEISHER
content: NUEVA YORK (AP) — Aaron Judge bateó su jonrón 53, marca líder de la temporada, y los Yankees de Nueva York vencieron el domingo 5-2 a los Medias Rojas de Boston para ampliar a tres juegos su liderato en la división Este de la Liga Americana sobre su escolta Baltimore. Judge, cuyos 132 remolcadas comandan también las mayores conectó su segundo vuelacercas en tres juegos seguido de una tope personal de 16 juegos consecutivos sin cuadrangulares, y ayudó a Carlos Rodón obtener su mejor registro personal — llegando a las 15 victorias tras una labor de cinco entradas y un tercio. Nueva York (87-63) ganó tres de cuatro juegos ante los Medias Rojas y ahora emprende una gira a Seattle y Oakland a punto de asegurar su plaza en la postemporada luego de fracasar en llegar a esa instancia la campaña pasada por primera vez desde 2016. Tyler O’Neill pegó un jonrón de dos carreras para los Medias Rojas (75-75), quienes cayeron cuatro juegos y medio detrás de Minnesota (79-70) por el último boleto en el comodín de la Liga Americana. Utilizando el número 21 en el Día de Roberto Clemente, Judge despachó un cuadrangular de dos carreras en un racimo de tres anotaciones en el tercer tramo ante Kutter Crawford (8-15). El venezolano Gleyber Torres también conectó cuadrangular ante Crawford. Tommy Kahnle relevó a Clay Holmes para obtener su primer salvamento de la temporada. Por los Yankees, los venezolanos Torres bateó de 5-2 con una carrera producida y dos anotadas, Oswaldo...

title: Сотрудник Секретной службы стрелял в инциденте со стрельбой у гольф-клуба
creator: Григорий  Будин
content: Секретная служба США подтвердила, что один из ее сотрудников открыл огонь по вооруженному человеку, находившемуся неподалеку из гольф-клуба во Флориде, где в тот момент был кандидат в президенты от Республиканской партии Дональд Трамп. Инцидент произошел около 14:00 по местному времени (21:00 мск) в гольф-клубе Trump International Golf Club в Палм-Бич. Представитель Секретной службы уточнил, что стрельба была ответной. Шериф округа Палм-Бич Рик Брэд также рассказал, что возле гольф-клуба, где скрывался подозреваемый, были обнаружены автомат АК-47 с оптическим прицелом, два с бронепластинами и экшен-камера. Напомним, член Палаты представителей Конгресса Соединённых Штатов Марджори Тейлор-Грин , что на Трампа совершено новое покушение. Сообщалось, что выстрелы около гольф-клуба во Флориде, где находился кандидат в президенты США Дональд Трамп, Секретной службы.

title: Este es el mensaje que reciben las víctimas de extorsión por WhatsApp
content: Las estafas virtuales representan un grave problema global que afecta a muchas personas, haciendo crucial la identificación de mensajes y patrones de ciberdelincuentes para evitar pérdidas económicas y situaciones incómodas. Recientemente, víctimas de extorsión a través de WhatsApp han compartido detalles sobre el tipo de contacto que recibieron. Estos textos suelen comenzar con una larga conversación diseñada para ganarse la confianza de la víctima y obtener datos personales necesarios para llevar a cabo el fraude. Reconocer estos patrones puede ser fundamental para protegerse de estos engaños. Suscríbete a nuestro canal de Telegram y lleva la información en tus manos. ¿Cómo son los mensajes de extorsión por WhatsApp? Una de las técnicas más comunes empleadas por los estafadores en extorsiones a través de WhatsApp , según el sitio especializado WaBetaInfo , es iniciar la conversación con confianza y amabilidad . Los mensajes típicos incluyen frases como: “Lo siento, ¿quién eres? Te encontré en mi libreta de direcciones.” Estos textos buscan obtener información básica sobre la víctima, como su nombre, edad o empleo, y a menudo incluyen cumplidos para generar una falsa sensación de seguridad. Una de las damnificadas relató que, después de un prolongado diálogo con un estafador, este le pidió que se agregaran como amigos en Instagram y Facebook. Esta estrategia permite a los delincuentes construir una relación con la víctima a lo largo del...

title: Frankenschnellweg: Video zeigt Raser mit dramatischer Geschwindigkeit
creator: Philip Buchen
content: Ein 20-Jähriger rast durch eine 80er-Zone bei Nürnberg. Die Polizei stoppt ihn – und spricht von einer "traurigen Höchstgeschwindigkeit". Was den Raser nun erwartet. Ein 20-jähriger Raser ist auf dem Frankenschnellweg mit einer "traurigen Höchstgeschwindigkeit" erwischt worden. Die Nürnberger Polizei veröffentlichte am Freitag auf Facebook ein Video, das den Fahrer bei seiner drastischen Tempoüberschreitung zeigte. Demnach war der Fahrer mit 169 km/h in einer 80er-Zone unterwegs. Zudem raste er mit 138 km/h durch einen Bereich, in dem nur 60 km/h erlaubt waren. Nachdem die Beamten den Raser gestoppt hatten, zeigte sich dieser einsichtig. Da der 20-Jährige keinen Wohnsitz in Deutschland hat, musste er vor Ort eine Sicherheitsleistung von 600 Euro plus 30 Euro Gebühren und 3,50 Euro Auslagen bezahlen. Doch damit ist die Sache für den jungen Mann noch nicht erledigt: Laut Bußgeldkatalog drohen ihm für eine solche Tempoüberschreitung zwei Punkte in Flensburg sowie ein zweimonatiges Fahrverbot. Vorerst durfte der 20-Jährige seine Fahrt jedoch fortsetzen. Den genauen Ort und Zeitpunkt des Vorfalls gab die Polizei nicht bekannt. Mit der Veröffentlichung des Videos auf Facebook wollen die Beamten offenbar auf die Gefahren von überhöhter Geschwindigkeit aufmerksam machen.

title: UK PM Starmer pledges migration cooperation ahead of Italy talks
content: ROME (Reuters) - British Prime Minister Keir Starmer has promised "a new era" in cross-border cooperation to tackle people smuggling gangs ahead of talks on Monday with Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni, part of his push to reset Britain's relations with Europe. Starmer has put renewing ties with European leaders at the top of his diplomatic agenda since winning an election in July, and Monday's visit to Rome follows trips to Berlin, Paris and Dublin in recent weeks. Heading to Rome to meet Meloni, who had close ties with Starmer's predecessor Rishi Sunak, Starmer will stress his commitment to tackling illegal migration and the need to work with European partners to smash the business model of the illegal networks that fuel it. Starmer has scrapped the previous government's contentious plan to deport asylum seekers who arrive in small boats to Rwanda, but has not ruled out arrangements that would see asylum claims processed offshore, similar to an agreement Italy has struck with Albania. Ahead of the talks with Meloni, Starmer said Martin Hewitt, a former chair of the National Police Chiefs' Council, would run a new Border Security Command which would be empowered to lead joint investigations with other countries. "No more gimmicks. This government will tackle the smuggling gangs who trade the lives of men, women and children across borders," Starmer said, promising "a new era of international enforcement to dismantle these networks, protect our shores and bring order to...

title: Sony on evolving into the next-gen PlayStation 6: 'there's still more we can do'
creator: Anthony Garreffa
content: Sony only just unveiled its new PlayStation 5 Pro, but its next-gen PlayStation 6 console is already being discussed... and what improvements we could expect from the PS5 to the new PS6 generation console. In a chat with Nikkei recently, Hideaki Nishino, the CEO of the Platform Business Group at Sony Interactive Entertainment was asked if the launch of the PS5 Pro would be more of a challenge to create a successful next-gen PS6 in a few years, to which Nishino responded about technology constantly evolving and that there is "still more that we (Sony) can do". Nishino mentions the shortened loading times by moving from a HDD in the PS4 to the Gen4 SSD in the PS5, and that the sound is now 3D through the PS5 DualSense controller speakers, enhancing immersion. Nishino also mentioned that "visual accuracy is important" and that "we will also be updating other elements". The PS4 to PS5 upgrade was rather large, and I expect the PS5 to PS6 upgrade to be even bigger. The PS5 Pro will push 4K with locked 60FPS, 2-3x the ray tracing performance, and AI-powered PSSR (PlayStation Spectral Super Resolution). I would dare say the PS6 will push out 4K 60FPS with next-gen RT graphics, 4K 120FPS performance modes, 8K 30FPS "cinematic" mode for games with RT (and powered by PSSR 2 or whatever) and then 8K 60FPS "performance" mode with less (or no RT) and PSSR 2 set to performance. AMD has already reportedly won the contract to build a next-gen SoC for the PlayStation 6, where we should...

title: 수소 슈퍼카 N비전74 양산 공식화...포니 쿠페 계승한다
creator: 김진원
content: 현대자동차가 수소를 연료로 쓰는 슈퍼카를 세계 최초로 생산한다. 16일 자동차업계에 따르면 는 최근 투자자를 대상으로 ‘2024 CEO 인베스터 데이’를 열고 2030년까지 21종의 전동화 제품 출시를 밝혔다. 당시 발표 화면에는 수소 슈퍼카 ‘N비전74’가 제네시스의 고성능 트림 마그마와 함께 언급돼 있다. N비전74는 현대차가 2년 전 콘셉트카로 내놓은 수소 슈퍼카다. 현대차는 N비전74의 양산형 모델에 내부적 ‘N74’라는 코드명을 붙였다. 1차 협력사에 차량에 사용할 각종 부품 스펙을 전달했다. 현재 성능 검증용 ‘T카’(트라이얼 카) 제작을 시작한 것으로 알려졌다. 본격 생산 시점은 부품업계에 2026년 6월로 잠정 통보됐다. N74는 수소연료전지를 고성능 모터와 결합한 후륜구동 방식으로 제작된다. 모터 성능 등을 감안할 때 출력은 775마력 이상이 될 것으로 알려졌다. 정지 상태에서 시속 100km까지 도달하는 시간(제로백)은 3초대로, 내연기관을 장착한 슈퍼카와 비슷한 수준이 될 것으로 전해졌다. 현대차그룹은 N74를 2년 동안 200대만 한정 생산할 계획이다. 자동차업계는 차량 가격이 5억원 안팎이 될 것으로 예상했다. N74에는 570kW의 고성능 모터가 장착될 것으로 알려졌다. 모터의 성능을 마력으로 환산하면 775마력이 넘는다. 페라리 ‘로마’(620마력)나 람보르기니 ‘우라칸’(640마력) 등 내연기관을 장착한 슈퍼카를 능가한다. 현대차그룹 남양연구소는 N74 개발에 나서면서 몇 가지 목표를 세웠다. 독일의 산악지형 장거리 서킷인...

title: Суд на Украине рассмотрит иск с требованием назначить президентские выборы
content: МОСКВА, 16 сен — РИА Новости. Суд на Украине в понедельник должен рассмотреть иск депутата Верховной рады Александра Дубинского с требованием обязать украинский парламент назначить выборы президента. Президентские выборы на Украине должны были состояться 31 марта. Но их отменили, сославшись на военное положение и всеобщую мобилизацию. Владимир Зеленский заявлял, что выборы сейчас "несвоевременны". Срок его полномочий истек 20 мая. Но официальный Киев настаивает, что Зеленский остается легитимным до избрания нового главы государства. Дискуссии о возможности проведения выборов на Украине активно шли в прошлом году. В начале ноября 2023 года Зеленский поставил в этом вопросе точку, заявив, что они не ко времени. В его офисе отказ проводить выборы оправдывали тем, что они должны быть признаны "демократическими" со стороны международного сообщества, в них обязательно должны участвовать все украинские военнослужащие и граждане, покинувших страну. Еще одна из причин — нежелание тратить бюджетные деньги, которых "и так не хватает". "Если сегодня наши партнеры придут и скажут, что готовы решить нам эти четыре вопроса, власть в лице президента готова (к выборам -ред.)", — заявлял глава офиса Зеленского Андрей Ермак в ноябре. Эксперты и СМИ называли и другую причину отмены президентских выборов до окончания военного положения – страх Зеленского потерпеть поражение. Согласно опросам жителей Украины, проводимым в 2023 году и начале текущего, в случае президентских выборов...

title: Спецназ "Ахмат" за сутки уничтожил САУ и миномет ВСУ в Курской области
content: МОСКВА, 16 сен - РИА Новости. Спецназ "Ахмат" уничтожил артиллерийскую установку, миномет и несколько гексакоптеров "Баба-Яга" в Курской области, сообщил командир спецназа "Ахмат", замначальника главного военно-политического управления Минобороны РФ генерал-майор Апти Алаудинов. "Суджанское направление особых изменений в линии боевого соприкосновения не претерпело за сегодняшний день. Подразделения совместными усилиями уничтожили несколько единиц техники. Артиллерийскую установку, миномет, несколько гексакоптеров, "Баба-Яга" мы их называем, ну и боевой расчет "Бабы-Яги" тоже уничтожен нашими ребятами сегодня. Хорошо поработали, молодцы. В общей сложности участок наш остается стабильным. Противник там где-то пытается закрепиться, где находим его - уничтожаем", - сказал он на видео, опубликованном в его Telegram-канале. Также Алаудинов отметил зачистку от ВСУ села Борки в Курской области. "Начала вырисовываться картина с нашим правым флангом. Хочу отметить подразделение "АрБат". бойцов 810-й бригады, один из батальонов, зачистили до конца населенный пункт Борки и закрепились полностью в нем. Если отмечать тот участок, где вчера противник произвел прорыв нашей границы и устремился в направлении Веселого, тоже надо сказать, что противник там был остановлен. И сегодня весь день шло планомерное его уничтожение", - добавил он. Подразделения ВСУ в 5.30 6 августа перешли в наступление с целью захвата территории в Курской области, их продвижение было остановлено, заявил...

Read unlimited articles for free today: Already have an account? GAINESVILLE, Va. (AP) — Suzann Pettersen was a big part of the biggest collapse in Solheim Cup history when her refusal to concede a short putt inspired the Americans to a comeback win in Germany in 2015. Four years later, the fiery Norwegian capped her career as a player in triumph by holing the winning putt for Europe. Pettersen’s record as European captain in two Solheim Cups is similarly mixed. Europe overcame a disastrous opening session in Spain last year and rallied for a 14-14 tie that allowed it to capture the cup for a third straight time. Going for a record four in a row, Pettersen’s team again got off to a slow start, trailing 6-2 after the first day, then prevented an American blowout and put a scare into the United States during a tense hour in Sunday’s singles matches. But the Europeans didn’t hole enough putts or close out enough matches in front of a loud American crowd at Robert Trent Jones Golf...

title: FBI'dan Trump açıklaması
content: Cumhuriyetçi Parti'nin başkan adayı Donald Trump , Florida’da bulunduğu yerin civarında silah sesleri duyuldu. Trump'ın kampanya sözcüsü Steven Cheung, duyulan silah seslerinin ardından Trump'ın güvende olduğunu bildirilmişti. Cheung, "Başkan Trump, civarda silah sesleri duyulduktan sonra güvende. Şu anda başka ayrıntı yok." bilgisini paylaştı. BİR ŞÜPHELİ GÖZALTINA ALINDI Trump'ın büyük oğlu Donald Trump Jr, konuya ilişkin sosyal medya hesabından yaptığı açıklamada yerel kolluk kuvvetleri tarafından olayın ardından sahadaki çalılıklarda AK-47 silahının bulunduğu ve bir şüphelinin yakalandığı bildirdi. AP'ye konuşan kaynaklar, Gizli Servis ajanının, korumakla görevli olduğu Trump golf oynarken şüpheliye silahla ateş açtığını belirtmişti. "ASLA PES ETMEYECEĞİM" Saldırı sonrası Donald Trump, destekçilerine gönderdiği e-postada "asla pes etmeyeceğini" belirterek, "Etrafımda silah sesleri duyuldu ancak söylentiler kontrolden çıkmadan şunları söylemek istiyorum: İyiyim ve güvendeyim." mesajını paylaştı. Eski Başkan Trump, 13 Temmuz'da Pennsylvania'daki miting sırasında uğradığı suikast girişiminden kulağından aldığı yara ile kurtulmuştu. FBI'DAN AÇIKLAMA ABD Federal Soruşturma Bürosu (FBI) , ABD Eski ABD Başkanı ve Cumhuriyetçi Parti'nin başkan adayı Donald Trump 'a suikast girişimi olarak değerlendirilen olayın araştırıldığını açıkladı.

title: Luke Littler beats Michael Smith to win World Series of Darts Finals
content: The teenager powered to an 11-4 triumph in Sunday night’s final after seeing off home favourite Michael van Gerwen by the same scoreline in his semi-final hours earlier. Former world champion Smith took an early 2-1 lead in the final but checkouts of 140 and 130 turned the match around. Smith hit back to level at 3-3 but the momentum was with Littler, who reeled off seven successive legs to open up a 10-3 advantage. Smith briefly rallied with a 170 checkout but Littler soon finished off matters to claim his third World Series title after successes in Bahrain and Poland earlier this year. Littler told pdc.tv: “This time last year I was playing on the Development Tour; my name was getting mentioned but after the World Championship everyone knew who I was. “I’m going to keep building on this and winning more. It’s a busy schedule coming up and I’m ready for it.”

title: Tirs à proximité de Donald Trump en Floride : ce que l'on sait de la "tentative d'assassinat" présumée
At least 24 dead following fuel tanker explosion in Haiti
content: Sept. 15 (UPI) -- The death toll has risen to at least 24 after a fuel tanker explosion in Haiti, local authorities reported Sunday. Dozens more people were injured. Officials said many of the injured suffered burns over at least 80% of their bodies. The accident occurred Saturday near the commune of Miragoane about 60 miles west of the capital, Port-au- Prince . The tanker collided with another vehicle and the explosion happened as people were scrambling to try to collect the spilled fuel, according to Spanish broadcaster RTVE . The driver reportedly warned people nearby not to get too close to the tanker before the explosion. As many as 20 cars and motorcycles were burned by the explosions ensuing fire. "It's a horrible scene we've just witnessed," Haitian Prime Minister Garry Coville said at the Port-au-Prince airport, where some of the injured were taken. This is not the first such multi-fatality fuel tanker accident and explosion in Haiti. More than 60 people died following a similar incident in 2021.

title: El Talavera sigue impecable y al Guadalajara se le escapó el triunfo en Tenerife

La felicidad del equipo blanquiazul es completa en vísperas ya de la Feria de San Mateo. Con 1.560 espectadores en el municipal El Prado -cifra oficial-, el equipo talaverano se impuso por 1-0 al UD Melilla. El gol llegó en el minuto 75 merced a un claro penalti cometido sobre Álvaro Sánchez y que el propio ariete transformó en gol con un disparo raso y cruzado en el minuto 75. El equipo melillense, unos de los grandes favoritos para el ascenso, se vio perjudicado por la expulsión de Corbalán en el minuto 59 por doble tarjeta amarilla. El partido fue de dominio alterno, con posibilidades de gol para ambas escuadras. Decidió la batalla una hábil jugada de Álvaro Sánchez que buscó y consiguió una pena máxima cometida por el central visitante. El próximo partido del Talavera CF será visitando domingo al Deportivo Guadalajara (19.00 horas, por CMM Play). Por su parte, el Deportivo Guadalajara dilapidó un 0-2 que llevaba ya en la segunda mitad del su partido en la Ciudad Deportiva del Tenerife frente al filial del equipo chicharrero. title: ¿Segundo intento de asesinato?: Todo sobre el tiroteo en el campo de golf de Trump MINUTO A MINUTO
creator: RT en Español

title: El FBI confirma que está investigando un «intento de asesinato» contra Trump
creator: EFE
content: Miami (EE.UU.).- La Oficina Federal de Investigación (FBI, en inglés) confirmó este domingo que el suceso junto al campo de golf donde estaba jugando el expresidente estadounidense Donald Trump está siendo investigado como un aparente «intento de asesinato». «El FBI ha respondido a West Palm Beach, Florida, y está investigando lo que parece ser un intento de asesinato del expresidente Trump», apuntó en un comunicado. Según medios estadounidenses como CNN, una persona fue detenida en las inmediaciones del campo de golf mientras portaba un arma larga, un rifle AK47, y tenía la intención de atacar al candidato republicano. Aunque no hay confirmación oficial, los medios aseguran que el Servicio Secreto disparó contra el sospechoso después de ver que iba armado. También te puede interesar: Los medios de comunicación han sido convocados a una rueda de prensa este domingo por la tarde, que está retrasándose continuamente. Trump ya informó en un comunicado de prensa de que se encuentra bien: «Hubo disparos cerca de mí, pero antes de que los rumores comiencen a salirse de control, quiero que escuches esto primero: ¡ESTOY A SALVO Y BIEN!», apuntó. El candidato republicano a la presidencia estadounidense, quien el pasado 13 de julio sufrió un intento de asesinato, añadió: «Nada me detendrá. ¡NUNCA ME RENDIRÉ!». «El presidente Trump se encuentra a salvo tras los disparos que se produjeron en sus inmediaciones. No hay más detalles por el momento», apuntó en un...

title: 충북 가끔 구름 많고 늦더위 지속...낮 최고 29~34도
creator: 서주영 기자
content: [청주=뉴시스] 서주영 기자 = 월요일인 16일 충북은 가끔 구름 많겠다. 충북 남부에는 소나기가 오는 곳이 있겠다. 예상 강수량은 5~20mm다. 오전 6시 현재 기온은 청주 26.6도, 충주 24도, 추풍령 23.4도, 제천 22.2도, 보은 23.1도 등이다. 낮 최고기온은 29~34도로 전날(31.2~35.5도)보다 낮겠다. 충북 전역에는 폭염주의보가 발효 중이다. 미세먼지 농도는 '좋음' 수준으로 국립환경과학원은 예보했다. 청주기상지청 관계자는 "소나기가 오는 곳은 천둥·번개를 동반해 시간당 20mm 안팎으로 강하게 내릴 수 있겠으니 피해 없도록 주의해야 한다"고 당부했다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: BBC Strictly Come Dancing fans distracted by famous face in audience and say 'never thought'
creator: newsdesk@birminghamlive.co.uk (Katy Hallam, Jessica Sansome)
content: Strictly Come Dancing fans were momentarily distracted from the dazzling dance floor action during the launch show, as they caught sight of a familiar face in the audience. The BBC One dance extravaganza made its grand return on Saturday night (September 14), with 15 celebrities stepping out for their ballroom introductions in the pre-recorded episode that marked Strictly's comeback after a nine-month hiatus and unveiled the pairings vying for this year's Glitterball trophy. Among the stars making their debut was Toyah Wilcox, the 80s music legend, who was revealed to be teaming up with crowd-pleaser Neil Jones. Neil is back with a celebrity partner for the first time since the 2021 series. Toyah expressed her delight at being paired with Neil to Claudia Winkleman, exclaiming: "I met Neil and I was in heaven. All of you are beautiful boys but not as beautiful as Neil!" However, it wasn't just Toyah and Neil's pairing that had viewers talking. Many were quick to spot Toyah's husband, Robert Fripp, in the audience. Read more Ellie Leach fights back tears in backstage video ahead of Strictly launch Fripp isn't just any supportive spouse he's renowned as the guitarist, founder, and enduring member of the progressive rock band King Crimson, with notable collaborations with David Bowie and Brian Eno under his belt. title: BREAKING: We have documents – NNPCL insists it bought Dangote Refinery petrol at N898 per litre
creator: Ogaga Ariemu
content: Daily Post Nigeria BREAKING: We have documents – NNPCL insists it bought Dangote Refinery petrol at N898 per litre Home News Politics Metro Entertainment Sport Business BREAKING: We have documents – NNPCL insists it bought Dangote Refinery petrol at N898 per litre Published on September 15, 2024 By Ogaga Ariemu The Nigerian National Petroleum Company Limited says it stands by its earlier disclosure that Dangote Refinery Petrol is sold to them at N897 per liter. NNPCL spokesperson, Olufemi Soneye disclosed this exclusively to DAILY POST on Sunday. This comes after the Dangote Group in a statement by its spokesperson, Anthony Chiejina, on Sunday disagreed with NNPCL over its statement that Dangote Refinery Petrol was to them at N898 per litre. However, when DAILY POST contacted NNPCL on his reaction to Dangote Refinery’s statement, he said, he stood by his revelation. “We stand by our earlier stand that Dangote Refinery Petrol is sold to us at N898 per litre. “We have documents to back this point”, he told DAILY POST. The confusion comes after Dangote Refinery started loading its petrol on Sunday. NNPCL had confirmed that 70 trucks belonging to the state-owned firm loaded Dangote Petrol on Sunday. title: Braelon Allen, NFL’s youngest player, scores 2 TDs to help Aaron Rodgers and Jets beat Titans
creator: Teresa M Walker
content: NASHVILLE, Tenn. — Braelon Allen, the NFL’s youngest player, ran for a 20-yard touchdown with 4:31 left to put Aaron Rodgers and the Jets ahead to stay as they beat the Tennessee Titans 24-17 on Sunday. Rodgers threw for 176 yards and two TDs and got to kneel down for his first victory as the Jets’ starting quarterback. One of those TD passes by the 40-year-old Rodgers was to the 20-year-old Allen, marking a score by the NFL’s oldest and youngest players. The Jets (1-1) ruined the home opener for Titans first-year coach Brian Callahan, whose offense was rolling until a pair of back-to-back turnovers by second-year quarterback Will Levis. The Titans (0-2) had a chance at the end. Will McDonald IV, who had three of the Jets’ four sacks, got his third with 23 seconds left on third down. Levis threw to Tyler Boyd on fourth-and-goal from the 14 with Jets safety Tony Adams helping break up the pass to turn it over on downs. The Jets got 17 points off Titans’ mistakes. First came an interception by Brandin Echols. There was a roughing penalty by two-time Pro Bowl defensive lineman Jeffery Simmons on third down that kept a New York drive ahead for the Jets’ first lead at 14-10 to start the third quarter. Then, Irvin Charles blocked Ryan Stonehouse’s punt that resulted in a 33-yard field goal by Greg Zuerlein and a 17-10 lead. The Titans tied it when Levis broke loose on a 21-yard run that left Jets pass rusher Jermaine Johnson on the ground with an injured right Achilles tendon. Two...

title: నేడు గుజరాత్‌కు సీఎం చంద్రబాబు
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: గుజరాత్‌ రాజధాని గాంధీనగర్‌లో ఈ నెల 16 నుంచి 18 వరకు జరగనున్న రెన్యూవబుల్‌ ఎనర్జీ(ఆర్‌ఈ) ఇన్వెస్టర్స్‌ మీట్‌-2024లో పాల్గొనేందుకు సీఎం చంద్రబాబు సోమవారం ఆ రాష్ట్రానికి వెళ్లనున్నారు. పునరుత్పాదక విద్యుత్తు రంగంలో ఆంధ్రప్రదేశ్‌లో పెట్టుబడులకు ఉన్న అవకాశాల గురించి ఆయన సదస్సులో కీలకోపన్యాసం చేస్తారు. జాతీయ, అంతర్జాతీయ సంస్థల ప్రతినిధులతో సమావేశమవుతారు. ఆర్‌ఈ ఇన్వె్‌స్ట-2024కు ముఖ్యఅతిథిగా ప్రధాని మోదీ హాజరవుతున్నారు. ఈ సందర్భంగా ప్రధానితో సీఎం చంద్రబాబు ప్రత్యేకంగా భేటీ అయ్యే అవకాశాలున్నాయని అధికార వర్గాలు చెబుతున్నాయి.

title: "NISAM HTEO DA SE JAVIM" Prvo suočavanje Miljane i Zole nakon vesti o TRUDNOĆI: "Znaš o čemu smo pričali"
content: - Kako si? - pitao je Zola. - Nisam dobro. Mama što je rekla da sam pila lekove, to je bilo pre nego što smo se videli - rekla je Miljana koju je majka Marija prethodno iskritikovala zbog trudnoće. - Nemoj da se brineš. Normalno je Marija da će ti to reći. Pusti nju. Zbog toga se nisam odmah javio. Zamoli da se čujemo i da se dogovorimo kad izađeš na predlog. Uz tebe sam - rekao je Zola, pa nastavio: - Znaš šta smo se dogovorili o čemu smo pričali. Inače, Marija je oštro osudila ćerku. - Je l znaš kako se zoveš? Znaš li gde si bila celo leto, šta su ti prepisali, šta si pila? Raduješ se trudnoći sa psihijatrojskim lekovima. Zbog tebe da se rađa bolesno dete. - rekla je Marija. Da podsetimo, Miljana je radila test na trudnoću. - Da li sam trudna? - upitala je Miljana. - Da, da - vikale su zadrugarke koje su videle dve crte na testu. - Trudna sam. Sa Zolom, sa kim drugo - otkrila je Miljana. - Isto je bilo i meni - rekla je Aneli. Miljana Kulić već ima sina Željka sa Ivanom Marinkovićem sa kojim je bila u komplikovanim odnosima. Inače, Ivan Marinković nedavno je boravio u Nišu kod svoje bivše partnerke Miljane Kulić sa kojom ima sina Željka. Kako je ispričao, Miljana i on su se odlično slagali i nije bilo nikakvih svađa i nesuglasica, iako su svi bili ubeđeni da će biti suprotno. - Ivane, šta se desilo između tebe i Miljane i kako ste stupili u kontakt? - pitala je voditeljka u emisiji "Narod pita". - Nakon izlaska iz rijaltija poželeo sam...

title: 추석 셋째날 광주·전남 최고 35도...한때 소나기
creator: 김혜인 기자
content: [광주=뉴시스]김혜인 기자 = 추석 연휴 셋째날인 16일 광주·전남 지역은 낮 최고기온이 35도를 기록하며 무더운 날씨를 보이겠다. 오후 한 때 소나기도 내리겠다. 이날 광주기상청에 따르면 이날 낮 최고기온은 32~35도를 기록하겠다. 높은 습도로 체감온도는 보다 높겠다. 현재 전남 나주·여수·장흥·영광·목포에 폭염주의보가 내려져있다. 폭염주의보 발효 지역을 제외한 광주와 전남 17개 시군에는 폭염경보가 내려졌다. 이날 오후 3시~6시 사이 광주·전남 지역에 소나기가 내리는 곳이 있겠다. 예상 강수량은 5~60mm이다. 기상청관계자는 "낮 최고기온이 높을 것으로 예상하면서 벌초 등 야외활동 시 충분한 수분을 섭취하고 가급적 외출을 자제해달라"고 당부했다. ◎공감언론 뉴시스

title: बडगुजर पिता-पुत्राला गोळीबार प्रकरणात अडकविण्यासाठी दबाव, शिवसैनिक अंकुश शेवाळेला पोलीस कोठडीत अमानुष मारहाण
creator: सामना ऑनलाईन
content: अडीच वर्षांपूर्वी सिडकोत झालेल्या गोळीबारप्रकरणी शिवसैनिक अंकुश शेवाळे याला सात दिवसांपूर्वी सत्ताधाऱ्यांच्या दबावाखाली अटक करण्यात आली. शिवसेना (उद्धव बाळासाहेब ठाकरे) पक्षाचे जिल्हाप्रमुख सुधाकर बडगुजर व त्यांचा मुलगा दीपक यांना गोवण्यासाठी शेवाळे याला पोलिसांनी अमानुष मारहाण केली आहे. या कृत्याचा शिवसेनेने तीव्र निषेध केला आहे. रिपाईचा शहराध्यक्ष प्रशांत जाधव याच्यावर गोळीबार झाला होता. काही दिवसांपूर्वी यातील दोन संशयितांना गुंडाविरोधी पथकाने अटक केली. त्यांच्या सांगण्यावरून अंकुश शेवाळे यास हकनाक अटक करण्यात आली. शिवसेना जिल्हाप्रमुख सुधाकर बडगुजर, त्यांचा मुलगा दीपक यांचा या गोळीबार प्रकरणाशी संबंध आहे, अशी कबुली देण्यासाठी अंकुश शेवाळे याला अंबड पोलिसांनी अमानुष मारहाण केली आहे. रविवारी न्यायालयात त्याला हजर करण्यात आले असता त्याने हा प्रकार सांगितला. मारहाणप्रकरणी वैद्यकीय तपासणीसाठी न्यायालयाने शेवाळे याला जिल्हा रुग्णालयात घेवून जाण्याचे आदेश पोलिसांना दिले. त्यानुसार त्याची तपासणी करण्यात आली. न्यायदेवतेवर विश्वास – बडगुजर या प्रकरणात मला आणि माझ्या मुलाला गोवण्यासाठी अंकुश शेवाळे याला बेदम मारहाण करण्यात आली. आमची नावे घेण्यासाठी त्याच्यावर दबाव टाकला जात आहे. आम्ही ही लढाई लढू, जिंकू. आमचा न्यायालयावर विश्वास आहे. अंबड पोलिसांच्या भूमिकेवर संशय असून, राजकीय सूडापोटी बेकायदेशीर कारवाई करण्यात येत आहे, असे सुधाकर बडगुजर यांनी सांगितले. सत्ताधाऱ्यांचे षङ्यंत्र – दत्ता गायकवाड विधानसभा निवडणुकीत नाशिक मध्य आणि पश्चिम विधानसभा मतदारसंघात भाजपाचा पराभव होणार याची खात्री झाली आहे. यामुळे सत्ताधाऱ्यांकडून बडगुजर यांच्यासह शिवसैनिकांवर गेल्या काही दिवसांपासून खोटे...

title: Letter: Decision to remove winter fuel payment will astound
content: That so many old people in Basingstoke will be affected by the Government's extraordinary decision to remove the winter fuel payment will astound many of us. Not only will old people lose some £250 on average - to help fill, it appears, a sudden surprising black hole in the Treasury's books, the imminent raising of the Government's price cap will add another £150 to annual energy bills. The silence from our esteemed new MP gives little hope for the future. READ MORE: Residents have their say... Letter to the editor

title: Neuro Rehabilitation Centre opening next week in Basingstoke
content: The Hamberley Neurocare service, on Bradley Way, Beggarwood, will provide care services for people with complex neurological conditions. The contemporary 28-bedroom building, which will open on September 18, features therapy and medical consulting rooms and a therapy gym fitted with state-of-the-art rehabilitation equipment. Home Manager Gill Irish said: "Hamberley Neurocare Basingstoke will be a centre of clinical excellence, kindness and compassion – a place where people can access truly personalised care that allows them to recover and discover their own resilience. title: National Fitness Day: Basingstoke Sports Centre Free passes
content: Better Basingstoke Sports Centre is offering local residents a range of free activities to support National Fitness Day on Wednesday, September 18. Now in its thirteenth year, National Fitness Day is run by the leisure industry body, UKActive, and aims to encourage the nation to get moving and shine a light on the many benefits that being active can offer. This year, National Fitness Day will continue under the theme 'Your Health is Your Life' highlighting the many ways that physical activity can and does have a positive contribution on an individual's physical and mental health, while also providing an opportunity to make social connections. title: Travel review: Reaching crazy new heights in beautiful Dubrovnik
content: Two speakers crackled to life as he spoke, before upbeat house music starting pumping. All the guests cheered and took out their phones to film, waving them round with huge smiles of nervous excitement, as a huge crane whirred into action behind us. This was going to be no ordinary dinner. I was a guest on board the Dinner in the Sky experience – a new craze popping up across the world which sees guests sit round a table with the chef and his kitchen in the middle, which is then lifted 50 metres into the air by a crane and slowly turned round. It's a new take on panoramic dining – and while already popular in places such as London where there's waiting list of months despite the British weather – taking part in the Dinner in the Sky experience in Dubrovnik, where the sea in an unbelievable shade of blue and the sunsets are amazing, is a once in a lifetime experience. LaCroma Hotel (Image: Valamar Hotels) The music played, the sun set, shimmering a beautiful glowing red, while a soft breeze took the edge off the sun-filled hot day. The views stretched out over the Adriatic Sea for miles, surrounded by sweeping hills, glittering ocean stretching out into the horizon. And the food – all top class – was served by the talented and hospitable chefs, who explained each dish – succulent veal or locally-caught sea bass, with delicious almond cake for pudding. The wine flowed, songs were sung, legs swung freely underneath and napkins were waved enthusiastically above heads, and the...

title: Flashback: Chemists in Basingstoke over the decades
content: In the 18th century they were known as apothecaries, then later on as druggists. They prepared and sold drugs from small shops or stalls in the street. Basingstoke in the 18th century was blessed with one apothecary who could help his customers with medicines. His name was John Covey, who was mentioned in the 1784 town directory when the town had a population of some 4,000 people. READ MORE: Flashback: The life and work of cricket's John Arlott Boots the chemist in London Street in 1962 (Image: Contributed) By 1828 there were three "druggists" and, in 1844, just one more. There were seven chemists in the town in 1952, but only one of those still exists, this being Boots the chemist. In those days Boots was in London Street in an old building which was originally the Bell Inn. The cellar where various criminals were once imprisoned was the stock room, while the rear yard was used to keep the barrels of vinegar and distilled water which customers used to buy by the pint. Boots first came to Basingstoke in 1925 and stayed at London Street until 1968, when the business was moved down to the first phase of the new shopping centre, at Westminster House. In 1981, Boots moved to its present position in Old Basing Mall. The other chemists in... Robert Brown
