title: فليك: يامال يافع يجمع بين الموهبة والضغط... نجم رائع
creator: كاتب
content: أثنى هانز فليك، مدرب برشلونة، على الشاب المتألق لامين يامال الذي سجل هدفين في الفوز 4-1 على جيرونا، ليحقق فريقه العلامة الكاملة بعد 5 جولات من دوري الدرجة الأولى الإسباني لكرة القدم. وسجل يامال، الذي خطف الأنظار بقيادة إسبانيا للفوز ببطولة أوروبا للمرة الرابعة في يوليو (تموز) الماضي، هدفين في الشوط الأول قبل أن يهز داني أولمو وبيدري الشباك. ووفقاً لوكالة «رويترز»، قال فليك عبر منصة «موفيستار بلس»: «أنا سعيد جداً بهدفي لامين، إنه يافع جداً، لكنه لا يصدق، قادر على صناعة الفارق في مثل هذا العمر. وجوده مهم جداً بالنسبة لنا، ليس فقط بسبب مستواه ولكن لأنه ينفذ الضغط العالي. يجمع الموهبة والضغط، وهذا أمر هائل بالنسبة لنا. إنه رائع». وأضاف: «لقد كانت مباراة صعبة، لعب جيرونا بصورة جيدة، لكننا بدأنا بصورة جيدة أيضاً وحققنا فوزاً مستحقاً».

title: Luke Littler beats Michael Smith to win World Series of Darts Finals
content: The teenager beat both Michael van Gerwen and Smith 11-4 in Amsterdam. Luke Littler continued his meteoric rise by winning the Jack’s World Series of Darts Finals with a crushing victory over Michael Smith in Amsterdam. The teenager powered to an 11-4 triumph in Sunday night’s final after seeing off home favourite Michael van Gerwen by the same scoreline in his semi-final hours earlier. Former world champion Smith took an early 2-1 lead in the final but checkouts of 140 and 130 turned the match around. Smith hit back to level at 3-3 but the momentum was with Littler, who reeled off seven successive legs to open up a 10-3 advantage. Smith briefly rallied with a 170 checkout but Littler soon finished off matters to claim his third World Series title after successes in Bahrain and Poland earlier this year. Littler told pdc.tv: “This time last year I was playing on the Development Tour; my name was getting mentioned but after the World Championship everyone knew who I was. “I’m going to keep building on this and winning more. It’s a busy schedule coming up and I’m ready for it.”

title: Buscan mejorar atención de primer contacto a mujeres víctimas de violencia
creator: Emmanuel  Castañeda
content: Tijuana BC.- Se buscará que más de 7 mil funcionarias y funcionarios públicos se certifiquen y capaciten en temas de atención de primer contacto hacia mujeres víctimas de violencia , apuntó la directora del Instituto de la Mujer del Estado (Immujer). Mónica Vargas Núñez explicó que esta medida forma parte de las recomendaciones emitidas en la Alerta de Violencia de Género contra la Mujer (AVGM), del cual al corte más reciente presenta un avance general de 58% . Compartió que a la fecha son alrededor de 90 funcionarias y funcionarios públicos los que ya se están certificando en estándares de atención a mujeres víctimas de violencia, aunque el objetivo es completar la cifra antes mencionada. Te puede interesar: Alerta de Violencia de Género contra las Mujeres tiene avance del 58% en BC Puntualizó que el objetivo principal de las capacitaciones es que todos los servidores públicos que brindan atención de primer contacto con mujeres puedan saber cómo atenderlas y no revictimizarlas en el proceso. Añadió. La directora de Immujer recordó que la violencia hacia la mujer puede darse desde diferentes aristas, desde la mediática, digital, violencia vicaria, obstétrica, psicológica, física, sexual, patrimonial, por citar algunos. Una vez que se les da el contexto de información, dijo, también se concientizará sobre los escenarios donde cada modalidad de violencia se da con la finalidad de sensibilizar a las y los funcionarios públicos. “Al identificar...

title: تقسيط يصل إلى 60,000 ريال احصل على خصومات حتى 300 ريال في عروض اليوم الوطني من اكسترا على أحدث الجوالات
creator: نورا جمعه
content: تقدم “اكسترا” في اليوم الوطني عروض مميزة على أحدث الهواتف المحمولة، مما يتيح لك فرصة الحصول على جهاز أحلامك بأفضل الأسعار تبدأ الخصومات من 70 ريال وتصل حتى 300 ريال، مما يضمن لك شراء هاتف مميز بسعر مخفض مع عروض التقسيط التي تصل إلى 60,000 ريال وبدون دفعة أولى أو تحويل راتب، يمكنك الآن امتلاك هاتف جديد بسهولة وسداد قيمته على مدى 36 شهراً. عروض اكسترا لليوم الوطني على الجوالات تأتي عروض اكسترا بمناسبة اليوم الوطني على مجموعة مميزة من الهواتف، وتتيح لك الترقية إلى أحدث الأجهزة بأسعار لا تقارن. يمكنك الحصول على هواتف مثل Nokia وLenovo وMotorola بأسعار خاصة وبأكبر نسبة خصم، بالإضافة إلى توفر خيارات عديدة مثل أجهزة iPhone وSamsung التي تشمل عروضاً مغرية أيضا. عروض اليوم الوطني على الإكسسوارات لا تقتصر العروض على الهواتف فقط، بل تمتد أيضا لتشمل ملحقات الهواتف مثل السماعات اللاسلكية من Apple وBeats وسماعات البلوتوث من Huawei وSamsung إلى جانب ذلك، توجد عروض مذهلة على مكبرات الصوت من JBL وغيرها من الملحقات التي تكمل تجربتك التكنولوجية. إذا كنت تبحث عن فرصة مميزة لشراء هاتف جديد أو إكسسوارات متميزة، فإن عروض اكسترا لليوم الوطني هي الخيار الأمثل لك احصل على أحدث الأجهزة بأسعار تنافسية واستفد من برامج التقسيط المريحة التي توفرها اكسترا لتسهيل عملية الشراء، مما يتيح لك اقتناء ما تريده بسهولة ودون عبء مالي كبير.

title: FBI指川普在高球場似遭企圖暗殺 持槍者逃離後被補
content: 〔中央社〕共和黨總統候選人川普今天下午在佛羅里達州的高爾夫球場打球,現場傳出槍響。執法人員說,特勤看到川普附近有持槍者而開槍,持槍者已被逮。美國聯邦調查局朝企圖暗殺川普調查。川普平安。 美國有線電視新聞網(CNN)報導,聯邦調查局(FBI)人員已在佛州調查這起「看似企圖暗殺」川普的事件。 請繼續往下閱讀... 美聯社報導,川普下午在佛羅里達州棕櫚灘郡(Palm Beach County)西棕櫚灘(West Palm Beach)的高爾夫球場打球。特勤人員在川普前方幾個洞巡邏,發現一名持槍者,當持槍者將步槍的槍口推出圍籬時,特勤人員開了槍。 美媒報導,這名持槍者藉由一輛休旅車逃離。執法人員在現場發現一把AK樣式的步槍。佛州馬丁郡(Martin County)警長史奈德(William Snyder)指出,警方在北上的95號州際公路攔下一輛車,帶走駕駛,據信是該名持槍者。 史奈德說,當時車上只有一人,他被捕時冷靜,沒有表現出什麼情緒。 根據報導,這起事件發生在下午約2時前。川普透過簡單聲明指出,他安全無恙,沒有任何事情能阻止他,他絕不會投降。 川普7月13日在賓州巴特勒郡(Butler County)造勢演講時遭一男子開槍,右耳被子彈擦傷。槍手連開8槍,造成一死、2重傷,隨後被維安人員擊斃。(編輯:何宏儒)1130916 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: JUST-IN: Dangote Denies Sale Of Petrol To NNPCL At N898/Litre
creator: Bode Gbadebo and Leadership News
content: Dangote Refinery has denied a claim credited to the spokesperson of the Nigerian National Petroleum Company Limited (NNPCL), Olufemi Soneye, that it was selling Premium Motor Spirit (PMS), commonly known as Petrol, to the oil company at N898 per litre. Dangote said the claim, which has caused frenzy among Nigerians, was not only misleading and mischievous, but deliberately aimed at undermining the milestone achievement recorded on Sunday, September 15, 2024, towards addressing energy insufficiency and insecurity, which has bedeviled Nigeria in the last five decades. Media reports (not LEADERSHIP) credited to Soneye on Sunday had claimed that NNPCL had started loading petrol from Dangote Refinery in Lagos at the cost of N898 per litre. But, Dangote Refinery, through a statement signed by the Dangote Group’s Chief Branding and Communications Officer, Anthony Chiejina, on Sunday night, urged Nigerians to disregard the ‘malicious statement’ and await a formal announcement on the pricing of its product. “Our attention has been drawn to a statement attributed to NNPCL spokesperson, Mr. Olufemi Soneye, that we sell our PMS at N898 per litre to the NNPCL. “This statement is both misleading and mischievous, deliberately aimed at undermining the milestone achievement recorded today, September 15, 2024, towards addressing energy insufficiency and insecurity, which has bedeviled the economy in the past 50 years. “We urge Nigerians to disregard this malicious statement and await a formal...

title: Gallagher Scores In Atletico Madrid’s 3-0 Home win Against Valencia
creator: James Agberebi
content: Former Chelsea midfielder Conor Gallagher opened his goals account for Atletico Madrid in their 3-0 win against Valencia in La Liga on Sunday. Featuring in his third game for Diego Simeone’s side, Gallagher gave Atletico the lead in the 39th minute. Picked for his second competitive start for Atletico, Gallagher latched onto a beautifully weighted through ball from Rodrigo De Paul and fired under Giorgi Mamardashvili to open the scoring. Also on target his another former Premier League star Julian Alvarez who like Gallagher, joined Atletico Madrid in the summer. Alvarez scored in the 94th minute to make it 3-0 for the home team while Antoine Griezmann made it 2-0 on 54 minutes. The win meant Atletico Madrid moved up the Liga table, level on 11 points with Real Madrid and Villarreal on the same day that leaders Barcelona thrashed Girona 4-1.

title: Caitlin Clark bate su récord anotador y ya es la novata que más puntos ha metido en la WNBA
creator: Nacho Duque
content: Caitlin Clark sigue rompiendo récords en su primera temporada en la WNBA. La base de las Indiana Fever ha superado el tope de puntos de una novata en su estreno en la competición y suma ya 761. Con un triple -como no podía ser de otra manera- en el tercer cuarto de su partido ante las Dallas Wings, llegó a los 746 puntos, superando el anterior registro, en poder de Seimone Augustus (744) desde hacía 18 años. En ese encuentro, ganado por las Fever por 110-109, Clark acabó con 35 puntos, el máximo de su carrera, con 6/14 en triples, ocho asistencias y tres recuperaciones. En la historia de la WNBA nunca se habían visto esas estadísticas. Suyas son las siete mejores anotaciones de esta campaña entre las novatas. La prodigiosa base de las Fever acumula esas y otro sinfín de marcas en su primer curso entre las profesionales. Hace unos días batió el récord de asistencias en una temporada. No el de una rookie, que lo superó hace tiempo (247) sino el general. Tras el partido de este domingo acumula ya 329, más que las 316 que en su día repartió Alyssa Thomas. En un sólo encuentro, Clark llegó a dar 19, récord absoluto de la WNBA. También es ya la novata con más triples de la historia. Suma 120, a ocho del registro total establecido por Sabrina Ionescu la temporada pasada. A falta de un solo partido de temporada regular, lo tiene complicado. Lo que sí hizo Clark fue batir el de triples anotados en un encuentro siendo novata: le hizo siete a las Washington...

title: NASCAR Fans Slam Austin Dillon After Christopher Bell Crash - 'Needs A Lifetime Ban'
content: NASCAR fans have been quick to express their ire towards Austin Dillon following a dramatic collision with Christopher Bell during the Go Bowling at The Glen race at Watkins Glen. The incident occurred on lap 62 of the 90-lap NASCAR Cup Series race, sparking an immediate and explosive reaction from the fanbase on social media. Dillon, who was racing aggressively, crashed into the back of Bell, causing the latter's no.20 to spin out and ultimately head into pit road. One fan wasn't holding back, posting to social media: "Austin Dillon is such a f***ing joke. Took out Bell for what reason? Dillon sucks at everything. He's a joke. Another fan remarked: "Unless Christopher Bell didn't give any indication he was pitting, there was no reason for Austin Dillon to divebomb him in the final corner and turn him." title: «Я готов...» Джошуа признался, за кого будет болеть в реванше Усик – Фьюри
content: Бывший чемпион мира Энтони Джошуа высказался о своем возможном сопернике после Даниэля Дюбуа. ЭйДжей подерется с Дюбуа 21 сентября за титул IBF. «Если Усик или Фьюри вызовут меня драться, то я на 100% готов. Это то, что я делаю. Борьба. Я буду готов. Это будет честь драться с ними двумя. Я сейчас не акцентирую внимания на Усике и Фьюри. Я буду смотреть их бой. Позвольте мне сначала победить Дюбуа. Посмотрим. Я думаю, что Усик победит в реванше с Фьюри, и я хочу, чтобы Усик победил. Я просто готов драться с любым. Мы все здесь, чтобы выполнять работу. Мы все здесь как воины, чтобы сражаться друг с другом», – сказал Джошуа. Ранее промоутер Энтони Джошуа Эдди Хирн высказался о возможной трилогии британца с чемпионом мира по версиям WBA, WBO, IBO и WBC Александром Усиком.

title: Харрис: я рада, что Трамп в безопасности
content: Вице-президент США и соперник Дональда Трампа на выборах президента Камала Харрис прокомментировала предполагаемое покушение на республиканца. Она заявила, что в США нет места насилию. «Меня проинформировали о сообщениях о стрельбе рядом с бывшим президентом Трампом и его собственности во Флориде, и я рада, что он в безопасности»,— написала госпожа Харрис в соцсети X. Стрельба произошла возле гольф-клуба Дональда Трампа, когда тот был на поле. По информации американских СМИ, мужчина целился в сторону клуба из винтовки. Секретная служба США открыла огонь, после чего подозреваемый скрылся. Позднее его задержали. ФБР предполагает , что на республиканца было совершено покушение. Господин Трамп не пострадал. В середине июля бывший президент пережил покушение — его ранили в ухо из огнестрельного оружия на митинге в Пенсильвании. Погиб один из участников митинга, еще двое получили ранения. Открывший стрельбу был убит снайпером Секретной службы США. Леонид Уварчев

title: ŠAMPION VEĆ PROSIPA BODOVE Inter jedva izbegao poraz u Monci
content: Fudbaleri Monce i Intera odigrali su nerešeno 1:1 u utakmici četvrtog kola italijanske Serije A. Monca je povela u 81. minutu, kada je Mota fenomenalno skočio i glavom psotigao gol za vođstvo domaćeg tima i oduševljenje navijača. Delovalo je da će aktuelni šampion doživeti prvi poraz, ali je to sprečio Denzel Damfris u 88. minutu, kada je na asistenciju Karlosa Augusta smestio loptu u mrežu za 1:1. Ovo je Interu već drugi remi u prvenstvu i deluje da tim Simonea Inzagija nije najbolje ušao u novu sezonu. Inter se nalazi na drugom mestu sa osam bodova, jednim manje od vodećeg Napolija. Italijanskog šampiona sada očekuje premijera u novom formatu Lige šampiona i gostovanje Mančester sitiju. Za više sportskih informacija, zapratite našu Fejsbuk stranicu .

title: Chivas Femenil separó a este par de jugadoras
content: En pleno día de Clásico Nacional, las Chivas Femenil tomaron la decisión de separar a dos de sus jugadoras . Se trata de la estelar Carolina Jaramillo y Yamile Franco , quienes habrían incumplido con el reglamento interno del equipo y a causa de esto se perderán el duelo contra el América de este domingo. "El Club Deportivo Guadalajara informa que las jugadoras Carolina Jaramillo y Yamile Franco incumplieron con el código de conducta y serán sancionadas de acuerdo al reglamento interno del equipo , por tal motivo no fueron consideradas en la convocatoria para El Clásico de México, correspondiente a la Jornada 10 del Apertura 2024", reza el comunicado emitido por Chivas. Será este domingo a las 17:00 horas, tiempo del centro del país, cuando el Rebaño visite al América en la cancha de la Ciudad de los Deportes . SV

title: Bonga se nasmejao na pitanje o Obradoviću VIDEO
content: Crno-beli su košem Brendana Dejvisa u poslednjoj sekundi došli do trijumfa protiv još jedne evroligaške ekipe. Upravo to je Bonga istakao posle meča. " Bilo je teško kao da je Evroliga. Mislim da je bio dobar timski napor, drago mi je da smo dobili. Ovaj mentalitet je važan, važno je da Evroligu igramo sa ovim mentalitetom. Nema veze što je prijateljska utakmica, moramo uvek imati isti pristup" , rekao je Bonga. Istakao je da tim raste i da ima potencijal. "Definitivno idemo ka nečemu, svaki dan se sve više upoznajemo. Izgledamo sve bolje i bolje iz meča u meč se znamo bolje. Vidimo potencijal toga kako dobri možemo biti" , ističe Bonga. "Ovo je nešto što ne možete samo kupiti, zalaganje morate pokazati svaki posed. Kada igrate tako vaš tim dobija". Na kraju je upitan šta misli o Željku Obradoviću, a on je uz osmeh odgovorio: "Veoma detaljan lik. Svaki put na treninzima pričamo o detaljima. To nas čini da pravimo zaista velike korake u unapređenju svoje igre", zaključio je Bonga. Podeli:

title: 1歳児「早くここに飯置いて」→ ありえない“奇跡のポーズ”に爆笑! “人生何週目?”な姿に「社長!!」「かっけぇ~~~」
content: 人生何週目......? なんとも貫禄のある赤ちゃんの姿がX(Twitter)で話題です。 投稿者は、1歳の男の子を育てるXユーザーのさな( @sanasena1207 )さん。「早くここに飯置いて」というせりふとともに、息子くんの写真を公開しました。 子ども用の椅子に座った息子くんは、テーブルに片肘をついて手をほおに当てています。もう片方の手はぞんざいにテーブルの上を指さしており、確かに「早く置いて!」と命令しているように見えますね。 息子くんの口はきゅっとむすばれており、ポーズと表情が相まって“偉い立場の人”にも見えてきます。 ふてぶてしくもキュートなこの1枚に、Xでは「社長!!」「かっけぇ~~~しびれます」「イイね! 貫禄ある」「はっすいませんっ! って反射で謝ってしまいそう」「きゃわすぎる」となごむ声が寄せられています。 画像提供:さな( @sanasena1207 )さん Copyright © ITmedia, Inc. title: Diện mạo mới của Becamex Bình Dương
content: Sau hơn 10 năm, HLV Hoàng Anh Tuấn mới tìm lại được cảm xúc khó tả khi cầm quân ở V-League. Với sự dẫn dắt của chiến lược gia quê Khánh Hòa này, B.Bình Dương đã mang một diện mạo mới qua đấu pháp chiến thuật hiện đại, đạt hiệu quả cao bên cạnh khả năng săn bàn nhạy bén của tiền đạo Nguyễn Tiến Linh. Dấu ấn "thầy Tuấn" Nhận lời dẫn dắt B.Bình Dương với nhiệm vụ đưa đội bóng trở lại đỉnh cao trên bản đồ bóng đá Việt Nam, HLV Hoàng Anh Tuấn được sự hậu thuẫn tích cực về nhiều mặt. Ở khía cạnh nhân lực, nhiều học trò từng sát cánh cùng ông trong màu áo tuyển U20 Việt Nam thi đấu tại World Cup U20 năm 2017 đã tề tựu về Bình Dương để chinh phục mục tiêu mới. Ông Tuấn bày tỏ: "Dù vẫn theo dõi sát sao những giải đấu quốc nội nhưng tôi thật khó diễn tả cảm xúc trong lần trở lại V-League. Tôi đã có sự chuẩn bị tốt để B.Bình Dương sẵn sàng cho những thử thách, nhất là khi trận đầu tiên của giải bao giờ cũng rất khó khăn". Đặc biệt đề cao tính an toàn, hàng tứ vệ của B.Bình Dương được xây dựng với các cầu thủ tên tuổi, gồm: cặp trung vệ Quế Ngọc Hải, Janclesio và 2 hậu vệ tuyển quốc gia Minh Trọng, Tấn Tài. Hệ thống phòng ngự chặt chẽ, bọc lót tốt cho nhau giúp...

title: Lukaku sparks resurgent Napoli in Serie A
creator: Daniella Matar
content: Napoli may have a new hero in Romelu Lukaku. The Belgium striker set up two goals and also scored as Napoli won 4-0 at Cagliari on Sunday for their third straight victory in the Italian league. Defending champions Inter Milan narrowly avoided a first defeat of the season as they salvaged a 1-1 draw at Monza. There are positive signs that, under new coach Antonio Conte, Napoli are starting to look more like the team that stormed to the league title in 2023 and less like the troubled side of last season. One of the stars of that team was the now departed Victor Osimhen and he was replaced by Lukaku - reuniting him with Conte after the pair won Serie A at Inter in 2021. "I strongly wanted Romelu, as I always have throughout my career, because we're talking about an atypical player," Conte said. "He's not yet at his top level but he's a player who will become fundamental for us." Conte lost his first league match in charge but Napoli have won all three since then, scoring nine goals and conceding just one. Lukaku scored on his debut last time out and was given his first start for Napoli on Sunday. He proved dangerous from the start and set up the opener in the 18th minute, rolling Matteo Politano's cutback across the area to Giovanni Di Lorenzo, whose effort was deflected by Cagliari defender Yerry Mina. The match had to be suspended for around eight minutes in the first half because of crowd trouble. Napoli had Alex Meret to thank for keeping them in the lead as the goalkeeper...

title: Consejos para elegir la Afore con mejor rendimiento según tu perfil
creator: David Arvizu
content: MÉXICO.- Elegir la Afore adecuada es una de las decisiones financieras más importantes para asegurar un futuro financiero estable. El rendimiento de tu Afore puede marcar una gran diferencia en el monto final de tu pensión, por lo que es crucial conocer cómo seleccionar la opción que mejor se adapte a tu perfil y objetivos de largo plazo. El economista Pablo Ramírez , experto en finanzas personales, comparte algunos consejos clave para tomar una decisión informada. Pablo Ramírez comenta: “La Afore que elijas no solo debe ofrecer los mejores rendimientos, sino que también debe alinearse con tu tolerancia al riesgo, tu edad y tus expectativas para la jubilación. Una buena selección puede aumentar de manera significativa los ahorros acumulados.” Uno de los primeros pasos para elegir una Afore es revisar los rendimientos históricos que han ofrecido las distintas administradoras. El rendimiento es el factor que define cuánto crecerán tus ahorros con el tiempo, por lo que es importante seleccionar una Afore que haya tenido un desempeño constante en los últimos años. El gobierno de México, a través de la Comisión Nacional del Sistema de Ahorro para el Retiro ( CONSAR ), publica periódicamente un ranking con los rendimientos de las diferentes Afores, lo que facilita esta comparación. Ramírez aconseja: “Es esencial enfocarse en el rendimiento neto, que considera los ingresos por la inversión de tus ahorros menos las comisiones que cobra la Afore.” Las...

title: Baraja: "La situación es compleja y no vamos a salir en un partido o dos"
creator: PABLO EGEA
content: l técnico del Valencia, Rubén Baraja, estaba disgustado por la derrota y también por el partido. Reconoció que su equipo no había tenido continuidad en el juego y que acabó condenado por sus propios errores. Baraja sigue insistiendo en que hay que reaccionar y que la reacción llegará con trabajo. "La realidad es que, aunque el calendario haya sido complicado, hay que asumir la que situación es compleja y no vamos a salir en un partido o dos, se alargará en el tiempo. Si no das la cara y no das un buen nivel, es difícil cambiarlo. Debemos ver el partido, sacar las cosas positivas y pensar en el siguiente partido. "Es un campo muy difícil, no me ha gustado cómo se ha producido la derrota, le dimos vida al Atlético, pero no nos tiene que afectar, esta no es nuestra Liga, hay que asumirlo. Nunca hemos ganado en este estadio y debemos sacar que aquí hay que hacer las cosa muy bien para tener opciones y si no estás, si además das opciones al rival, es muy complicado". "¿Cómo me va a gustar si hemos perdido 3-0? Hay algunas cosas positivas, pero esta derrota me duele por el resultado y sobre todo por cómo se ha propiciado. Tenemos un punto de quince y hay que asumirlo y tratar de cambiar la situación. Para ello debemos jugar mejor que hoy. El balón nos quemaba, no dimos pases... El equipo necesita más energía". "Si analizas el partido el equipo no ha tenido continuidad, como no la tuvimos en Bilbao, pero sí en Villarreal. Hoy no estuvimos bien, el Atlético...

title: "Sram te bilo! Trudna sa psihijatrijskim lekovima": Marija vrišti na Miljanu zbog trudnoće, ona na ivici suza
creator: Aleksandra Šćekić
content: Rijaliti učesnica Miljana Kulić je večeras obavila test za trudnoću u "Eliti" , nakon čega joj je produkcija omogućila poziv sa roditeljima. U trenutku kada je Miljana pokušavala da se obratila svojoj majci, Mariji Kulić , reakcija nije bila onakva kakvu je očekivala. - Mama javi se molim te - kukala je Miljana. Miljani se nije javio ni bivši dečko Zola. - Je l znaš kako se zoveš? Znaš li gde si bila celo leto, šta su ti prepisali, šta si pila? Raduješ se trudnoći sa psihijatrijskim lekovima. Zbog tebe da se rađa bolesno dete - rekla je Marija. Podsetimo, Miljana je radila test na trudnoću. - Da li sam trudna? - upitala je Miljana. - Da, da - vikale su zadrugarke koje su videle dve crte na testu. - Trudna sam. Sa Zolom, sa kim drugo - otkrila je Miljana. - Isto je bilo i meni - rekla je Aneli. (Telegraf.rs)

title: FBI geht von mutmasslichem Attentat auf Trump aus
creator: Agentur sda
content: Das teilte das FBI nach dem Vorfall im US-Bundesstaat Florida mit, wie US-Medien übereinstimmend berichteten. Laut Secret Service befindet sich Trump in Sicherheit und ist unverletzt. Die Polizei hat bereits einen Verdächtigen festgenommen. Auf einer Autobahn in der Nähe des Tatorts Palm Beach sei ein Auto gestoppt und der Fahrer in Gewahrsam genommen worden, sagte William D. Snyder von der zuständigen Polizei. Der Verdächtige habe ruhig und gelassen gewirkt. Am Ort des Geschehens sei in Büschen unter anderem ein Sturmgewehr des Typs AK-47 mit Zielfernrohr sowie eine Kamera gefunden worden, hiess es von der Polizei. Trump nach Angaben ausser Gefahr Trump selbst befindet sich nach offiziellen Angaben mittlerweile ausser Gefahr. Ein Sprecher des Secret Service teilte mit, der Ex-Präsident sei nach einem «Vorfall» in Sicherheit. Dieser habe sich am Sonntag kurz vor 14.00 Uhr (Ortszeit) ereignet. Den Angaben nach spielte Trump zur Zeit des Vorfalls Golf in seinem Klub in West Palm Beach im US-Bundesstaat Florida. Der Secret Service hat den Behörden zufolge Schüsse in Richtung des Verdächtigen abgefeuert. Der Secret Service ist in den USA für den Schutz ranghoher Politiker zuständig, darunter amtierende und frühere Präsidenten. title: Bombshell poll shows Kamala Harris within striking distance of Trump in deep red state
content: Bombshell poll shows Kamala Harris within striking distance of Trump in deep red state READ MORE: FBI shares pictures of rifle, backpack and GoPro 'assassin' had hidden in the bushes while lying in wait for Trump on his Florida golf course By Alex Hammer and Stephen M. Lepore For Dailymail.Com Published: 22:40 BST, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 22:44 BST, 15 September 2024 e-mail View comments Kamala Harris is closing the gap with former President Donald Trump in Iowa , new polling numbers show. The survey conducted by the Des Moines Register and Mediacom Iowa was published Sunday, and shows Harris just four points behind her Republican rival. Perhaps even more shockingly, the survey was taken September 8 to 11, days before Trump's debate against Harris that many in the media are convinced Harris won. This comes after Trump handedly won the same poll in 2016 in the same state by nearly 10 points, and again in 2020 by more than 8 points. Both times, the survey proved prophetic, with the GOP frontrunner winning the swing state by a narrow margin. Kamala Harris is closing the gap with former President Donald Trump in Iowa , new polling numbers show Perhaps even more shockingly, the survey was taken September 8 to 11, days before Trump's debate against Harris that many in the media are convinced Harris won Barack Obama is the only Democrat to win the presidential race in Iowa since Al Gore in 2000. No Democrat aside from Obama has won statewide since Tom Harkin was dragged over...

title: Trump golf course shooting raises security concerns as suspect 'fled in SUV' after Secret Service opened fire
creator: Reanna Smith
content: A shooting close to Donald Trump at his Palm Beach golf course has as the suspect reportedly fled the scene in an SUV after Secret Service agents opened fire. Secret Service agents who'd been one or two holes ahead of Trump at the golf club opened fire after spotting a man pointing an AK-style rifle through a fence and into the club at around 1.30pm Sunday, officials confirmed in a press conference. The person dropped the weapon and managed to flee in an SUV. Law enforcement officials confirmed a witness spotted the suspect running out of bushes near the golf course. The witness took a picture of the vehicle and noted its license plate. Police were able to get a hit on the vehicle on the I-95 heading into Martin County and pulled it over, taking the man into custody. A Secret Service spokesperson said agents "were able to engage" with the suspect but couldn't confirm whether the suspect was able to take a shot at Secret Service agents. Trump was between 300-500 yards away from the incident, which Palm Beach County Sherriff Ric Bradshaw noted "with a rifle and a scope like that, that's not a long distance." When questioned how the incident was allowed to happen, Sherriff Bradshaw said: "You gotta understand the golf course is surrounded by shrubbery so when somebody gets into the shrubbery they're pretty much out of sight and at this level that he is at right now, he's not the sitting president. If he was we would have had the entire golf course surrounded but because he's...

title: Gian Piero Díaz muestra terrible lesión en su pierna: “Toca cirugía en estos días y una larga recuperación”
creator: Redacción Farándula
content: El conductor de televisión Gian Piero Díaz reveló que sufrió una grave lesión en su pierna. A través de su cuenta de Instagram , Díaz compartió una foto de su extremidad lesionada y confirmó que necesitará una cirugía para recuperarse. Mira también: Tomás Angulo SEPULTA “amistad” con Magaly: “El juicio seguirá, yo no vuelvo hablar de esa señora” Deyvis Orosco alarma al aparecer sin anillo de matrimonio tras videollamada a Andrea San Martín y explica sus motivos El incidente habría ocurrido durante un partido de fútbol, donde Díaz sufrió una lesión que requirió atención médica inmediata. A pesar del dolor y la situación, el conductor mantuvo un tono positivo y humorístico en sus redes sociales. Gian Piero Díaz muestra terrible lesión en su pierna ¡Fuera de las canchas por un buen tiempo! ¡Fuera de la chamba por un buen tiempo tb! El pie ya está en su sitio y toca cirugía en estos días; luego un largo proceso de recuperación. Así que a ponerle ganas y tratar de caminar lo antes posible. PD. ¡Vendo chimpunes y una sola media, tuvieron que cortar la otra! Ja, ja, ja. ¡Les voy contando como me va!”, escribió Díaz en su publicación. La noticia generó una ola de apoyo de sus seguidores y de varias figuras de la farándula, quienes le han deseado una pronta recuperación. La lesión ha obligado a Díaz a alejarse temporalmente de sus actividades profesionales y deportivas. Gian Piero Díaz mostró como quedó su pierna. Gian Piero Díaz niega...

title: ‘రివర్స్‌’ రివర్సయింది!
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: గన్‌ ప్రభుత్వం అట్టహాసంగా తీసుకొచ్చిన రివర్స్‌ టెండరింగ్‌ విధానాన్ని టీడీపీ కూటమి ప్రభుత్వం రివర్స్‌లోకి నెట్టింది. మళ్లీ 2003 నాటి జీవో 94ను అమల్లోకి తెచ్చింది. తక్కువ ధరకు పనులు పూర్తి చేస్తామంటూ లిఖితపూర్వకంగా వేసే బిడ్లను ఆమోదించే ప్రక్రియను తీసుకొచ్చింది. టెండర్‌లో పాల్గొన్న కాంట్రాక్టు సంస్థల్లో ఎల్‌-1గా ఉన్న సంస్థకు పనులు అప్పగించే విధానాన్ని అమలు చేస్తామంటూ గత నెలలో జరిగిన భేటీలో రాష్ట్ర కేబినెట్‌ తీర్మానాన్ని ఆమోదించిన సంగతి తెలిసిందే. పోలవరం ప్రాజెక్టులో రివర్స్‌ టెండర్‌ విధానంతో ఏకంగా రూ.860 కోట్లు ఆదా చేశామంటూ జగన్‌ ప్రభుత్వం ప్రచారం చేసుకుంది. కానీ వాస్తవాన్ని పరిశీలిస్తే ఈ రివర్స్‌ టెండర్‌లో పనులు పొందిన కాంట్రాక్టు సంస్థకు తెరవెనుక కట్టబెట్టిందే ఎక్కువని తేలింది. చంద్రబాబు ప్రభుత్వం ఇప్పుడు వీటిన్నిటినీ పరిశీలించి.. రివర్స్‌ టెండర్‌ విధానాన్ని సమీక్షించింది. ఇదే సమయంలో రాష్ట్ర చీఫ్‌ ఇంజనీర్ల బోర్డు కూడా రివర్స్‌ టెండర్‌ విధానం రద్దుకు సిఫారసు చేస్తూ గత నెల 8న ప్రభుత్వానికి నివేదిక సమర్పించింది. ఈ నేపథ్యంలో గత నెలలో జరిగిన మంత్రివర్గ సమావేశంలో రివర్స్‌ టెండర్‌ విధానాన్ని రద్దు చేయాలన్న జల వనరుల శాఖ ప్రతిపాదనను ఆమోదించారు. దీంతో.. 2003 జూలై ఒకటో తేదీన జారీ చేసిన జీవో 94 మేరకు టెండర్‌ విధానాన్ని అమల్లోకి తెస్తూ జల వనరుల శాఖ ప్రత్యేక ప్రధాన కార్యదర్శి జి.సాయిప్రసాద్‌ ఆదివారం ఉత్తర్వు జారీ చేశారు.

title: वाराणसी दौरे पर पीएम मोदी का जन्मदिन मनाएंगे सीएम योगी:कानून व्यवस्था की समीक्षा करेंगे सीएम, सारनाथ की परियोजनाएं परखेंगे, कल काशी विश्वनाथ जाएंगे
content: मुख्यमंत्री योगी आदित्यनाथ आज दो दिवसीय दौरे पर वाराणसी आएंगे। सीएम अपने दौरे में वाराणसी में कानून व्यवस्था की समीक्षा करेंगे। विकास कार्यों के रात्रि कालीन निरीक्षण के साथ सीएम काशी विश्वनाथ मंदिर और काल भैरव में दर्शन पूजन करेंगे। सीएम विभिन्न कार्यक्रमों में शामिल होकर पीएम मोदी का जन्मोत्सव बनाएंगे, वहीं काशी विश्वनाथ में 74 किलो लड्‌डुओं का केक काटेंगे। सीएम का मिनट टू मिनट कार्यक्रम मिलने के बाद पुलिस और प्रशासनिक अफसरों ने तैयारियां पूरी कर ली, वहीं विभागवार समीक्षा रिपोर्ट भी तैयार की गई है। मुख्यमंत्री योगी आदित्यनाथ सोमवार की शाम करीब 6 बजे त्रिपुरा से काशी आएंगे। बाबतपुर एयरपोर्ट से सर्किट हाउस पहुंचकर सीएम सबसे पहले जनप्रतिनिधियों और भाजपा नेताओं से मुलाकात करेंगे और इसके बाद विकास कार्यों और कानून व्यवस्था की समीक्षा करेंगे। प्रशासन के मुताबिक सीएम रात आठ बजे रात्रिकालीन निरीक्षण पर निकलेंगे और कचहरी-आशापुर संदहा मार्ग की प्रगति जानेंगे। इसके बाद सीएम सारनाथ की निर्माणाधीन प्रो-पुअर टूरिज्म परियोजना का निरीक्षण करेंगे। रात 9 बजे सीएम सारनाथ संग्रहालय पहुंचेंगे और सारंगनाथ महादेव मंदिर पुर्नविकास परियोजना को जांचेंगे। इसके अलावा सारनाथ में चल रहे सभी विकास कार्यों का जायजा लेकर 10.30 बजे सर्किट हाउस लौटेंगे। सारनाथ सहित अन्य क्षेत्रों में हो रहे विकास कार्यों का मुख्यमंत्री स्थलीय निरीक्षण कर सकते हैं। 17 को जन्मदिन के कार्यक्रमाें में होंगे शामिल, काशी विश्वनाथ में काटेंगे केक सीएम योगी आदित्यनाथ प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी का जन्मदिन काशी में मनाएंगे। प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी के जन्मदिन पर भारतीय जनता पार्टी की ओर से आयोजित कार्यक्रम में शामिल होंगे। सुबह...

title: Gardner Minshew rallies Raiders past Ravens 26-23 with 3 fourth-quarter scoring drives
creator: DAVID GINSBURG, Associated Press

title: Gardner Minshew rallies Raiders past Ravens 26-23 with 3 fourth-quarter scoring drives
content: BALTIMORE (AP) — Gardner Minshew led three scoring drives in the fourth quarter, Daniel Carlson kicked a go-ahead 38-yard field goal with 27 seconds left and the Las Vegas Raiders rallied to beat the Baltimore Ravens 26-23 on Sunday. Baltimore appeared headed toward its first win of the season after Derrick Henry plowed into the end zone for a 23-13 lead with 12 minutes left. But the Raiders (1-1) stormed back behind Minshew. After Carlson kicked a 25-yarder to cut Las Vegas' deficit, Minshew connected with Davante Adams on a 1-yard TD pass to tie it with 3:54 to go. The Raiders quickly got the ball back and Minshew moved Las Vegas downfield before Carlson kicked his fourth field goal of the game. Seeking to bounce back from a harrowing 27-20 loss to the two-time defending champion Kansas City Chiefs, the Ravens instead dropped to 0-2 for the first time since 2015. Minshew went 30 for 38 for 276 yards. He was sacked five times and intercepted once, but none of that mattered as he led the Raiders to a stunning comeback on the road. Baltimore's Lamar Jackson completed 21 of 34 passes for 247 yards. He was limited to 20 yards rushing after amassing 122 on the ground against the Chiefs. Henry rushed for 84 yards and a score. Signed as a free agent during the offseason to bolster Baltimore's running game, Henry finally looked like a four-time Pro Bowler in the second half. Two plays after peeling off a 17-yard run to the Las Vegas 6, Henry took a direct snap and ran straight...

title: На Украине за прошедшие сутки сожгли 4 релейных шкафа и 3 военных автомобиля
content: Украинское издание «Страна.ua» сообщило, что за прошедшие сутки на территории страны совершены четыре поджога релейных шкафов и три поджога автомобилей военных. По информации издания, были уничтожены релейные шкафы, обеспечивающие функционирование железной дороги. Они произошли в Днепропетровской, Харьковской и Черниговской областях. Все три автомобиля были сожжены в городе Кропивницкий.

title: Udham Singh Nagar News: जसपुर में निकाली मूर्ति विसर्जन शोभायात्रा
creator: संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी, ऊधम सिंह नगर

title: Luke Littler beats Michael Smith to win World Series of Darts Finals
content: Luke Littler continued his meteoric rise by winning the Jack’s World Series of Darts Finals with a crushing victory over Michael Smith in Amsterdam. The teenager powered to an 11-4 triumph in Sunday night’s final after seeing off home favourite Michael van Gerwen by the same scoreline in his semi-final hours earlier. Former world champion Smith took an early 2-1 lead in the final but checkouts of 140 and 130 turned the match around. Smith hit back to level at 3-3 but the momentum was with Littler, who reeled off seven successive legs to open up a 10-3 advantage. Smith briefly rallied with a 170 checkout but Littler soon finished off matters to claim his third World Series title after successes in Bahrain and Poland earlier this year. Littler told pdc.tv: “This time last year I was playing on the Development Tour; my name was getting mentioned but after the World Championship everyone knew who I was. “I’m going to keep building on this and winning more. It’s a busy schedule coming up and I’m ready for it.”

title: Sahayı sedye ile terk etmişti: Trabzonspor'dan Cihan Çanak açıklaması
content: 16 Eylül 2024 00:44 Trendyol Süper Lig'in 5. haftasında Trabzonspor sahasında Beşiktaş ile 1-1 berabere kaldı. İkinci yarı oyuna giren Cihan Çanak, Felix Udokhai ile girdiği pozisyonda başına darde aldı. 19 yaşındaki oyuncu maça devam edemedi. Genç oyuncu 90+2'de oyundan çıktı. Trabzonspor, Cihan Çanak'a yapılan kontrollerde oyuncuda bir şey çıkmadığını açıkladı. Bordo mavililerin açıklamasında, " Futbol A Takımımızın Trendyol Süper Lig’in 5. haftasında evimizde Beşiktaş ile oynadığı karşılaşma sırasında kafasına aldığı darbe sonrası beyin sarsıntısı (kontüzyon) nedeniyle sakatlanarak oyundan çıkan oyuncumuz Cihan Çanak'ın hastanede yapılan ilk muayene ve görüntüleme tetkikleri sonucunda ciddi bir bulguya rastlanmamıştır " ifadeleri yer aldı.

title: Palou clinches third IndyCar title as Herta passes O’Ward to win finale | IndyCar
creator: Keith Collantine
content: Alex Palou secured his third IndyCar championship despite finishing a lap down in the season finale in Nashville. Advert | Become a Supporter & go ad-free Any intrigue over the outcome of the championship ended after 12 of the 206 laps of Nashville Superspeedway. Will Power, the only driver mathematically capable of beating Palou to the title, had already dropped back five places when he arrived in the pits unexpectedly early. Disastrously, the Penske driver’s seat belts had worked loose. His car sat in the pits for what felt like an eternity, and he eventually finished seven laps adrift. Power’s title hopes were over within minutes of the start Palou took 10th place, securing the title with relative ease. The Ganassi driver, who made his IndyCar debut in 2020, therefore successfully defended the title he won last year, becoming the first driver to win consecutive titles since Dario Franchitti in 2011. He has now won three of the last four IndyCar championships. Kyle Kirkwood led the opening stages of the race, rebuffing the advances of Josef Newgarden. However Felix Rosenqvist behind them crashed out early on due to a deflating tyre, prompting a rush for the pits in which Kirkwood dropped back to 10th. Two more caution periods, triggered by Katherine Legge and Marcus Ericsson respectively, transformed the battle for the lead of the race. David Malukas led into the closing laps, hoping to eke his fuel out in the event of a late caution period, to no avail. Advert | Become a...

title: Cidade de São Paulo segue sem planejamento frente à crise climática
content: Dois atos foram convocados em São Paulo em virtude da emergência climática. O primeiro anuncia em sua chamada: "Não existe luta pelo meio ambiente sem revolta popular". O segundo, divulgado como "Marcha pela Justiça Climática", mobiliza apelos como: "Esse calor não é normal! Não queimem nossas vidas!". Ambos foram marcados para domingos de setembro, no Masp. Os protestos revelam a necessidade de ações urgentes diante da crise climática que avança a olhos vistos. No sábado (14), o renomado climatologista brasileiro Carlos Nobre escreveu um texto para a Folha cujo título não poderia ser mais direto: "Mundo pode não ter mais volta e isso me apavora". Nobre aponta que o aumento progressivo da temperatura do planeta vem ocorrendo em níveis muito acima do esperado. Isso levou ao crescimento exponencial de eventos climáticos extremos como os que vivenciamos hoje no Brasil: ondas de calor, seca, chuvas intensas e incêndios florestais. Em decorrência de tais eventos, fenômenos que parecem saídos de cenários apocalípticos vêm sendo registrados no estado de São Paulo. No dia 11 de setembro, um redemoinho de fumaça ocorreu em Mococa, no interior do estado, assustando moradores. No mesmo dia, foi registrada uma "chuva" de fuligem na zona oeste da capital paulista. "Chuva" vem entre aspas pois o fenômeno não tem nada de úmido, pelo contrário, diz respeito à queda de "floquinhos" de fuligem do céu. Além da necessidade de reduzir a temperatura global, é...

title: Jeremy Corbyn speaks at new Collective party meeting in desperate attempt revive the left
creator: Max Parry
content: The former Labour leader attended a private meeting of a new party that plans to field candidates at the next election.

title: Britain fails to reach Davis Cup Finals last eight after losing to Canada
creator: AP

title: Britain fails to reach Davis Cup Finals last eight after losing to Canada
creator: AP
content: MANCHESTER, England (AP) — Britain failed to qualify for the last eight of the Davis Cup Finals after losing to Canada 2-1 in its last group-stage tie on Sunday, while Novak Djokovic helped Serbia secure a place in next year's qualifiers. The British needed a 3-0 win against the Canadians in Manchester, but Dan Evans lost 6-0, 7-5 to Denis Shapovalov to end Britain's hopes in the opening match in front of a crowd of 15,700 at the AO Arena, the biggest for a Davis Cup tie on British soil, according to organizers. Felix Auger-Aliassime then defeated Jack Draper 7-6 (8), 7-5 to seal Canada's victory and first place in Group D. England won the final doubles match. Evans hinted this may have been his last Davis Cup appearance. “I've probably had my fair share now. It could be and probably will be (the end),” he said. “I need to have a think. If I don't feel capable of playing, I won't come back.” Canada and Argentina advanced from Group D. Finland was the other team eliminated. Four groups have been playing in four cities to qualify for the eight-team Finals in Malaga, Spain, in November. The top two in each four-team group advance. In Valencia, Spain defeated Australia 2-1 to win Group B with both having already qualified. France and the Czech Republic were eliminated. In Bologna, the Netherlands won the closing doubles match to clinch its spot in the Finals despite a 2-1 loss to Italy in Group A. The Dutch needed a single win to advance but had lost the first two matches. The...

In Bologna, the Netherlands won the closing doubles match to clinch its spot in the Finals despite a 2-1 loss to Italy in Group A. The Dutch needed a single win to advance but had lost the first two matches. The...

title: Britain fails to reach Davis Cup Finals last eight after losing to Canada
content: MANCHESTER, England (AP) — Britain failed to qualify for the last eight of the Davis Cup Finals after losing to Canada 2-1 in its last group-stage tie on Sunday, while Novak Djokovic helped Serbia secure a place in next year's qualifiers. The British needed a 3-0 win against the Canadians in Manchester, but Dan Evans lost 6-0, 7-5 to Denis Shapovalov to end Britain's hopes in the opening match in front of a crowd of 15,700 at the AO Arena, the biggest for a Davis Cup tie on British soil, according to organizers. Felix Auger-Aliassime then defeated Jack Draper 7-6 (8), 7-5 to seal Canada's victory and first place in Group D. England won the final doubles match. Evans hinted this may have been his last Davis Cup appearance. “I've probably had my fair share now. It could be and probably will be (the end),” he said. “I need to have a think. If I don't feel capable of playing, I won't come back.” Canada and Argentina advanced from Group D. Finland was the other team eliminated. In Valencia, Spain defeated Australia 2-1 to win Group B with both having already qualified. France and the Czech Republic were eliminated. title: Marsha Mason Steps Into Broadway’s ‘The Roommate’ For Covid-Struck Mia Farrow
creator: Greg Evans
content: Mia Farrow , who just opened with costar Patti LuPone in the hit comedy-drama The Roommate on Broadway , has tested positive for Covid , resulting in two canceled performances Saturday. At this afternoon matinee, actor Marsha Mason , an associate director of the play, stepped in for Farrow. “I was called to step in by the producers while enjoying a lovely Sunday morning in Connecticut, and of course, came right to the City,” said Mason, who has played numerous roles on stage (The Prisoner of Second Avenue), film (The Goodbye Girl) and TV (The Middle). “These moments in the theater are equally exciting and terrifying, and the audience helped make it a fun ride. I was exhilarated to play opposite Patti and especially heartened to be able to pinch hit for my Connecticut dear friend and neighbor, Mia, who is quite marvelous in the role.” The play, which opened this past Thursday night, is directed by Jack O’Brien. As associate director, Mason reportedly had been assisting with Farrow’s performance. According to a statement put out by a production spokesperson following today’s matinee, both Mason and LuPone received standing ovations at the beginning and at the end of the performance. Prior to the performance, a spokesperson said Mason would perform at least partially with script in hand. The play follows two unlikely roommates – LuPone plays a hipster Bronx woman fleeing a multitude of secrets, while Farrow’s character is a straight-as-an-arrow midwestern divorcee enticed by...

title: Харрис обрадовалась, что Трамп не пострадал при стрельбе во Флориде
creator: Вера  Логинова
content: Кандидат в президенты Соединённых Штатов от Демократической партии Камала Харрис после выстрелов рядом с гольф-клубом, где находился её оппонент Дональд Трамп, заявила, что в Соединённых Штатах «нет места насилию». «Меня проинформировали о сообщениях о стрельбе рядом с бывшим президентом Трампом и его собственности во Флориде, и я рада, что он в безопасности. Насилию нет места в Америке», — написала она в соцсети X*. По предварительным данным, сотрудник Секретной службы Соединённых Штатов заметил подозрительного человека с оружием около гольф-клуба во Флориде и открыл огонь. Позже подозреваемый был задержан правоохранителями. Ранее Трамп , что около него произошла стрельба. Он подчеркнул, что не пострадал, а также отметил, что «никогда не сдастся».

title: Rock In Rio 2024: chuva de hits impulsiona show dos Paralamas do Sucesso no 'Dia do Rock'
creator: Estadão Conteúdo
content: Terceira banda a se apresentar neste Rock in Rio que também se exibiu na primeira edição do festival, em 1985, os Paralamas do Sucesso cumpriram o roteiro de memórias: abriram o show no palco Mundo, às 16h50 deste domingo, na Cidade do Rock, com imagens da exibição de quase 40 anos atrás, e a primeira música entoada foi Vital e sua Moto , primeiro sucesso da banda, de 1983. Logo depois o líder Herbert Vianna constatou a passagem do tempo: perguntou ao público quem havia estado no show de janeiro de 1985 e, diante de respostas difusas, concluiu, irônico: "ah, vocês são netos daquelas pessoas!" Mas a viagem no tempo continuou, com hits como Melô do Marinheiro , Uma Brasileira e Alagados , durante a qual citou Viva a sociedade alternativa , de Raul Seixas. Outras das mais antigas ficaram para a reta final do show: Óculos e Meu Erro , que Herbert pareceu cantar com ainda mais disposição. Antes dessa, o músico prestou homenagem a guitarristas estrangeiros e a Lulu Santos, que se apresentou no sábado: "o maior guitarrista que já nasceu nessa parte do planeta", elogiou.

title: Here’s how crews are making progress battling Southern California’s 3 wildfires
content: Crews battling the three large-scale wildfires burning in Southern California continued to make steady gains on Sunday, as more favorable weather conditions helped keep the blazes from growing much further. The acres burned by the Bridge fire in the San Gabriel and San Bernardino Mountains, the Airport fire in Orange and Riverside counties and the Line fire in the San Bernardino Mountains were little changed for the second day in the row, while containment figures in the three blazes grew steadily. With similar weather expected in the coming days, fire officials said they expect to continue making progress while assessing exactly how much damage the massive wildfires have caused. Bridge fire Having spread earlier in the week from San Gabriel Canyon above Glendora into San Bernardino County, the size of the Bridge fire was estimated at 54,033 acres on Sunday — only a slight increase from the 53,783 acre estimate a day earlier. Meanwhile, containment of the fire jumped from 5% on Saturday to 9% on Sunday, with the gains coming on the blaze’s southern flank. Containment is the percentage of a fire’s border that officials believe flames won’t break. The containment gain for the Bridge fire came despite helicopters not being able to operate in the area overnight due to smoke hampering pilots visibility, officials said. Instead, bulldozers and hand crews worked to strengthen the containment lines on the ground. Fire officials described the northwest flank of the fire as being the...

title: ITV forced into broadcast change as Luke Littler makes World Series of Darts finish early
creator: Kealan Hughes
content: ITV were forced to change their schedule after Luke Littler blitzed the World Series of Darts finals. The teenage sensation won his second major championship of the year with a brilliant display in Amsterdam. He swatted aside home favourite Michael van Gerwen before beating Michael Smith in the final to get his hands on the trophy. Each semi-final and the final was best of 21 legs, so ITV prepared by scheduling the broadcast to finish at 10pm. But such was Littler 's display he had things wrapped up before 9:30pm, with ITV forced to show an episode of River Monsters to fill the vacant spot. The darts was meant to be followed by Auf Wiedersehen, Pet, which remained in its 10pm slot. Littler was unstoppable in Amsterdam and he thrashed Van Gerwen 11-4 in the semi-final after winning nine consecutive legs. Next Michael Smith beat a resurgent Peter Wright 11-6 in the other semi-final, but he proved no match for The Nuke. Littler, 17, dished out the same treatment in the final by not giving Smith a sniff. He almost repeated the trick of winning nine legs in a row but Bully Boy pulled off Big Fish to delay the inevitable. CASINO SPECIAL - BEST CASINO WELCOME OFFERS Littler then polished off his 11th leg in style to win the World Series of Darts - his second major trophy after Premier League Darts. He said of his victory: “I’m just happy to win. It’s been a long day of course. “Waking up early, didn’t like that one. I managed to get over the line against Chris (Dobey). I relaxed...

title: For Arabs in Israel it's bloodshed and despair with no end in sight
creator: Deiaa Haj Yahia
content: Murder scenes are becoming a routine sight, and headlines report new victims every week. Automatic gunfire and explosive devices are now part of daily life in Arab communities. The pain is suffocating residents who are no longer able to express their fears. In the past, people talked, shared, protested. Now, silence reigns.

title: RESULTADOS CEPREUNI: Link y puntajes obtenidos de la primera práctica calificada 2025-I
creator: Luis Chumbiauca
content: El Centro de Estudios Preuniversitarios de la Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería ( CEPREUNI ) realizó con éxito hoy, domingo 15 de septiembre, la primera práctica calificada dirigida a estudiantes que tienen la convicción de ingresar a la UNI . La institución concluyó la prueba correspondiente al ciclo 2025-1 y muchos alumnos están a la espera de los resultados . AQUÍ te entregamos el link y los puntajes obtenidos. Resultados CEPREUNI: puntajes de primera práctica calificada El CEPREUNI brindó su primera práctica calificada que será crucial para los estudiantes que buscan sumar puntos y tener el promedio suficiente para alcanzar una vacante mediante esta modalidad. La entidad aún no comunica los resultados de esta prueba, pero saldrán a través de este ENLACE una vez concluyan con la calificación. Como se sabe, esta primera práctica calificada estaba dirigida a estudiantes que hayan culminado sus estudios de educación secundaria y estar matriculados en el ciclo CEPREUNI. La UNI ofrece a los alumnos, mediante esta modalidad, la oportunidad de obtener una vacante que les permita alcanzar la carrera de sus sueños. ¿Qué objetos están prohibidos de llevar al examen CEPREUNI? title: D-Day for Dundalk FC: When plug could be pulled, club debt, money needed to get to end of season & how table would look with results expunged
creator: news@irishmirror.ie (Mark McCadden)
content: Dundalk FC could cease to exist by 5pm today, unless a white knight rides in to save the 121-year-old club. But the likelihood of that happening is growing slimmer by the hour, after the weekend saw a leading contender withdraw from talks to take over the club from Brian Ainscough. The consortium led by US-based businessman Jeff Saunders ended their interest after close examination of the club’s financial situation, which includes a debt believed to be around €1.2 million. READ MORE: Dundalk ‘could go out of business within the next couple of weeks’ - fears for League of Ireland giants raised at FAI AGM READ MORE: Where to watch Galway United v Shamrock Rovers, ticket details and kick-off time as Stephen Bradley's men face four crucial League of Ireland games in 11 days Potential investors have poured over the club’s accounts and cash flows, while even the club’s ownership of the Youth Development Centre is insufficient to attract a buyer. Frantic efforts are ongoing to find a solution to save the club, at least until the end of the season. The cost of the club seeing out the campaign would be €360,000. Players have expressed a willingness to write off next week’s wages, and potentially the following week’s too, in order to keep the club going. So deep is the club’s financial strife, however, that this would not be enough. Dundalk’s weekly wage budget, spread between a 27-strong playing squad, is thought to be around €20,000. It is believed that the FAI advanced prize money...

title: Dirigencia el PAN reconoce que falta reinventarse
creator: NOTICIAS DE HOY
content: CDMX.- Marko Cortés Mendoza, presidente del Partido Acción Nacional (PAN), señaló que esta fuerza política llega a sus 85 años con los mejores gobiernos estatales y municipales, y siendo la principal fuerza de oposición que sigue en pie contra el oficialismo. “En estos difíciles momentos de regresión autoritaria, seguiremos teniendo el mejor modelo de gobierno y siendo un partido de oposición que cuestione al régimen en turno, siendo la voz de las y los ciudadanos”, mencionó. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: En aumento lista de muertos en plena ola de violencia Sinaloa; registran seis cuerpos en Culiacán “Somos la última trinchera de la libertad y de la democracia, la resistencia que con cuatro gobiernos estatales, más de 250 municipios, 14 capitales, más de 150 legisladores locales y más de 90 legisladores federales comprometidos en detener el avance autoritario” , resaltó el presidente en un comunicado. Cortés Mendoza señaló que el partido albiazul tiene capacidad para adaptarse, renovarse y mantenerse como pieza clave en la arena política. “Por eso, los trabajos de la Comisión de Estudio y Propuestas de Cambio para el PAN van sumamente avanzados y ya se puede anunciar que el cambio va de fondo y va en serio”, señaló el presidente del PAN. Marko Cortés recordó que en los próximos días la comisión lanzará una encuesta a la militancia para que el cambio sea resultado de una gran deliberación nacional y no por la decisión de unos cuantos. El líder de los...

title: పోలీసులకు పోస్టింగ్‌ కష్టాలు!
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: రాష్ట్ర పోలీసు శాఖలో సబ్‌ డివిజనల్‌ అధికారుల కొరత ఏర్పడింది. డీజీపీ కార్యాలయంలో 61 మంది డీఎస్పీలు నిరీక్షణలో ఉన్నా పలు జిల్లాల్లో సబ్‌ డివిజనల్‌ అధికారి పోస్టులు ఖాళీగానే ఉన్నాయి. గత ప్రభుత్వంలో వైసీపీ నేతల కంటే దారుణంగా వ్యవహరించిన పలువురు ఐపీఎ్‌సలతో పాటు ఆరోపణలు ఎదుర్కొన్న కొందరు అధికారులు పోలీస్‌ హెడ్‌క్వార్టర్స్‌లో హాజరు వేయించుకొంటున్నారు. వైసీపీ ప్రభుత్వంలో ఒక్క కానిస్టేబుల్‌ పోస్టు కూడా భర్తీ చేయకపోవడంతో పోలీసు సిబ్బంది సంఖ్య 50 వేలు మాత్రమే ఉంది. వీరితో పనిచేయించే బాధ్యత సబ్‌ డివిజన్‌ స్థాయిలో డీఎస్పీలు, జిల్లా స్థాయిలో ఎస్పీలు, ఆపై సీనియర్‌ ఐపీఎ్‌సలపై ఉంటుంది. వైసీపీ ప్రభుత్వ పాలనలో పోస్టింగ్స్‌ కోసం కొందరు.. ఒత్తిడితో మరికొందరు.. ఆ పార్టీ నేతల అన్యాయాలు, అక్రమాలకు వత్తాసు పలికారు. ప్రస్తుతం కూటమి ప్రభుత్వం రావడంతో గత ఐదేళ్లుగా ఐపీసీని పక్కనపెట్టి వైసీపీ చట్టం అమలు చేసిన పోలీసులకు కష్టాలొచ్చాయి. టీడీపీ అధినేత చంద్రబాబును సొంత నియోజకవర్గంలోకి అనుమతించకుండా అడ్డుకున్న పోలీసు అధికారులు కొందరు.. మాజీ మంత్రి పెద్దిరెడ్డి సైన్యంలా పనిచేసిన వారు ఇంకొందరు... పార్లమెంటు సభ్యుడిపై దేశద్రోహం కేసుపెట్టి థర్డ్‌ డిగ్రీ ప్రయోగించినవారు, యువగళం యాత్రకు అడుగడుగునా అడ్డంకులు సృష్టించినవారు, రాజధాని రైతులపై ఉక్కుపాదం మోపినవారు.. ఇలా వైసీపీ ప్రభుత్వంలో లెక్కలేనన్ని అక్రమాలకు వంతపాడిన పోలీసులు ఇప్పుడు మథనపడుతున్నారు. ‘జగన్‌కు తిరుగుండదని భావించి తప్పుచేశాం.. వైసీపీ నాయకులు ఎన్ని తప్పులు చేసినా చోద్యం చూశాం. ప్రశ్నించిన గొంతుకల్ని బూటుకాలితో తొక్కేశాం.. ఇప్పుడు అనుభవిస్తున్నాం’ అని నిర్వేదంతో వ్యాఖ్యానిస్తున్నారు. అయితే కొందరు పోలీసులు తాము గత ప్రభుత్వంలో అన్యాయానికి...

title: Lando Norris' F1 world title bid back from the dead as bold Brit cuts through the field to take down Max Verstappen and narrow gap by three points, writes JONATHAN McEVOY
content: Lando Norris' F1 world title bid back from the dead as bold Brit cuts through the field to take down Max Verstappen and narrow gap by three points, writes JONATHAN McEVOY Norris' fourth place finish chips away at Max Verstappen's championship lead The Briton overcame a lowly starting place to reach fourth in the Baku Grand Prix The result cuts Verstappen's lead in the driver's championship by three points By Jonathan McEvoy and Dmcontent Published: 17:43 EDT, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 17:43 EDT, 15 September 2024 e-mail 36 shares View comments It looked all over, and then the body twitched. That is how Lando Norris ’s world championship hopes refused to die in the space of a topsy-turvy 24 hours. On Saturday night, he qualified 17th for the Azerbaijan Grand Prix, the third-last place you want to be when you stand 62 points behind Max Verstappen with eight races remaining. Last night, he could look back on a fine day’s work. One touched by a little luck, but at the centre of his fourth-place finish was a mighty drive in a lickety-split McLaren. Verstappen, who started sixth, finished fifth, his lead trimmed to 59 points. Actually, the star in a captivating race was driving the other McLaren, Oscar Piastri , the 23-year-old Australian whose sorcery was barely believable. More of his magic later. But the matter at hand is the world championship of 2024 and Norris’s chances of winning it. He had seemed weighed down by expectation, and all the inevitable chatter, over this...

title: بداية نيوكاسل المثالية تعيد رقما قياسيا غائبا منذ 28 عاما
content: هاي كورة- تمكن نيوكاسل يونايتد من الفوز على وولفرهامبتون بثنائية مقابل هدف، مساء أمس الاحد، في ختام منافسات الجولة الرابعة بالدوري الانجليزي الممتاز. وبهذا الفوز يكون نيوكاسل يونايتد قد حقق افضل بداية له في موسم بالدوري الانجليزي الممتاز منذ 1995-1996 ، بعد أن تمكن من حصد 10 نقاط من أصل 12 نقطة. الماكبايس يحتل حاليا المركز الثالث في ترتيب البريميرليج خلف الوصيف ارسنال بفارق الاهداف فقط.

title: AP News Summary at 5:43 p.m. EDT
creator: AP

title: AP News Summary at 5:43 p.m. EDT
creator: AP
content: Trump was the subject of an apparent assassination attempt at his Florida golf club, the FBI says WASHINGTON (AP) — The FBI says it's investigating “what appears to be an attempted assassination” of Donald Trump at his golf club in West Palm Beach, Florida. It comes just nine weeks after the Republican presidential nominee survived another attempt on his life. Trump says he's safe and well. Palm Beach County Sheriff Ric Bradshaw says U.S. Secret Service agents fired at a man pointing an AK-style rifle with a scope into the club as Trump was on the course. Bradshaw says the gunman was about 400 yards to 500 yards away from Trump and hiding in shrubbery. He said the gunman had two backpacks hanging on a fence and a GoPro camera. The Latest: Trump safe after gunshots reported, Biden and Harris have been briefed U.S. Secret Service agents opened fire after seeing a person with a firearm near Donald Trump’s West Palm Beach golf club in Florida while the Republican presidential candidate was golfing. Trump is safe and no injuries are reported. Officials say the person was apprehended in a nearby county after fleeing in an SUV. The FBI says it is investigating “what appears to be an attempted assassination” of Trump. Roughly two months ago, Trump was shot during an assassination attempt at a rally in Pennsylvania when a bullet grazed his ear. title: Netherlands Star Rues ‘Sluggish’ Inter Milan Performance Vs Monza, Reveals Key To Stopping Man City Superstar
creator: Toni Weeler
content: Stefan de Vriij feels that Inter Milan were too “slow” against Monza, and must work as a team to stop Man City striker Erling Haaland. The Dutchman spoke to Italian broadcaster DAZN after the Nerazzurri’s 1-1 Serie A draw with the Brianzoli, via FCInterNews . Inter had to settle for a point in their return from the international break. The Nerazzurri travelled to the U-Power Stadium, but failed to beat Monza. The result was perhaps not as much of a shock as it looked on paper. Monza had beaten and drawn with Inter during the 2022-23 campaign. However, there was no sugarcoating Inter’s disappointment after a match that they felt they needed three points from. Inter actually went behind briefly in the second half of the match. The Nerazzurri were able to salvage a point. Wingback Denzel Dumfries equalized following some sharp approach play by Joaquin Correa and Carlos Augusto. But neither Inter nor Monza were able to find a late winner after that. De Vrij: “Inter Too Slow Vs Monza, Must Stop Haaland As A Team Vs Man City” In truth, the real damage was done in the first half of this evening’s match. Inter allowed the pace of the match to lower significantly after a fairly positive start. And after that, it was not easy for the Nerazzurri to put Monza’s defense under any sort of real pressure until they threw caution to the wind following the Brianzoli’s goal. “We prepared well for this match over the week,” said Inter defender de Vrij. “It wasn’t easy.” The Dutchman admitted...

title: Gunman Got Within 500 Yards of Trump in Second Assassination Attempt
content: The alleged gunman behind 's second apparent assassination attempt got within 500 yards of the former president, according to the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office. The that it is investigating a shooting at the Trump International Golf Club in West Palm Beach, Florida, as an "attempted assassination." The Secret Service said that shots were fired around 1:30 p.m. EST on the golf course. Palm Beach County Sheriff Ric Bradshaw told reporters at a press briefing Sunday afternoon that a Secret Service agent had spotted the gunman with a rifle sticking out of a bush-lined fence at the golf course. The agent then "engaged" with the suspect, who then fled the scene in a vehicle. The shooter, who was later taken into custody, got within 300 to 500 yards of Trump, law enforcement said. The shooting comes just nine weeks after the former president was the target of an attempted assassination attempt during a campaign rally in Pennsylvania on July 13. That suspect, who shot at Trump from a rooftop near by the rally's location, was less than 164 yards from where the former president was speaking. Trump spokesperson Steven Chueng told in a statement that the former president "is safe following gunshots in his vicinity." Trump also said in a statement, "I AM SAFE AND WELL! Nothing will slow me down. I will NEVER SURRENDER! I will always love you for supporting me. Unity. Peace. Make America Great Again."

title: Pitali smo Bongu za Željka, a on se od srca nasmejao: Evo šta je rekao za Obradovića
creator: Stefan Pavićević
content: Nemački repreznetativac, a sada igrač Partizana , Ajzak Bonga je u svetu košarke poznat kao veliki radnik i disciplinovan igrač, a to pokazuje ne samo na terenu već i u svojim izjavama nakon meča sa Parizom, koji su crno-beli na najbolji mogući način pobedili. Istakao je da je ovaj meč bio veoma zahtevan i težak, da su im se ti napori u potpunosti isplatili, ali i objasnio je važnost mentaliteta. - Bilo je teško kao da je Evroliga. Mislim da je bio dobar timski napor, drago mi je da smo dobili. Ovaj mentalitet je važan, važno je da Evroligu igramo sa ovim mentalitetom. Nema veze što je prijateljska utakmica, moramo uvek imati isti pristup - objašnjava Bonga. Smatra da tim ima potencijal i da ide ka nečemu. - Definitivno idemo ka nečemu, svaki dan se sve više upoznajemo. Izgledamo sve bolje i bolje iz meča u meč se znamo bolje. Vidimo potencijal toga kako dobri možemo biti - ističe Ajzak Bonga. Posebno ističe zalaganje svih igrača... - Ovo je nešto što ne možete samo kupiti, zalaganje morate pokazati svaki posed. Kada igrate tako vaš tim dobija - dodaje Nemac. Na kraju smo ga upitali šta misli o Željku Obradoviću, a on je uz osmeh odgovorio šta donosi rezultate. - Veoma je detaljan trener, svaki put na treninzima pričamo o detaljima. To nas čini da pravimo zaista velike korake u unapređenju svoje igre - zaključio je Bonga. (Telegraf.rs)

title: No track caving in MP, minor settlement: Railways
content: BHOPAL: Railways has refuted media reports of a track caving incident between Hetampur and Dholpur railway stations in Madhya Pradesh's Morena district on Saturday. In a letter to TOI, the chief PRO of North Central Railways clarified that there was no track caving at the specified location (1280/13-17) or within the two stations, and that recent heavy rainfall led to "minor track settlement " at 1280/15-17, resulting in a temporary speed restriction of 20 kmph on Sept 12, 2024. A precautionary speed limit of 45 kmph was in place from Sept 8, 2024, due to connection of a newly commissioned third line with the existing up line, it said. The track has been repaired and the speed limit has been restored to 45 kmph.

title: Após saída da Globo, Boninho exalta parceria de Ana Furtado
creator: RD1
content: Vivendo uma nova fase em sua carreira com a saída da Globo , Boninho sabe que do lado pessoal nada mudou, já que sua parceria com Ana Furtado segue firme e forte. Apaixonado, o diretor deixou uma surpresa romântica para a esposa, e a famosa exibiu o momento na web. Em um vídeo publicado no Instagram, a jornalista contou que está em São Paulo a trabalho e que contou com a companhia do amado. No entanto, ele precisou voltar para o Rio da Janeiro . De acordo com Furtado, ao acordar, ela se deparou com uma declaração no banheiro. No espelho do cômodo, Boninho escreveu: "Ter você do meu lado é a certeza de que serei feliz para sempre. Te amo muito, sucesso hoje. Você é minha vida" . Na legenda do post, a apresentadora declarou : " Um domingo muito especial. Hoje tenho um Emmy pra apresentar na TV e o meu maior prêmio eu já ganhei, meu marido, meu romântico". "Passamos o fim de semana juntos em SP e olha só o presente que ele me deixou no espelho. Não é lindo? Nos reapaixonamos todos os dias um pelo outro com esses detalhes, com essa dedicação e cuidado. Te amo muito, Boninho. Somos um time especial" , concluiu. Uma publicação compartilhada por Ana Furtado (@aanafurtado)

title: మూడంతస్తుల భవనం కూలి..ఒకే కుటుంబంలో 10 మంది మృతి
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: భారీ వర్షాల కారణంగా యూపీలోని మేరట్‌లో శనివారం మూడంతస్తుల భవనం కూలి ఒకే కుటుంబానికి చెందిన 10 మంది మరణించారు. ఐదుగురు గాయపడ్డారు. మరణించిన వారిలో ఐదుగురు మైనర్లు ఉన్నారు. శిథిలాల కింద మరికొంత మంది చిక్కుకున్నట్లు అధికారులు భావిస్తున్నారు. కాగా, యూపీలో కురుస్తున్న భారీ వర్షాలకు 11 జిల్లాలు తీవ్రంగా ప్రభావితమయ్యాయి. భీకర వానలకు ఇప్పటి వరకు 17 మంది మరణించినట్లు సమాచారం.

title: BRS: కేసీఆర్‌ను కలిసిన బీఆర్‌ఎస్‌ నేతలు
creator: ABN Andhrajyothy
content: బీఆర్‌ఎస్‌ అధినేత కేసీఆర్‌ను ఆ పార్టీ ముఖ్యనేతలు కలిశారు. ఎర్రవెల్లిలోని వ్యవసాయ క్షేత్రంలో ఆదివారం కేసీఆర్‌ను కలిసిన వారిలో వర్కింగ్‌ ప్రెసిడెంట్‌ కేటీఆర్‌, వేముల ప్రశాంత్‌రెడ్డి, శ్రీనివా్‌సగౌడ్‌, వివేకానంద, కౌశిక్‌రెడ్డి, జీవన్‌రెడ్డి, మర్రి జనార్ధన్‌రెడ్డి, బాల్కసుమన్‌, కోరుకంటి చందర్‌ ఉన్నారు. ఈ సందర్భంగా పార్టీ వ్యవహారాలు, రాష్ట్రంలోని తాజా పరిణామాలపై చర్చించినట్లు తెలుస్తోంది.

title: The Latest: Trump safe after gunshots reported, Biden and Harris have been briefed
creator: AP

title: Trump was the subject of an apparent assassination attempt at his Florida golf club, the FBI says
creator: By ALANNA DURKIN RICHER, COLLEEN LONG, MICHAEL BALSAMO and ZEKE MILLER - Associated Press
content: WASHINGTON (AP) — The FBI said Donald Trump was the target of “what appears to be an attempted assassination” at his golf club in West Palm Beach, Florida, on Sunday, just nine weeks after the Republican presidential nominee survived another attempt on his life . The former president said he was safe and well. Palm Beach County Sheriff Ric Bradshaw said the U.S. Secret Service agents fired at a man pointing an AK-style rifle with a scope as Trump was on the course. Bradshaw said the gunman also had two backpacks hanging on a fence and a GoPro camera, and that he was about 400 yards to 500 yards away from Trump and hiding in shrubbery while the former president played golf on a nearby hole. The person dropped the weapon and fled in an SUV, and was later taken into custody in a neighboring county. The incident was the latest jarring moment in a campaign year marked by unprecedented upheaval. It occurred roughly two months after Trump was shot during an assassination attempt at a rally in Pennsylvania, and a bullet grazed his ear . Only a week later, President Joe Biden withdrew from the race. In an email to supporters, Trump said: “There were gunshots in my vicinity, but before rumors start spiraling out of control, I wanted you to hear this first: I AM SAFE AND WELL!” “Nothing will slow me down. I will NEVER SURRENDER!” the former president said. The golf course was partially shut down for Trump as he played, and agents were a few holes ahead of him when they noticed the...

title: تراکتور با تم لیگ قهرمانان آسیا (عکس)
content: به گزارش "ورزش سه"، سرخپوشان تبریزی در حالی به استقبال لیگ قهرمانان آسیا خواهند رفت که در این رقابتها شانس بسیار خوبی برای موفقیت و صعود به مراحل نهایی دارند و حداقل طلسم صعود از مرحله گروهی را خواهند شکست؛ جایی که باید از سد الوکره، موهان باگان و روشن کولاب بگذرند. تراکتور بلافاصله بعد از بازی با ذوب‌آهن توپ‌های لیگ قهرمانان آسیا را هم از گمرک ترخیص کرد تا تمرینات این تیم با توپ‌های جدید کنفدراسیون فوتبال آسیا برگزار شود که طراحی منحصر بفرد و تازه نسبت به سالهای گذشته دارد و از رنگ آبی و نارنجی در آن استفاده شده که رنگ‌های اصلی ای اف سی هم محسوب می‌شوند. تراکتور فعلا برای این بازی بازیکن مصدوم را ندارد و همه نفرات در دسترس دراگان اسکوچیچ هستند. از امروز بازیکنان اصلی تیم تراکتور هم پای خود را با توپ جدید آشنا خواهند کرد و برای بازی الوکره آماده خواهند شد، دیداری حکم قرص فراموشی شکست ذوب‌آهن را خواهد داشت.

title: Indústria de calçados do Acre envia mais uma remessa de botas para Porto Maldonado
creator: Raimundo Souza
content: A indústria de calçados acreana Bootnorte confirmou prospecção de negócios feita durante a Expoacre, maior feira agropecuária do estado, realizada pelo governo do Acre, enviando na manhã deste sábado, 14, um lote com mil pares de botas para o Peru. O carregamento saiu direto da fábrica, no Parque Industrial de Rio Branco, com destino a Porto Maldonado, de onde será distribuído para outras regiões andinas. O empresário Esmerino Ribeiro Neto, afirmou que as negociações avançaram com a vinda de empresários peruanos para a Expoacre em Rio Branco. “A ideia é distribuir a partir da capital da província Madre de Dios para as demais cidades peruanas”, assegurou. Neto lembrou que o primeiro lote enviado ao Peru foi a partir da participação da indústria acreana na Expo Amazônia, em 2022. “A convite da Fieac e do governo do estado participamos da feira e fechamos o primeiro lote tipo exportação”, acrescentou. Há seis anos a empresa vem ganhando reconhecimento fora do estado pela qualidade empregada no produto. Além do Acre, a Bootnorte vende para Rondônia, Mato Grosso, Roraima e Amazonas. Para aprimorar a sua linha de produção, com capacidade de cinco mil pares por mês, a empresa teve de firmar parceria com o Serviço Nacional de Aprendizagem Industrial (Senai) para poder fazer cursos e treinamentos junto aos colaboradores. Para o titular da Secretaria de Estado de Indústria, Ciência e Tecnologia (Seict), Assurbanípal Mesquita, que acompanhou o...

title: Журналисту Михаилу Таратуте потребовалась срочная медицинская помощь
content: Как утверждает СМИ со ссылкой на источник, 76-летнему журналисту стало плохо из-за резкого падения давления, и родные ему вызвали "скорую помощь". Отмечается, что необходимую помощь Таратуте оказали на месте, от госпитализации он отказался. Михаил Анатольевич Таратута - американист, автор и ведущий популярных программ "Америка с Михаилом Таратутой" и "Русские горки", ряда документальных фильмов и статей о США и не только. В боевике "Америкэн бой" режиссёра Бориса Квашнёва 1992 года снялся в камео. Учредитель ФГБУ «Редакция «Российской газеты» Главный редактор В.А. title: Забивали новички. Мадридский Атлетико дома разгромил Валенсию в Ла Лиге
content: В матче 5-го тура чемпионата Испании мадридский «Атлетико» дома разгромил «Валенсию» (3:0). У хозяев поля голы забили Конор Галлахер, Антуан Гризманн и Хулиан Альварес. Для Галлахера и Альварес это первые голы за «Атлетико», куда они перешли в августе. Мадридская команда с 11 очками входит в топ-3 Ла Лиги. «Валенсия» потерпела 4-е поражение и замыкает таблицу (1 пункт). Ла Лига. 5-й тур, 15 сентября Атлетико – Валенсия – 3:0 Голы: Галлахер, 39 Гризманн, 54, Альварес, 90+4 Турнирная таблица

title: El detenido en el campo de golf de Trump pretendía atacar al expresidente, según medios
content: Un individuo fue arrestado cerca del campo de golf en West Palm Beach, Florida, donde el expresidente estadounidense Donald Trump estaba jugando, portando un rifle AK47 y con el aparente propósito de atacar al candidato republicano. Según medios como CNN, el Servicio Secreto disparó contra el sospechoso y tras el suceso se recuperó un arma larga. Las autoridades creen que el individuo tenía la intención de atacar al exmandatario (2017-2021), quien se encuentra a salvo. El Servicio Secreto informó que en próximos minutos tendrá lugar una conferencia de prensa para informar de los detalles de lo sucedido, ya que todavía no ha sido confirmado de manera oficial. En un breve comunicado enviado a la prensa, Steven Cheung, director de comunicaciones de la campaña de Trump, informó: “El presidente Trump está a salvo tras los disparos ocurridos en las inmediaciones. Por ahora, no hay más detalles disponibles”. Con información de EFE. EE

title: ढिंग टांग : ...पण ऑफर दिली कुणी?
creator: ब्रिटिश नंदी
content: ‘पंतप्रधान होण्याची तयारी असेल तर पाठिंबा देऊ, अशी ऑफर विरोधी पक्षातील एका पॉवरफुल नेत्याने दिली होती, पण आपणच नको म्हटले,’ असा गौप्यस्फोट आमचे परममित्र मा. नितीन गडकरीसाहेबांनी केला. त्यामुळे राजकीय वर्तुळात प्रचंड खळबळ उडणे स्वाभाविक होते. विरोधी पक्षांकडून अशी ऑफर येणे तसे इंपॉसिबल असते.

title: Ex-namorada acusa lateral Caio Paulista de agressão
content: O lateral-esquerdo Caio Paulista, 26, do Palmeiras , foi acusado por sua ex-namorada Clara Monteiro, 21, mãe de sua terceira filha, de cometer agressões físicas, verbais e psicológicas contra ela. O jogador nega as acusações. Em publicação nas redes sociais na noite de sábado (14), Clara diz estar cansada de se esconder e dirige sua mensagem a outras mulheres que também são vítimas de agressões: "Sair disso tudo é muito difícil, mas não é impossível". "Quero que todas as mulheres leiam e tenham certeza que por mais difícil que seja, você consegue sim sair de uma agressão psicológica, agressão física e verbal", afirma outro trecho da mensagem, publicada no Instagram. A carta é acompanhada de uma sequência de fotos em que Clara aparece com hematomas na costela e com os olhos inchados e roxos. A tatuadora não cita diretamente o nome do jogador do Palmeiras na publicação, mas atribuiu as marcas das agressões a Caio em declarações ao UOL. O advogado de Clara, Marcos Paulo Arias, disse mover uma ação judicial contra o atleta por violência. Caio Paulista negou ter agredido a ex-namorada "Venho afirmar que nunca a agredi, bem como não agredi nenhuma outra mulher, e, acima de tudo, a respeito como mãe da minha filha", diz a nota publicada pelo jogador. Ainda de acordo com ele, há um processo em andamento na Vara Familiar de São Paulo por pensão alimentícia e outras demandas financeiras, sem acordo até o momento. O Palmeiras afirmou que a...

title: Vilhjálmur ekki tekið ákvörðun um framboð
content: Vilhjálmur Birgisson útilokar ekki framboð til Alþingis en segist vera í mjög góðu starfi. Fleiri en einn stjórnmálaleiðtogi hefur komið að máli við hann með mögulegt framboð í huga. Þetta upplýsir Vilhjálmur í hressilegu viðtali á vettvangi Spursmála þar sem hann er gestur ásamt Þorbjörgu Gunnlaugsdóttur, alþingismanni Viðreisnar. Þegar gengið er á Vilhjálm með hvaða stjórnmálaleiðtogar hafi haft samband við hann, færist hann undan því að svara. Hann hefur þó á síðustu árum farið fögrum orðum um forsætisráðherratíð Sigmundar Davíðs Gunnlaugssonar 2013 til 2016. Orðaskiptin um mögulegt framboð verkalýðsleiðtogans má sjá í spilaranum hér að ofan en þau eru einnig rakin í textanum hér að neðan. Engin ákvörðun tekin enn Vilhjálmur Birgisson, þú mærðir hér Sigmund Davíð Gunnlaugsson fyrir framgöngu hans í kjölfar kosninganna 2013. Það styttist í kosningar. Ert þú á leiðinni í framboð? „Er ég á leiðinni í framboð? Ég hef ekki tekið neina ákvörðun um það.“ Kemur það til greina? „Ég er í mjög góðu starfi núna.“ Þú ert búinn að vera lengi í því. Er ekki kominn tími á það sem menn kalla second career? „Nei, ég er bara í mjög góðu starfi þannig að ég er ekki farinn að hugsa um slíkt.“ Hafa stjórnmálaleiðtogar haft samband við þig til þess að kanna flöt á því að þú farir í framboð? „Ég ætla ekki að neita því.“ Úr fleiri en einum flokki? „Ég ætla ekki að neita því.“ Hefur Kristrún Frostadóttir...?...

title: Rabio befason me të ardhmen
content: Në Francë nuk kanë dyshime. Adrien Rabio, të të vijojë karrierë te Marseja. Nga raportimet e fundit bëhet me dije se ish-mesfushori i Juventusit ka arritur akordin total me skuadrën e De Zerbit ku do të firmosë për 2 vite. Gjatë merkatos, u përfol shumë për interesime nga klube “big”, por në fund Rabio, zgjodhi të surprizonte duke pranuar transferimin te Marseja. Mesfushori 29-vjeçar në të kaluarën është aktivizuar me klube të rëndësishme në futbollin europian si PSG dhe Juventus, ndërsa tashmë do të jetë pjesë e Marsejës.
