title: Muro azul: Castellón rompe récord de Johnny y Superman Vargas sin recibir goles en la U. de Chile
creator: Nelson Martinez
content: En una campaña que los tiene como líderes del torneo, el arco de la U. de Chile ha sido prenda de garantía gracias a Gabriel Castellón . El meta arribó al CDA como hombre de confianza de Gustavo Álvarez. Por ello, el ex meta acerero llegaba al duelo con Palestino en el Estadio Nacional con la presión de defender un importante récord bajo los tres tubos , considerando sus buenas actuaciones y el tener el acto invicto hace fechas. Concretamente, al comenzar el partido ante los árabes, el “Flaco” Castellón estaba a solo minutos del récord de imbatibilidad que ostentaban dos peces gordos del equipo bullanguero. Gabriel Castellón. Foto: Photosport ¿Cuáles eran los récords sin goles en el arco azul? Gabriel Castellón debía mantener su arco en cero ante Palestino por 43 minutos para alcanzar la marca de Johnny Herrera , mientras que son 48 para superar el tiempo sin goles en su arco de Sergio “Supermán” Vargas . Todo esto, por el Torneo Nacional (sin contar Copa Chile). ver también Por ello, y tras lograr la hazaña sin recibir goles en ese tiempo, el actual meta azul sumó un histórico registro que confirma el gran momento que vive luego de ser campeón con Huachipato y ahora titular con la U. de Chile. Según registra TNS Sports, los números del Sámurai sin goles en su arco eran 622 minutos hasta el récord de Castellón, lo que consiguió entre marzo y abril de 2012. Por otra parte, Sergio Bernabé Vargas logró su registro en 1995 , también tras seis...

title: España pierde con China pese a las tablas de Shirov con el campeón del mundo
creator: Jesús J. Boyero
content: La selección masculina de España perdió por la mínima con China (1,5-2,5) en la quinta jornada de las doce programadas de la 45a Olimpiada que se disputa en Budapest (Hungría). Un resultado que sitúa a España en la 11a posición de 184 participantes, con un balance de cuatro victorias y una derrota. Georgia será el adversario de España en la sexta ronda. El combinado femenino, después del tropiezo de ayer contra pronóstico ante Mongolia, se impuso a Noruega (2,5-1,5) y alcanza la 9a posición en la tabla clasificatoria de 169 equipos. Argentina pondrá hoy a prueba las aspiraciones de nuestra selección. Alexi Shirov (B), en el primer tablero, empató con Liren Ding, actual campeón del mundo, después de jugar de manera ambiciosa la apertura, una catalana. Sin embargo, no logró desnivelar la posición y firmó las tablas en el movimiento 44 en un final de alfiles de diferente color. En la segunda mesa, David Antón (N) mantuvo la lucha equilibrada con Yi Wei, séptimo en las listas mundiales, hasta que en la jugada 35, apurado de tiempo, cometió un error que terminó costándole un peón, decisivo en un final de torres y alfiles del mismo color. El madrileño, siempre luchador desde sus tiempos juveniles, buscó recursos, pero fueron insuficientes ante la buena técnica exhibida por su rival. Francisco Vallejo (B) y Jaime Santos Latasa (N) firmaron las tablas en el tercer y cuarto tablero ante Yangyi Yu y Xiangzhi Bu respectivamente. La victoria de Sara Khadem...

title: Tirs à proximité de Donald Trump en Floride: un suspect interpellé et placé en garde à vue
content: Un témoin a aidé les autorités en prenant le véhicule du suspect en photo. Le véhicule a été intercepté et son occupant a été interpellé et placé en garde à vue après les coups de feu tirés à proximité du club de golf de Donald Trump ce dimanche 15 septembre. Les autorités américaines sont rapidement parvenues à interpeller un suspect après les coups de feu tirés à proximité de Donald Trump ce dimanche 15 septembre près du parcours de son club de golf à Palm Beach, en Floride. Un témoin a rapporté aux policiers "avoir vu une personne courir hors d'un buisson" puis "entrer dans une Nissan noire", a expliqué Ric L.Bradshaw, le shérif du comté de Palm Beach, en conférence de presse. Le témoin est parvenu à prendre le véhicule du suspect ainsi que sa plaque d'immatriculation. Un fusil d'assaut découvert dans un buisson Ces précieuses informations ont permis aux équipes d'identifier puis d'intercepter le véhicule. "Nous avons pu contacter le shérif qui a été en mesure d'interpeller le conducteur." Sur Facebook, les autorités ont précisé que le véhicule a été intercepté sur une autoroute. Un fusil d'assaut, AK-47, deux sacs à dos et une GoPro ont par ailleurs été retrouvés dans le buisson d'où est sorti le suspect. Après les tirs, le FBI a annoncé dans un communiqué ouvrir une enquête "sur ce qui semble être une tentative d'assassinat de l'ancien président Donald Trump". De son côté, l'ancien président américain a...

title: Sivasspor'dan Rey Manaj için sakatlık açıklaması
content: 16 Eylül 2024 00:42 Net Global Sivasspor'un golcü oyuncu Rey Manaj'ın sağ arka adale kas tendon kavşağında yırtık tespit edildi. Kırmızı-beyazlı ekipten yapılan açıklamada, "Trendyol Süper Lig’in 5. hafta maçında dün sahamızda Gaziantep FK ile oynadığımız maçın 42. dakikasında sakatlanan ve oyundan çıkmak zorunda kalan sporcumuz Rey Manaj'ın gerçekleştirilen kontrollerinde sağ arka adale kas-tendon kavşağında yırtık tespit edilmiştir." ifadesine yer verildi. Oyuncunun tedavisine sağlık ekiplerince başlanıldığı aktarılan açıklamada, "Rey Manaj'a geçmiş olsun dileklerimizi iletiyor, bir an önce sağlığına kavuşmasını diliyoruz." denildi.

title: ‘The bruising is crazy’: Arizona woman shares lip filler nightmare
creator: Anne Ryman
content: TEMPE, AZ — Athena Zafirakis just wanted more fullness in her lips, nothing dramatic. What she got was anything but subtle. Her lips seemed huge after she got them injected with filler. “The bruising is crazy, and they kind of hurt,” she told ABC 15 in an interview. “That was the other thing. They were painful.” A friend referred her to the provider, who advertises on Instagram. The price was hard to beat: Less than $300 per person when lip filler usually goes for more than twice that at med spas. Looking back, Zafirakis said there were other red flags besides the bargain price that she didn’t recognize because it was her first time getting lip filler. The provider only communicated through Instagram and required a $50 deposit through Cash App. The woman also worked out of her house. Once she arrived at the appointment, they began talking and “she did say she was a nurse,” Zafirakis said. “It took like two hours,” she said. “I kept, kind of taking breaks, like ‘tapping out’ because it was so painful.” She took a video of her new pout, showing a bruised upper lip. She wasn’t worried; she figured the swelling and bruising was normal. She began to worry a few days later. She said it hurt to brush her teeth. She was still in pain a week later. She noticed a hard bump on her upper lip. “Like a ball,” she said. She showed her lips to a friend, Kayla Marie Vandel, an esthetician at Third Eye Beauty Lounge in Tempe. Vandel’s sister, Katrina Amburgey, is a registered nurse and does...

title: Defesa do Espinho é a mais recente contratação... da Casa dos Segredos
content: Rúben Silvestre é um dos concorrentes do 'reality show' O mercado de transferências em Portugal já terminou, mas o Espinho anunciou, este domingo, uma saída do plantel. O defesa Rúben Silvestre, de 30 anos, vai deixar o emblema de Aveiro para se juntar... à Casa dos Segredos. O anúncio foi feito pelo próprio clube, nas redes sociais, e, apesar do tom irónico da publicação, Rúben Silvestre vai mesmo ser concorrente do reality show: «depois de longas negociações, Rúben Silvestre segue por empréstimo para o Secret Story - Casa dos Segredos, mas sem opção de compra. O SC Espinho já comunicou a transferência à CMVM, nos termos legais. O Rúben levou com ele a camisola tigre porque queremos tê-lo de volta em breve», escreveu o clube. A post shared by Sporting Clube De Espinho (@scespinho)

title: Appello di Zelensky agli alleati su uso armi, anche a Italia
content: (ANSA) – ROMA, 15 SET – “Ogni attacco russo, ogni atto terroristico, come l’attacco odierno alla città di Kharkiv e alle regioni di Sumy e Donetsk, dimostra che abbiamo bisogno della capacità” dei missili “a lungo raggio per distruggere l’aviazione militare russa nelle sue basi”. “Stiamo aspettando le decisioni in merito, in particolare dagli Stati Uniti, dal Regno Unito, dalla Francia, dalla Germania, dall’Italia, da tutti coloro la cui risolutezza può aiutare a salvare vite”. E’ il nuovo appello lanciato nel messaggio serale dal presidente ucraino Volodymyr Zelensky per il via libera all’uso dei missili occidentali in Russia. (ANSA).

title: Kansas City Chiefs y Peyton Hendershot son multados por la NFL
creator: ESPN
content: Kansas City.- Los Kansas City Chiefs fueron multados con 100,000 por un altercado en la línea lateral que involucró al ala cerrada Peyton Hendershot y los Baltimore Ravens durante el partido inaugural de la temporada de los equipos el 5 de septiembre, confirmó una fuente a ESPN el sábado. Peyton Hendershot, quien estaba inactivo para el juego y parado en la línea lateral de los Chiefs , empujó al linebacker de los Ravens Roquan Smith después de que Smith persiguiera a Patrick Mahomes fuera de los límites del campo. La noticia de la multa a los Chiefs fue reportada primero por NFL Network, que señalaron que la liga sancionó al equipo porque violó una regla que prohíbe a los jugadores inactivos hacer “contacto físico innecesario con, o burlarse o dirigir lenguaje abusivo, lenguaje amenazante o insultante o gestos a, oponentes, árbitros del juego o representantes de la liga”. Hendershot también fue multado con una cantidad no revelada, confirmó la fuente a ESPN . Hendershot fue adquirido por los Chiefs en un intercambio con los Dallas Cowboys poco antes del inicio de la temporada regular.

title: ‘In the Summers’ Takes Top Prize as Deauville Festival Charts New Course Post #MeToo
creator: Becroll
content: Alessandra Lacorazza Samudio ’s coming-of-age saga “ In the Summers ” took top honors at this year’s 50 th edition of the Deauville American Film Festival , claiming both the Grand Prize and the Fondation Louis Roeder Revelation Prize, awarded by a parallel jury. At once intimate and expansive, the film traces a Latin-American family portrait, using four vignettes to span two decades while following the evolving and often challenged relationship two siblings share with their father, played by Puerto Rican rap great Residente. “In the Summers” had previously won the grand jury prize and the director award out of Sundance, and is set for release by Music Box Films next week. “I’ve always been a huge fan of French cinema so it was already an honor to show my film at the Deauville American Film Festival,” the director tells Variety . “To win was unbelievable; [I’m] incredibly grateful. I hope this allows more international audiences to be able to experience the film.” The Deauville jury trophy went to Nnamdi Asomugha ’s feature debut, “The Knife.” After a sterling NFL career, the athlete-turned-actor now continues his ascent as a prizewinning filmmaker with a tense and claustrophobic drama about a family man – played by Asomugha himself – turned victim of a home invasion then engulfed into a prejudicial justice system. The film had previously won prizes for directing and cinematography at Tribeca this past June. Spirits were buoyant at this 50 th edition, and the various juries...

title: Byron Buxton, Carlos Correa are back, but Twins carefully balancing their workloads
content: Byron Buxton and Carlos Correa may be back on the active roster, but the Twins have made it clear that the two stars are not fully healthy. Even knowing that, the Twins opted to bring them back “the earliest we reasonably could,” manager Rocco Baldelli said, to get as much help from the two stars as they could down the stretch. So, it didn’t come as much of a surprise to see both out of the starting lineup on Sunday, a game the Twins won even without the two big bats. “When they could help us and when they could actually play, we brought them back,” Baldelli said. “And now we just have to make it work.” And making it work will mean playing without Buxton (hip) and Correa (heel) on occasion and assessing how they’re doing on a daily basis to determine their availability. Leaving them on the bench on Sunday, Baldelli said, should mean they’re ready to play on Monday when the Twins begin a big series against the division-leading Cleveland Guardians. “We start with a plan, but then there are going to be days where it’s going to be decided a little later, where we might have an idea, but we want to check on them and see what they’re doing,” Baldelli said. “Believe me, this isn’t like a 100 percent type conversation. If they’re 100 percent, they’d play.” When Simeon Woods Richardson left Saturday night’s game, he left with the bases packed. Very quickly, all three of those runners scored. It’s been an ongoing issue for the Twins this season, who have let the highest percentage of...

title: Donald Trump 'Assassination Attempt' Suspect: What We Know
content: A suspect is in custody after an at his golf course in West Palm Beach, Florida. The identity of the suspect has not been revealed. Trump was playing golf Sunday afternoon at his Trump International Golf course. A suspect was seen poking a rifle through the fence around the perimeter of the course, Ric Bradshaw the Palm Beach County Sheriff said at a press conference. The suspect was near the fourth or fifth hole. This was one or two holes ahead of where Trump was playing. Trump was between 400 and 500 yards from the gunman, Sheriff Bradshaw said at the news conference. A U.S. Secret Service was one hole ahead of Trump's group on the course. He spotted the suspect in the shrubbery by the fence and "immediately engaged that individual," Bradshaw said. The officer opened fire. The suspect abandoned the weapon and escaped in an SUV. Bradshaw said the suspect had an AK-style rifle with a scope, two backpacks hanging on a fence and a GoPro camera. Photos shared by law enforcement show two black bags hanging from a chain-link fence in the shrubbery outside the course, with the firearm propped up in between them and pointed through a gap in the fence. The GoPro camera was hanging on the fence to the side. The suspect fled in the SUV and was later apprehended in a nearby county without a weapon, law enforcement officials told The Associated Press. Teri Barbera, a spokesperson for the Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office, said there was only one person of interest in the investigation...

title: Loose lap belt for Power helps Palou cruise to 3rd IndyCar season championship
content: LEBANON, Tenn. -- Alex Palou easily drove to his third IndyCar championship in four years when challenger Will Power's seatbelt came loose minutes into the season-deciding finale Sunday at Nashville Superspeedway. Colton Herta, who earlier this year moved to Nashville, won the Music City Grand Prix for his first career victory on an oval and second win of the season for Andretti Global. Herta topped Pato O’Ward in a wheel-to-wheel battle in the closing laps. But all attention was on the championship race as Palou, a Spaniard who won his first title in 2021 in his first season driving for Chip Ganassi Racing, won back-to-back IndyCar titles. The competition for the crown was only between Palou and Power, the two-time champion from Australia who won his last title in 2022 sandwiched between Palou's run. Power had two chances in the last two races to reclaim the crown but failed to capitalize both times. Palou had an engine issue two weeks ago at the Milwaukee Mile and Power was briefly in position to win the race until the Australian spun on his own and finished a disappointing 10th. That allowed Palou to take a 33-point lead into Nashville, where the downtown street race had been shifted 35 miles away to the existing concrete oval because of construction on the Tennessee Titans' new stadium. Palou had never before raced on a concrete oval, while Power finished 11th in his only career race at the superspeedway, IndyCar's final visit in 2008. But things began looking up for...

title: అనంత వ్రతం.. అద్భుత ఫలప్రదం
creator: Satish
content: అనంతుడిపై అత్యంత సుందరంగా పవళించి.. అనంత విశ్వాలనూ కాపుకాసే దేవుడు అనంత పద్మనాభుడు. స్వామి రూపంలో స్థితి మాత్రమే గోచరించదు. సృష్టికర్తతోపాటు, లయకారుడి తత్వాలూ స్వామి చిత్తరువులో దర్శనమిస్తాయి. అంటే సృష్టి, స్థితి, లయ తత్వాలకు ప్రతిబింబం స్వామి. పన్నగ శయనుడికి కావేరీ తీరం అచ్చొచ్చిందేమో! ఈ నదీమతల్లి తటిపై ఆది (శ్రీరంగపట్నం), మధ్య (శివసముద్రం), అంత్య (శ్రీరంగం) రంగాల్లో కొలువుదీరి భక్తుల హృదయాంతరంగాల్లో నయన మనోహరుడిగా పేరొందాడు. కావేటి రంగడు మన తెలుగు రాష్ర్టాల్లో రంగనాథుడిగా పలు ఆధ్యాత్మిక కేంద్రాల్లో వెలిసి నిత్యపూజలు అందుకుంటున్నాడు. ఆ స్వామి సేవలో తరించే అవకాశం కల్పిస్తుంది ‘అనంత పద్మనాభ వ్రతం’. భాద్రపద శుద్ధ చతుర్దశి సందర్భంగా ఈ వ్రతాన్ని ఆచరిస్తారు. కష్టాలు తీరిపోవాలని, కోరికలు నెరవేరాలని ఈ వ్రతం నిర్వహిస్తారు. అరణ్యవాసంలో ఉన్న పాండవులు.. శ్రీకృష్ణుని సలహా మేరకు అనంత పద్మనాభ వ్రతం చేశారని పురాణ కథనం. ఆధ్యాత్మిక సాధనకు, ధర్మకామ్య సిద్ధికి అనంత వ్రతం ఉత్తమ సాధనంగా చెబుతారు. పద్మనాభుడి అర్చనలో మహావిష్ణువు పానుపు అయిన అనంతుడిని ఆరాధిస్తారు. వ్రతం విధివిధానాలు భవిష్యోత్తర పురాణంలో వివరించారు. పిండితోగానీ, దర్భలతోగానీ ఏడు పడగల సర్పాన్ని తయారుచేసి అష్టదళ పద్మమంటపంపై గానీ, కలశంపై గానీ అనంతస్వామిని ప్రతిష్ఠించి షోడశోపచార పూజలు నిర్వర్తిస్తారు. కలశంలో పవిత్ర జలాలలో యమునా నదిని ఆవాహన చేసి వ్రతం కొనసాగిస్తారు. పూజలో భాగంగా 14 ముడులు కలిగిన ఎర్రని తోరాలను స్వామి దగ్గర ఉంచుతారు. తోరాలలోని 14 ముడులు ఒక్కో దేవతకు సంకేతంగా చెబుతారు. దిక్పాలకులు, రవి, వరుణుడు, అగ్ని, ఇంద్రుడు, ఉపేంద్రుడు, యముడు, బ్రహ్మ, చంద్రుడు, జీవుడు, శివుడు, వాయువు, అశ్విని దేవతల సాక్షిగా వ్రతాన్ని ఆచరిస్తున్నామని...

title: Incautan 591 kilos de cocaína camuflado en carga de banano en el Puerto
creator: Yeinnis Hincapie
content: Un millonario cargamento de cocaína fue incautado por la Policía Antinarcóticos de control portuario y aeroportuario de Santa Marta este domingo. Fueron 591 kilos de cocaína los incautadas, que iban camufladas en contenedores de banano cargados del alcaloide. De acuerdo a la información que reposaba en las guías aduaneras, el cargamento de cocaína tenía como destino la terminal marítima de Amberes (Bélgica) en el continente europeo. Así lo confirmó hace unos minutos el General William Salamanca Ramírez, director de la Policía Nacional, a través de su cuenta X, “Cocaína entre bananos! En el puerto de Santa Marta, camuflados entre un contenedor cargado de fruta con destino Amberes (Bélgica), incautamos 591 kilos de cocaína, equivalentes a más de 1,4 millones de dosis, valoradas en 20 millones de euros”. Según la Policía, con esta incautación se logró evitar que 20 millones de euros ingresaran a las arcas de las organizaciones en narcoterroristas en el Caribe colombiano.

title: Luke Littler beats Michael Smith to win World Series of Darts Finals
creator: PA Media: Sport
content: Luke Littler continued his meteoric rise by winning the Jack’s World Series of Darts Finals with a crushing victory over Michael Smith in Amsterdam. The teenager powered to an 11-4 triumph in Sunday night’s final after seeing off home favourite Michael van Gerwen by the same scoreline in his semi-final hours earlier. Former world champion Smith took an early 2-1 lead in the final but checkouts of 140 and 130 turned the match around. A moment he is quickly getting used to... 🏆 Luke Littler lifts high the 2024 World Series of Darts Finals trophy! How many more will he win this year? — PDC Darts (@OfficialPDC) Smith hit back to level at 3-3 but the momentum was with Littler, who reeled off seven successive legs to open up a 10-3 advantage. Smith briefly rallied with a 170 checkout but Littler soon finished off matters to claim his third World Series title after successes in Bahrain and Poland earlier this year. Littler told pdc.tv: “This time last year I was playing on the Development Tour; my name was getting mentioned but after the World Championship everyone knew who I was. “I’m going to keep building on this and winning more. It’s a busy schedule coming up and I’m ready for it.”

title: Justin Jefferson breaks San Francisco 49ers' ankles and NFL record with 97-yard touchdown
creator: Tom Beattie
content: Minnesota Vikings star with a mesmerizing 97-yard touchdown catch and run versus the . An incredible throw from Sam Darnold from his team's end zone was caught perfectly by as a footrace then ensued, in which he burned past two opponents downfield before the wide receiver scored the first touchdown of the contest. The inspired scenes led to rapturous celebrations on field as established a 10-0 lead with 9:35 remaining of the second quarter. Last season, the former LSU star finished over 1,000 yards, while only tallying up five touchdowns in a mixed campaign. Jefferson came into the clash having caught four passes for 59 yards and a touchdown in the thrilling 28-6 win over the in Week 1. However, he could not have predicted producing a moment at U.S. Bank Stadium which will go down in the history books - as the TD pass set a new record as the longest ever in the league. The pass from Darnold to Jefferson is the new standard-bearer, with the previous being a 96-yard pass from Tobin Rote to Billy Grimes for the back in 1950. This was not the only milestone Jefferson will be celebrating reaching following the clash with the 49ers either, with the Vikings ace having passed 6000 career receiving yards during the game. In reaching this landmark in 62 games, this put him level in terms of being the fastest player in history to reach that figure. The play garnered widespread praise on social media as fans lauded both Darnold and Jefferson for their efforts, as one user said:...

title: Cleo Smith’s parents share heartwarming update three years after horror kidnapping
creator: Blair Jackson
content: In further signs kidnapping victim Cleo Smith is adjusting well to her normal life after her horror kidnapping three years ago, her parents have shared an update on the young girl. Images shared this week show Cleo, now seven, receiving gymnastics awards. The gymnastics images, shared on Sunday, show Cleo is all smiles, holding a medal and ribbons after a routine on the balance beam. “Such a beautiful brave girl who Australia got to know. Glad she is doing so well and you should be so proud of your gymnastics achievement,” one commenter said. “I love seeing an update on how she is going.” Cleo was kidnapped from a campsite 1000km north of Perth in October 2021. Police found the then-four-year-old 18 days later, not far from her family home. Terence Kelly is appealing a 13-year and six-month prison sentence he received for the incident. Cleo’s abduction from her sleeping bag on a family holiday garnered international headlines. A huge search operation was launched around the remote town of Carnarvon, in northwest Western Australia, and hundreds of kilometres up and down stretches of the coast. After 18 days, officers found Cleo in Kelly’s Carnarvon home during a late-night raid. Kelly was arrested near the home, and he has been in custody in Perth since. At the sentencing hearing, the court was told while the child was being held, Kelly tried to tie her up with sticky tape, but it did not work so he tied her to a chair. Cleo had also heard her name mentioned on the radio, the...

Kamala Harris More Likely to Win Alaska Than Florida or Texas—Nate Silver
content: Polling analyst said on Sunday that Vice President , the Democratic presidential nominee, is more likely to win Alaska than Florida or Texas in November's election. The only time a Democratic presidential candidate won Alaska was in 1964 when President Lyndon B. Johnson was elected. The Party has carried the state by comfortable double-digit margins in recent cycles, however, former President 's margin did shrink in the Last Frontier State between 2016 and 2020. Silver, who is the founder of News' poll aggregator FiveThirtyEight and considered one of the leading polling analysts in the United States, created a presidential model for November's election, which has given some insight into Harris' chances in Alaska. "Our model gives Harris a 22 percent chance of carrying Alaska: considerably higher than her chances in Florida or Texas, for instance," Silver said in a Substack blog post from Sunday. He continued: "Its Voter Power Index—essentially, the marginal value of an additional vote—is actually the seventh-highest in the country because although there's only about 1 percent chance that it's the tipping-point state, it also has relatively few voters. (Only 344,000 in 2020, when Trump won it by 10 points.)" Silver is no longer affiliated with ABC News or FiveThirtyEight. reached out to Harris and Trump's campaigns via email for comment on Sunday evening. In his first election against , Trump carried the state by nearly 15 points, but that went down to a lead of 10 points...

title: Cardinals' Marvin Harrison Jr. erupts with 2 first-half touchdowns after frustrating Week 1 performance
content: After making only one catch in a disappointing NFL debut, Arizona Cardinals rookie receive Marvin Harrison Jr. showed Sunday why he was one of the top draft prospects in the 2024 class. Harrison, the fourth pick in last April’s draft, caught four passes for 130 yards and two touchdowns in the first half against the Los Angeles Rams , helping Arizona to a 24-3 halftime lead. Harrison’s second game got off to a fast start. Kyler Murray fed him for a 23-yard catch-and-run touchdown at 11:03 in the first quarter, opening the scoring. With 8:47 left in the first quarter, Murray found Harrison for a 60-yard touchdown, Harrison’s second catch of the game. MARVIN HARRISON JR. AGAIN! 📺: #LARvsAZ on FOX 📱: https://t.co/waVpO909ge pic.twitter.com/HhxHcm3knr — NFL (@NFL) September 15, 2024 Harrison showcased his speed in both of his first-down touchdown receptions. Per NFL Next Gen Stats, Harrison’s max speed on his first touchdown catch was 18 mph. His second touchdown reception had a max speed of 20.03 mph, according to NFL Next Gen Stats. Both of those speeds were faster than Harrison’s max speed in all of Week 1, which was 16.7 mph. Advertisement It was an arrival to the NFL moment for Harrison, who entered the league with high expectations. Harrison, the son of Hall of Famer Marvin Harrison Sr., was a unanimous two-time All-American and first-team All-Big Ten performer at Ohio State. Harrison only had one catch for 4 yards in the team’s Week 1 loss to the Buffalo Bills and appeared...

title: Jordan Burroughs, James Green qualify for U.S. wrestling world team
content: Two wrestlers with New Jersey and Nebraska ties who seemed like their careers were over earned berths on the United States team for the Senior World Wrestling Championships on Sunday. The tournament which includes only non-Olympic weights will be held October 28-31 in Tirana, Albania. Burroughs defeated rival Chance Marsteller - a New Jersey Regional Training Center athlete - in two straight matches in the best-of-3 finals at 79 kg. Green, likewise, blanked Alec Panteleo at 70 kg. The competition was held in Omaha, Neb. in the same state where they were both college stars at the University of Nebraska. Burroughs was a state champion at Winslow Township High School and Green at Willingboro. The 36-year-old Burroughs - who owns a U.S. record seven world gold medals - announced this would be his last year of competition . When he lost in the Olympic Trials to Jason Nolf in the challenge tournament finals at 74 kg, it appeared that might be the end of his historic career. But recently Burroughs announced he would compete in the 79 kg competition at the non-Olympic weight trials and was given the No. 2 seed behind Marsteller. Burroughs defeated Marsteller, two matches to one, in the World Team Trials in 2022 , but Marsteller returned the favor in 2023, stunning Burroughs in the Sicklerville native’s home state. Burroughs reached the final with three wins on Saturday, including rallying from a 2-0 deficit to defeat Alex Dieringer in the semifinal. Dieringer took off his shoes at...

title: تازة.. درك وادي أمليل يوقــف شخصا متهما برشق القطار بالحجارة
creator: ي.الضميري
content: ع محياوي _ هبة بريس في اطار حملاتها الامنية من اجل التصدي الى مختلف أنواع الجريمة خاصة منها التي تلحق خسائر مادية بوسائل النقل العمومي ، تمكنت عناصر الدرك الملكي بوادي امليل اليوم الأحد 15 شتنبر الجاري، من إيقاف شخص يعيش بدون مأوى قار يشتبه في تورطه في جريمة إلحاق خسائر مادية بقطارات المسافرين التي تمر عبر وادي امليل في اتجاه مدن الشرق او الغرب. المشتبه فيه استهدف القطارات أكثر من مرة بواسطة الرشق بالحجارة ، والتي قد تشكل خطرا على سلامة المسافرين وتعرضهم للمخاطر. هدا ويخضع المتهم الى تدابير الحراسة النظرية بتعليمات من النيابة العامة المختصة رهن اشارة البحث لتحديد جميع حيثيات القضية وتحديد جميع الأفعال المنسوبة اليه وسيتم تقديمه للعدالة لتقول كلمتها في حقه. *الصورة من الأرشيف

title: Carrarese, Shpendi: "Rammaricati per il risultato, Sassuolo più esperto di noi"
content: L'attaccante della Carrarese Stiven Shpendi commenta così il match perso per 2-0 contro il Sassuolo: "Siamo rammaricati per il risultato finale, abbiamo disputato un’ottima partita contro un avversario più esperto di noi e di alto livello qualitativo e tecnico - le parole riportate dal sito ufficiale del club -. Il risultato non rende giustizia a quanto si è visto in campo. Non siamo riusciti a portare a casa punti, è vero, ma scendendo in campo con questa mentalità sono sicuro che riusciremo a toglierci delle soddisfazioni durante l’arco della stagione. Sono dispiaciuto per il goal annullato, magari avrebbe cambiato l’inerzia della sfida e inoltre sarebbe stato davvero emozionante segnare la mia prima rete con questa maglia davanti ad uno scenario di pubblico simile, che con grande entusiasmo ci ha trascinato per tutti i 90 minuti. Darò tutto me stesso per riuscire a sbloccarmi già dalla prossima gara, ci sarà un livello agonistico importante poiché sono tanti anni che non giochiamo contro lo Spezia; dunque, sarà una partita delicata, ma il gruppo è unito e la voglia di fare bene non mancherà", ha concluso.

title: Bahraich wolf attacks: Adityanath conducts aerial survey of Mahsi, meets affected families
content: Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath on Sunday (September 15, 2024) assured the residents of Mahis tehsil that the forest department, district administration and police will continue working until the wolf threat ends . He also conducted an aerial survey of the region and met families of those who lost their lives in the recent wolf attacks during the human-wildlife conflict. The priority is to capture the remaining wolf safely and shooting it will be the last resort, said Mr. Adityanath who also met the injured and inquired about their well-being. According to an official statement, the Chief Minister assessed the relief efforts, including the compensation provided and medical assistance given to the injured. While addressing the media, Mr. Adityanath emphasised that the safety of the public is the government's top priority and said that the forest department, district administration and police, will continue working in the area until the threat is fully eliminated. Also read | Bahraich wolf attack: Massive search operation underway to catch ‘killer’ wolves "The government has classified human-wildlife conflict as a disaster. In the event of loss of life, an immediate compensation of ₹5 lakh is provided to the victim's family. Anti-rabies treatment has also been made available for those injured in wild animal attacks," he said. The chief minister further said 25 teams, comprising 165 personnel from the forest department, have been deployed to ensure public safety....

title: Police: 4 killed after multi-vehicle crash in southeast Dallas
content: DALLAS -- A vehicle crossed into oncoming traffic on a Dallas interstate and collided with two other vehicles in a crash that left four people dead, police said. The multi-vehicle accident happened about 1 p.m. Saturday on Interstate 45 in southeast Dallas, police spokesperson Michael Dennis said in a statement. A preliminary investigation determined a vehicle was northbound on I-45 when it hit a second vehicle and then crossed the median into southbound traffic, where it struck two more vehicles. Dennis said three people in the northbound vehicle died at the scene, and a fourth person in one of the southbound vehicles died at a hospital. Two other people were hospitalized in unknown condition, Dennis said. The cause of the accident remains under investigation, and the names of those killed and injured weren't immediately released.

title: 英 매체 “손흥민, 영향력 없었어”...북런던더비 부진에 혹평 + 평점 꼴찌
creator: 매일경제
content: 팀의 참패와 함께 침묵한 손흥민은 현지 매체로부터 혹평을 받을 수밖에 없었다. 손흥민의 소속팀 토트넘은 15일(한국시간) 잉글랜드 런던 토트넘 핫스퍼 스타디움에서 열린 2024-25시즌 프리미어리그 4라운드 아스널과 홈경기에서 0-1 패배를 당했다. 이날 경기 토트넘은 주축 선수들이 대거 부상으로 이탈한 라이벌 아스널을 상대로 경기를 주도했지만 후반 19분 코너킥 상황에서 가브리에우 마갈량이스에게 실점하며 홈에서 패했다. 굴욕적인 결과를 맞이했다. 2010년대 들어서며 프리미어리그 상위권에 진입하며 빅클럽으로 성장한 토트넘은 아스널을 상대로도 한때 우위를 점하는 듯했지만 최근 5경기에서 1무 4패를 기록하게 됐다. 더욱이 홈에서 3연패를 당하며 부진했다. 손흥민 또한 아쉬운 모습을 보였다. 손흥민은 도미닉 솔랑케, 브레넌 존슨, 제임스 매디슨, 데얀 쿨루셉스키와 함께 팀의 공격을 이끌었다. 본래 포지션인 좌측 윙어로 선발 출전해 풀타임을 소화했지만 침묵했다. 지난 10일 오만과의 2026 북중미 월드컵 아시아 3차 예선 2차전에서 득점포를 가동하며 라이벌 아스널과의 경기에서도 날카로움을 보여줄 것으로 기대받았지만 팀의 아쉬운 활약 속 이렇다 할 기회를 잡지 못하며 고개를 숙여야만 했다. 손흥민은 이번 경기 풀타임 소화하며 볼터치 57회, 패스정확도 86%, 키패스 1회, 드리블 돌파 4회 중 2회 성공, 가로채기 1회를 기록했다. 한 차례 슈팅 기회를 맞이했었지만 상대 수비 블록에 가로막혔고, 유효 슈팅은 단...

title: இந்தியாவுக்கு எதிரான டெஸ்ட் தொடா்: வங்கதேச கேப்டன் ஷண்டோ நம்பிக்கை
creator: Din
content: இந்தியாவுக்கு எதிரான தொடரில் சிறப்பாக செயல்படுவோம் என வங்கதேச அணியின் கேப்டன் நஜ்முல் ஷண்டோ நம்பிக்கை தெரிவித்துள்ளாா்.

title: Dan kad je Tito otvorio Poljud: Bio je simbol renesanse Splita, neviđeni pothvat oduševio je svijet
content: Na današnji dan prije 45 godina otvoren je Poljud , po mnogim stručnjacima arhitektonsko remek-djelo i magični Hajdukov stadion , osvijetljen sa 630 reflektora, a noću podsjeća na spušteni svemirski brod. Oblik školjka uklapa se u vizuru Mediterana , do kojeg gotovo da dopire more. Poljud funkcionalnošću i tehničkim značajkama spada u vrh svjetskih standarda. Izgrađen 1979. godine, u sklopu mega-projekta organizacije Mediteranskih Igara veličanstveni Poljud otvorio predsjednik bivše SFRJ-a Josip Broz Tito , a Đurđica Bjedov , Miro Cerar i Stipe Božić podigli su zastavu MIS-a na počasni jarbol. Nakon himne 'Hej Slaveni' odsvirana je i 'Lijepa naša'. Prva utakmica koju je Hajduk odigrao na Poljudu dogodila se četiri dana kasnije protiv Trabzonspora u šesnaestini finala Kupa prvaka. Pred 55.000 gledatelja, Hajduk je slavio 1:0, a povijesni pogodak postigao je Boro Primorac iz jedanaesterca. Najposjećenija utakmica bila je ona između Hajduka i Dinama 1982. godine. Službeno je prodano 51,5 tisuća ulaznica, a po neslužbenoj procjeni na stadion se natiskalo 65 tisuća ljudi. Infrastrukturna renesansa Splita nadživjela državu U vrijeme kada je Split bio određen kao domaćin Mediteranskih igara, nije imao niti jedan važniji objekt koji bi zadovoljio potrebe i zahtjeve te sportske manifestacije. Najdugoročniji cilj Igara bila je infrastrukturna renesansa Splita, koja je nadživjela tadašnju politiku te na kraju i državu organizatora. Autor projekta...

title: Carlos Espí abre el melón
content: El tanto que anotó Carlos Espí contra el Eldense colocó en una dimensión superior al canterano. Su aportación en el primer equipo granota bajo la tutela de Julián Calero, insistente ante el Cartagena y acertada frente al Eldense, provoca que deje de ser considerado como una apuesta a futuro y pase a ser una pieza de gran utilidad en la escalada hacia el ascenso a Primera. Son 19 años, pero sus vestiduras de delantero, todavía por desarrollar, y sobre todo su entusiasmo y ambición por triunfar en Orriols hacen que sea un recurso muy a tener en cuenta. Su entrada al terreno de juego contra el Eldense sirvió para desatascar un partido en el que, debido a las dos expulsiones del adversario, tocó derribar la muralla visitante en la retaguardia. Los dirigidos por Julián Calero trataron de masticar a su rival con tal de desgastarlo, pero la entrada de Espí sirvió para que los defensas rivales recularan su posición, tuvieran dificultades para cubrir su marca por su envergadura y hundir una línea que marcó mucho su posición. Desde las cercanías del área anotó el gol que sirvió para despejar el camino hacia la victoria y hacer que Orriols se rindiera a sus capacidades, consciente de que en el ‘38’ está el delantero del futuro del Levante. Su diana, de hecho, sirvió para quitarse la espina de sus oportunidades erradas contra el Cartagena. En Cartagonova jugó seis minutos y generó tres ocasiones de gol, con el infortunio de que ninguna pasó la línea de gol....

title: THY kaç kişinin kara listeye alındığını açıkladı
content: Dün İstanbul-Londra seferini yapan THY uçağının seferi öncesi kabin ekibine küfreden yolcu havayolu şirketi tarafından kara listeye alınarak uçuşlardan men edilmişti. Uçuş güvenliğinin öncelikleri olduğunu ifade eden THY Genel Müdürü Bilal Ekşi yaptığı paylaşımda, “Uçuş güvenliğini tehdit eden, ekiplerimize sözlü ve fiili saldırıda bulunanları prosedür gereği süreli veya süresiz uçuştan men listesine alıyor ve kişiler hakkında suç duyurusunda bulunuyoruz. Bu şekilde listede 440 kişi bulunuyor" açıklamasında bulundu.

title: 4 Catatan Anggota DPR soal Perundungan di PPDS Undip
content: 4 Catatan Anggota DPR soal Perundungan di PPDS Undip Isal Mawardi - detikNews Senin, 16 Sep 2024 04:41 WIB Saleh Daulay (Foto: dok. PAN) Jakarta - Universitas Diponegoro (Undip) mengakui ada kasus bullying atau perundungan di dalam Program Pendidikan Dokter Spesialis (PPDS). Anggota Komisi IX DPR Saleh Partaonan Daulay menyebut aparat penegak hukum harus proaktif menindaklanjuti pernyataan Undip dan pihak RS Kariadi. "Kelihatannya, Undip dan RS Kariadi ingin membuka kasus ini. Harus disambut secara proaktif oleh aparat penegak hukum. Apalagi, sudah ada pelaporan yang disampaikan secara resmi ke pihak kepolisian," ujar Saleh kepada detikcom , Minggu (15/9/2024). "Bagi kita, seluruh jenis perundungan harus dihentikan. Bertentangan dengan semangat pendidikan dan pelayanan kesehatan. Masyarakat pasti mendukung agar kasus ini dihentikan secepatnya," katanya. ADVERTISEMENT SCROLL TO CONTINUE WITH CONTENT Saleh memberikan beberapa catatan terkait kasus perundungan ini. Pertama, setiap orang yang bersalah harus dimintai pertanggungjawabannya sesuai peran dan tingkat kesalahannya. Tidak boleh ada pilih kasih. Menurut Saleh, keadilan harus ditegakkan. Baca juga: Dekan FK Undip Akui Adanya Perundungan PPDS, Ini Respons Kemenkes "Kedua, penelusuran kasus perundungan ini tidak boleh dibatasi hanya di Undip. Semua kampus yang melaksanakan PPDS harus diperiksa. Semua harus ditangani secara menyeluruh," kata Saleh. ADVERTISEMENT Ketiga, guru besar dan dosen pembimbing diminta untuk ikut...

title: Miosgas Sendung von Demonstrantinnen gestört
Donald Trump was the subject of apparent assassination attempt, FBI says
content: WASHINGTON — The FBI said Sunday it was investigating “what appears to be an attempted assassination” of Donald Trump at his golf club in West Palm Beach, Florida, just nine weeks after the Republican presidential nominee survived another attempt on his life. Palm Beach County Sheriff Ric Bradshaw said the U.S. Secret Service agents fired at a man pointing an AK-style rifle with a scope into the club as Trump was on the course. Bradshaw said the gunman also had two backpacks hanging on a fence and a GoPro camera, and that he was about 400 yards to 500 yards away from Trump and hiding in shrubbery while the former president played golf on a nearby hole. The person dropped the weapon and fled in an SUV, and was later taken into custody in a neighboring county. No injuries were reported. The incident was the latest jarring moment in a campaign year marked by unprecedented upheaval. It occurred roughly two months after Trump was shot during an assassination attempt at a rally in Pennsylvania, and a bullet grazed his ear. Only a week later, President Joe Biden withdrew from the race. In an email to supporters, Trump said: “Nothing will slow me down. I will NEVER SURRENDER!” The golf course was partially shut down for Trump as he played, and agents were a few holes ahead of him when they noticed the person with the firearm, Bradshaw said. There are several areas around the perimeter of the property where golfers are visible from the fence line. Secret Service agents and officers...

title: FBI geht von mutmaßlichem Attentat auf Trump aus
סגנו של טראמפ: "הוא במצב רוח טוב, הלילה אחבק את ילדיי חזק במיוחד"
content: ג'יי די ואנס, סגנו המיועד של המועמד הרפובליקני לנשיאות ארה"ב דונלד טראמפ, התייחס לתקרית הירי במועדון הגולף שבבעלות טראמפ בפלורידה, ואמר כי "אני שמח שהנשיא טראמפ בטוח. דיברתי איתו לפני שהחדשות היו פומביות, והוא היה, למרבה הפלא, במצב רוח טוב". לדבריו, "יש עדיין הרבה שאנחנו לא יודעים, אבל אני אחבק את הילדים שלי חזק במיוחד הלילה ואומר תפילת הכרת תודה".

title: Carr, Kamara help Saints end Cowboys' 16-game home win streak in regular season with 44-19 win
creator: By SCHUYLER DIXON - AP Pro Football Writer
content: ARLINGTON, Texas (AP) — Derek Carr spent the offseason asking himself how he could have a faster start in a second season with the New Orleans Saints. What amounted in his mind to a doubling up of plays in practice was one of the answers, and it's sure working so far. Alvin Kamara scored four touchdowns, including a 57-yarder on a screen pass , and the Saints ended Dallas’ 16-game home winning streak in the regular season with a 44-19 victory over the Cowboys on Sunday. Carr threw for 243 yards and two TDs to go along with a 1-yard sneak for a score, and the Saints (2-0) got touchdowns on their first six drives a week after setting a franchise record by starting the season with points on nine consecutive possessions in a 47-10 rout of Carolina . The 33-year-old Carr started slowly a year ago, and the Saints ended up missing the playoffs on tiebreakers. It stuck with a quarterback who has made the playoffs just twice and gotten a chance to play just once over 11 seasons, the first nine with the Raiders before the switch to New Orleans. “I promised our team, and I promised our city I would do anything,” Carr said. “I know it’s not going to be perfect, but I will do everything in my power, exhaust everything that I could even begin to imagine to try to just be better this year. So far we’ve started off good.” It was actually the second straight loss at AT&T Stadium for the Cowboys (1-1) after their 48-32 wild-card shocker against Green Bay last January. A week after holding...

Premios Emmy 2024: llega la batalla entre 'The Bear' y 'Shogun' que ya ganó Disney
creator: Jorge Álvarez
es
content: Es 15 de septiembre. Los , el evento más importante de la televisión a nivel mundial, ya está aquí. El de Los Ángeles está listo y preparado para acoger una gala que recupera su fecha habitual, después de que la que hizo temblar Hollywood el año pasado, obligase a posponer hasta este año la edición de 2023. Sin embargo, en poco más de medio año, los protagonistas y los títulos de las series de televisión que se la juegan esta noche han cambiado. Si en enero, los Premios Emmy se despedían de la familia Roy con una , en la emocionante gala de este domingo son dos las series que pugnarán por ocupar la plaza que deja libre la serie de HBO en el trono de la ficción de la temporada: son la épica e histórica y la asfixiante e independiente , , las que lideran todas las apuestas. Con un total de 25 nominaciones, , la serie ambientada en el Japón del siglo XVII que produce una división que forma parte del conglomerado Walt Disney, se postula como la gran favorita de los Premios Emmy 2024. No obstante, ya ha ganado 14 premios en las categorías técnicas de los , una gala celebrada hace siete días en la que se reconocen aspectos como el diseño de producción, la fotografía y la edición de sonido. Premios que convierten a la ficción en uno de los productos más galardonados del año, y aún tiene la posibilidad de llevarse otros seis premios en la gala principal. competirá por el título de mejor serie dramática frente a grandes producciones como (con 18...

title: Полиция рассказала, как далеко от Трамп произошла стрельба
content: ВАШИНГТОН, 16 сен – РИА Новости. Стрельба у гольф-клуба экс-президента США Дональда Трампа в штате Флорида произошла примерно в 270-450 метрах от политика, сообщил шериф округа Палм-Бич Рик Брэдшоу. "Вероятно, от 300 до 500 ярдов (270-450 метрах - ред.). Но с винтовкой и таким оптическим прицелом это не такое уж большое расстояние", – сказал Брэдшоу в ходе пресс-конференции. Ранее официальный представитель Секретной службы США, обеспечивающей безопасность первых лиц государства, Энтони Гульельми сообщил, что ведомство проводит расследование инцидента со стрельбой, который произошел в воскресенье неподалеку от места, где находился Трамп.

title: The latest on injuries to Lions captains Amon-Ra St. Brown, Alex Anzalone
content: DETROIT -- The Lions lost a game, and captains on both sides of the ball in the process. Linebacker Alex Anzalone left the 20-16 loss against Tampa to be evaluated for a brain injury and was ultimately ruled out. He’s now in concussion protocol, casting some doubt on his availability for next week’s game against the Arizona Cardinals. Anzalone has led Detroit in tackles both games this season, and calls the plays on defense. That is a big potential loss, although Jack Campbell and Derrick Barnes have logged a lot of snaps elsewhere at linebacker, while backups like Malcolm Rodriguez and Jalen Reeves-Maybin both have starting experience. Lots of good options are at hand for filling the void at linebacker. St. Brown, on the other hand, is an indispensable piece for the Lions’ suddenly up-and-down offense. The All-Pro wideout racked up 11 catches for 119 yards against Tampa, and made a tough play that advanced the ball to the goal line in the third quarter. That led to Detroit’s only touchdown of the day, and a brief 16-13 lead. But St. Brown was banged up on that play and briefly left the game. He later returned and made another key catch on the final series of the fourth quarter, but headed for the sideline again and collapsed once he got there. He appears to have suffered a lower-body injury and was seen limping out of the locker room after the game. Little is known about St. Brown’s status other than he’s not expected to miss extended time. “He’s all right,” head coach Dan...

title: Lilia Vu puts away Europe with closing birdie, US wins its first Solheim Cup since 2017
creator: By BEN NUCKOLS - AP Sports Writer
content: GAINESVILLE, Va. (AP) — Lilia Vu's teammates ran onto the 18th green after her kick-in of a birdie putt gave the United States the half-point it needed to beat Europe, and U.S. captain Stacy Lewis scooped up her 5-year-old daughter , Chesnee, for a bear hug. Finally, the Solheim Cup was back in the hands of the Americans. The Americans took a big early lead a year ago in Spain but let the cup slip out of their grasp on the final day as Europe rallied for a 14-14 tie to retain it. They only had to wait one year for their next chance because of a change in the competition schedule. Then, with the cup nearly in their grasp Sunday at Robert Trent Jones Golf Club, they brought a collapse into play during a tense hour-plus when everything went Europe's way. “That was the longest hour and a half of my life. I'm not going to lie,” Lewis said. “It just felt like it was never going to end. Just really nerve-wracking. You felt pretty helpless.” Ultimately it was Vu, the No. 2 player in the women's world ranking, who delivered a 300-yard drive and a flawless wedge from 103 yards on the par-4 18th hole while 1 down against rookie Albane Valenzuela. Although Vu's 2-foot putt was a formality, Valenzuela did not concede it, allowing the Americans a proper winning moment . “This week was kind of hard for me. I felt like I wasn’t physically 100%, and I almost felt guilty taking that spot from someone else,” said Vu, who's still recovering from a back injury. “Luckily, I have the best team...

You felt pretty helpless.” Ultimately it was Vu, the No. 2 player in the women's world ranking, who delivered a 300-yard drive and a flawless wedge from 103 yards on the par-4 18th hole while 1 down against rookie Albane Valenzuela. Although Vu's 2-foot putt was a formality, Valenzuela did not concede it, allowing the Americans a proper winning moment . “This week was kind of hard for me. title: Lilia Vu puts away Europe with closing birdie, US wins its first Solheim Cup since 2017
creator: By BEN NUCKOLS - AP Sports Writer
content: GAINESVILLE, Va. (AP) — Lilia Vu's teammates ran onto the 18th green after her kick-in of a birdie putt gave the United States the half-point it needed to beat Europe, and U.S. captain Stacy Lewis scooped up her 5-year-old daughter , Chesnee, for a bear hug. Finally, the Solheim Cup was back in the hands of the Americans. The Americans took a big early lead a year ago in Spain but let the cup slip out of their grasp on the final day as Europe rallied for a 14-14 tie to retain it. They only had to wait one year for their next chance because of a change in the competition schedule. Then, with the cup nearly in their grasp Sunday at Robert Trent Jones Golf Club, they brought a collapse into play during a tense hour-plus when everything went Europe's way. “That was the longest hour and a half of my life. I'm not going to lie,” Lewis said. “It just felt like it was never going to end. Just really nerve-wracking. You felt pretty helpless.” Ultimately it was Vu, the No. 2 player in the women's world ranking, who delivered a 300-yard drive and a flawless wedge from 103 yards on the par-4 18th hole while 1 down against rookie Albane Valenzuela. Although Vu's 2-foot putt was a formality, Valenzuela did not concede it, allowing the Americans a proper winning moment . “This week was kind of hard for me. I felt like I wasn’t physically 100%, and I almost felt guilty taking that spot from someone else,” said Vu, who's still recovering from a back injury. “Luckily, I have the best team...

title: Donald Trump a-t-il été la cible d’une nouvelle tentative d’assassinat ?
creator: Paris Match
content: La police fédérale américaine FBI a annoncé dimanche qu’elle enquêtait sur une « tentative d’assassinat » présumée visant l’ancien président Donald Trump après des tirs près de lui alors qu’il jouait au golf chez lui en Floride. Donald Trump est « sain et sauf » après des tirs près de lui, a annoncé dimanche son équipe de campagne, deux mois après une tentative d’assassinat qui a visé le candidat républicain à la présidentielle américaine. Alors que les tensions et les menaces de violence sont élevées à une cinquantaine de jours de l’élection du 5 novembre, l’ex-président, qui se trouvait dans son club de golf en Floride selon des médias, est « sain et sauf après des coups de feu à proximité de lui », a déclaré dans un communiqué Steven Cheung, directeur de la communication de sa campagne. Le Secret Service, chargé de la protection des présidents, anciens présidents et personnalités politiques de premier plan, a annoncé sur X qu’il « enquêtait avec le bureau du shérif du comté de Palm Beach sur un incident concernant l’ancien président Donald Trump qui s’est déroulé peu avant 14H00 (18H00 GMT) ». « L’ancien président est sain et sauf », a confirmé le Secret Service. Son responsable de la communication Anthony Guglielmi a par ailleurs annoncé sur X un point presse plus tard dans la journée pour donner des « détails supplémentaires ». Les tirs ont eu lieu sur le parcours de golf au moment où l’ex-président pratiquait l’une de...

title: Promipyme y Supérate acuerdan beneficiar a mil mujeres emprendedoras
creator: El Nuevo Diario
content: EL NUEVO DIARIO, SANTO DOMINGO. – Fabricio Gómez Mazara, director general de Promipyme, y Gloria Reyes, directora del Programa Supérate, firmaron un acuerdo para beneficiar unas mil emprendedoras de distintas provincias del país. Según informaron, través de este acuerdo, las mujeres recibirán créditos de Promipyme, complementados con el apoyo del Programa Supérate. Al felicitar el trabajo de Gloria Reyes, Gómez Mazara subrayó que la mejor política pública es aquella que logra integrar a las mujeres emprendedoras al sistema productivo, generando un impacto en la sostenibilidad del crecimiento económico. “Promipyme es un aliado permanente de Supérate, y su objetivo es cambiar vidas, especialmente a través del emprendimiento y el acceso al crédito”, afirmó. De su lado, la directora del Programa Supérate aseguró que todas las beneficiarias del programa continuarán recibiendo sus subsidios. Reyes expresó su deseo de que estas “decididas mujeres” se formalicen, avancen en su camino de superación y crecimiento, y aprovechen todas las oportunidades que el sector financiero ofrece para apoyar su desarrollo. “La importancia de este acuerdo es que consolida y fortalece nuestra misión de apoyar a estas mujeres en su camino hacia el desarrollo. Las emprendedoras que participen no perderán sus subsidios aunque reciban financiamiento de Promipyme”, agregó Reyes. El acuerdo fue suscrito como parte del programa “Tú Puedes Mujer”, con el objetivo de crear condiciones...

title: Habla Yamil Arana, gobernador de Bolívar, tras FestiJazz en Mompox: “Ha sido el mejor de la historia”
content: Luego de varios días de la décima versión del Festival de Jazz, en Mompox, Bolívar, el gobernador Yamil Arana, habló del evento que dinamizó la economía de esta zona de su departamento asegurando que “ha sido el mejor de la historia”. De igual manera, el mandatario sostuvo que hubo un impulso a la apuesta turística de Bolívar que terminó este sábado con un balance altamente positivo en materia de espectáculos, difusión de la cultura y generación de empleo. “Fueron tres días de conciertos musicales, pero desde el día 10 de septiembre se programaron actividades folclóricas, culturales y literarias con el firme propósito de tener eventos para todos los gustos”, dijo Arana. Y es que medio de las muestras culturales hubo ferias como ExpoBolivar, Mompox Sostenible, así como la pasarela Ixel Itinerante - Macondia & Marca Bolívar y las charlas del Hay Festival, se destacaron en la programación y marcaron la diferencia. Después del gran concierto musical del viernes, en el que Carlos Vives demostró su amor por Mompox y lo que esta población significa para la conformación de la identidad musical del Caribe. El esperado show se convirtió en un homenaje al Caribe a través de alegorías a la cultura de los pueblos ribereños. Con éxitos como ‘Déjame entrar’, ‘La foto de los dos’, ‘Volví a nacer’, ‘La Bicicleta’, ‘La tierra del olvido’, entre otros, puso a bailar al público presente. Vives recordó la importancia de los ríos en la conformación de la...

title: Sun: в Британии умерла самая старая кошка в мире
creator: RT на русском
content: В Великобритании в возрасте 33 лет умерла кошка по кличке Рози, которая считалась самой старой в мире. Отмечается, что хозяйка питомца забрала кошку из приюта в 90-х годах. Согласно The Sun, титул «старейшей кошки в мире» был закреплён за ней неофициально, так как в прошлом году её хозяйка отказалась от предложения представительницы Книги рекордов Гиннесса подать соответствующую заявку. Ранее чёрная кошка намеревалась перебежать дорогу, но передумала, заметив приближающийся кортеж президента России Владимира Путина. Нетипичный для представителей семейства кошачьих этого окраса поступок попал на кадры видео. Также доктор ветеринарных наук, профессор кафедры ветеринарной медицины Университета РОСБИОТЕХ Андрей Руденко развеял распространённые мифы про животных из приюта.

title: Funerals held for teen boy and math teacher killed in Georgia high school shooting
creator: Associated Press
content: JEFFERSON, Ga. — Funeral services for a teenage boy remembered for his endearing smile and a math teacher known for her dedication to students were held Saturday, 10 days after both were killed by a gunman who opened fire at a Georgia high school. Family, friends and supporters of 14-year-old Mason Schermerhorn and teacher Cristina Irimie, 53, gathered to say farewell at separate afternoon services. They were among four people killed Sept. 4 at Apalachee High School by a shooter armed with an assault-style rifle. Another teacher and eight other students were injured. Irimie, who immigrated to the U.S. more than 20 years ago from her home country of Romania, was honored with a Romanian Orthodox service filled with chants and hymns. The ceremony alternated between English and Romanian. “We gather today to offer prayers for a noble soul,” one of the priests presiding over the service said. “Family members, friends, colleagues, and, in fact, many people throughout this nation and beyond are mourning the loss of a dear wife, daughter, sister, aunt, friend, parish member, colleague, teacher and fellow citizen.” There also was a large public outpouring at the memorial service for Schermerhorn, which was held at a civic center in Jefferson. The teen’s family requested that anyone attending the service wear red, which was his favorite color. Mason loved playing video games and liked Disney and Legos, his obituary said. He also loved spending time with his family. A neighbor, Tommy...

title: “Carlos Moved Too Quickly:” Sergio Perez Says It Was Wrong Timing That Caused the Crash in Baku
creator: Veerendra Vikram Singh
content: The Azerbaijan Grand Prix finished under Virtual Safety Car conditions after Carlos Sainz and Sergio Perez crashed out of the race on the penultimate lap while fighting for the final podium position. And while both teams lost big points as a result, the crash hurt Red Bull more than Ferrari as it resulted in McLaren overtaking them in the championship by a massive 20 points. The crash occurred after Perez’s failed overtake attempt on Charles Leclerc into turn one, which also cost him the position against Sainz. In his post-race interview with Sky Sports F1, Perez put the entire blame for the crash on Sainz. “Really a shame that it happened,” said Perez. “Yeah, I lost words to say because it cost a lot of points, a disaster to the championships. We definitely have a lot more on the table this weekend. In my opinion, Carlos moved too quickly to follow the tow from Charles, it’s just the wrong time, the wrong moment that ended up with a huge shunt.” Red Bull team principal Christian Horner also shared a similar sentiment as his driver and blamed Sainz for drifting across the circuit and into Perez. However, Sainz doesn’t believe he did anything wrong as he came back on the racing line behind his teammate.

title: Dua Lipa anuncia las fechas de su gira mundial para 2025
content: Este año Dua Lipa regresó a la escena musical, con el álbum Radical Optimism , y decidió comenzar su gira en junio, con shows en varios países de Europa y Asia. Pero la cantante ya planeó su agenda de conciertos para 2025, y a través de sus redes sociales compartió el calendario, en el que destacan muchas fechas en Estados Unidos. Dua Lipa revela qué dieta lleva cuando está de gira La segunda fase del tour comenzará el 20 de marzo en Melbourne, Australia, y para el 5 de septiembre de ese año Dua iniciará su recorrido por Estados Unidos, con un show en Chicago, Illinois. Ella anunció que en las próximas semanas se anunciarán más fechas. Hallan bombas de la Segunda Guerra Mundial en mansión de Dua Lipa A post shared by DUA LIPA (@dualipa) “¡¡Gira Radical Optimism 2025!! Dijeron que extrañan a la Dua de 2022′′ 🗣️😅 ¡¡Bueno, estaré avanzando por lo previsible y no puedo esperar a llevar este show hasta ustedes!!”, fue lo que escribió la artista de 29 años, quien el próximo 20 de septiembre se presentará en la T-Mobile Arena de Las Vegas. El anterior tour mundial de Dua Lipa, Future Nostalgia , tuvo mucho éxito, duró nueve meses y recaudó más de $100 millones de dólares. Ella actualmente promociona el sencillo “Illusion” , que ocupó el número 1 de la lista Dance de la revista Billboard y cuyo videoclip lleva más de 47 millones de vistas en YouTube . title: Tajna služba: Tramp je bio između 270 i 450 metara od naoružanog atentatora, ovo je puška koju je imao
creator: Aleksandar Petrović
content: Tajna služba je saopštila da je Donald Tramp bio na između 300 i 500 jardi (oko 270 i 450 metara) od napadača, koji se krio u žbunju. Agenti Tajne službe su reagovali nakon što je primećeno da napadač kod sebe ima predmet koji liči na cev od puške. U žbunju gde se on nalazio pronađeni su, pored puške, još i dva ranca i "go pro" kamera. Federalni istražni biro (FBI) je objavio fotografije pronađenog oružja i ranca. Podsećamo, ranije danas FBI je saopštio da je bivši predsednik i kandidat republikanaca na predstojećim predsedničkim izborima Donald Tramp bio predmet "očiglednog pokušaja ubistva" u njegovom golf klubu na Floridi. Bela kuća je nakon incidenta saopštila da su predsednik SAD Džozef Bajden i potpredsednica Kamala Haris obavešteni o bezbednosnom incidentu na Trampovom međunarodnom golf terenu, gde je bivši predsednik Tramp igrao golf . Tajna služba je odvela na sigurno bivšeg predsednika nakon što su agenti otvorili vatru na čoveka koji je primećen sa nečim što je možda bio pištolj dok je bivši predsednik bio na golf terenu, naveli su izvori iz policije, preneo je ranije Njujork post. (Telegraf.rs)

title: Conoce las propiedades del pebre y de sus ingredientes
creator: Redacción El Rancagüino
content: Tomate, cebolla, cilantro y ajo, un poco de sal, ají, aceite de oliva y ¡listo! Así de fácil resulta preparar un pebre, esa tradicional salsa chilena de raíces mestizas, cuyo origen no está documentado, pero se cree que proviene de la gastronomía mapuche y la introducción de ingredientes españoles, como el ajo o el cilantro. Pese a que las recetas varían, sus principales ingredientes contienen una serie de minerales y antioxidantes que, para estas celebraciones del “18”, lo pueden convertir en el mejor aliado. Considerando que las Fiestas Patrias traerán un mayor consumo de carne, embutidos y otros alimentos calóricos o grasos, el pebre permite equilibrar la ingesta de alimentos, aportando fibra y otros elementos que contribuyen a cuidar la salud. Así lo afirma la nutrióloga de Clínica Las Condes, Ximena Soto de Giorgis , quien asegura que esta preparación “puede ser un gran aliado para las fiestas patrias”. “Si te comes el choripán con pebre, sin duda va a ser mejor que el choripán sin pebre”, sostiene. ¿Cuáles son los beneficios de sus principales ingredientes? A continuación, la especialista entrega el detalle: Tomate Rico en antioxidantes : Contiene licopeno, un antioxidante que ayuda a combatir los radicales libres y puede reducir el riesgo de ciertos tipos de cáncer. Mejora la salud cardiovascular : El licopeno y otros nutrientes en el tomate pueden ayudar a reducir los niveles de colesterol malo (LDL) y mejorar la salud del corazón. Fuente de...

title: Amazonas: Captan a indefensos animales huyendo de los incendios forestales (VIDEO)
creator: Redacción Diario Correo
content: A través de redes sociales, difundieron un video de un grupo de capibaras (o ronsocos) huyendo de los incendios forestales en Tarapoto. Los animales van paso a paso en medio de la ciudad y esto sorprendió a varios ciudadanos, quienes aprovecharon para grabar la escena. Capibaras escapando de un incendio forestal en la selva de Tarapoto, Perú. Fuente: Redes Ucayali Noticias pic.twitter.com/tdFhXT7SYJ — Nuevo Ekisd (@Ekisd_xd) September 11, 2024 A parte de las pérdidas humanas, esta tragedia tiene un gran impacto ecológica, ya que el fuego destruyó gran parte del hábitat de especies en peligro de extinción. Incendios forestales en Perú: Registran 10 fallecidos, 96 heridos y 51 focos activos en sierra y selva Diez personas, en su mayoría adultos mayores, fallecieron debido a los incendios forestales en diferentes regiones del Perú. Asimismo, hay 96 heridos y 1.876 afectados. Asimismo, se registraron 51 focos activos en sierra y selva del Perú. En lo que va del año 2024, se contabilizan en 222 los incendios forestales en las últimas semanas, a nivel nacional. Además, se extinguieron 152 y 19 fueron controlados, según información del Instituto Nacional de Defensa Civil (Indeci). De las 20 que sufrían esta emergencia, ahora son 14 las regiones afectadas, de acuerdo con el Sistema Nacional de Información para la Prevención y Atención de Desastres (Sinpad). Las regiones más afectadas por los incendios forestales son Amazonas, Áncash, Apurímac, Ayacucho,...

إطلاق نار قرب تواجد ترمب بفلوريدا والقبض على مشتبه به - AARC مصر
content: نعرض لكم زوارنا أهم وأحدث الأخبار فى المقال الاتي: إطلاق نار قرب تواجد ترمب بفلوريدا والقبض على مشتبه به - AARC مصر, اليوم الاثنين 16 سبتمبر 2024 12:41 صباحاً وأكد ستيفن تشيونغ مدير الاتصالات بالحملة، في بيان، أن ترمب موجود في مدينة بالم بيتش بولاية فلوريدا وهو بخير، دون ذكر مزيد من التفاصيل. وقال جونيور نجل ترمب إنه تم إطلاق أعيرة نارية في ملعب الغولف في ويست بالم بيتش، مؤكدا أن سلطات الأمن المحلية عثرت على بندقية كلاشينكوف روسية. وبحسب وسائل إعلام أميركية فقد كان ترمب يلعب الغولف في ناديه ببالم بيتش، أثناء تبادل شخصين إطلاق النار خارج النادي، مؤكدة أن الرئيس الأميركي السابق لم يتعرض للخطر وقد جرى نقله إلى مكان آمن بشكل فوري. ونقلت شبكة (سي إن إن) عن مصادر أن المسؤولين يعتقدون أن ترامب كان المستهدف بإطلاق النار قرب ملعبه للغولف. وأضافت الشبكة أن السلطات عثرت في مكان الحادث على بندقية نصف آلية وحقيبة ظهر وكاميرا كانت معدة للتصوير. وأضاف الإعلام المحلي أن جهاز الخدمة السرية المرافق لترامب رد بإطلاق الرصاص باتجاه مصدر إطلاق النار. وعقب الحادث، أعلن المتحدث باسم الخدمة السرية أن ترمب في أمان، وكانت هناك محاولة لاغتياله، مبينا أن وحداته كانت قريبة من المكان وتعاملت فورا مع الحادث. بدوره، قال مكتب التحقيقات الفيدرالي: "استجبنا لحادث إطلاق النار ونحقق في ما يبدو أنها محاولة اغتيال للرئيس السابق ترمب". فيما أشار مدير شرطة بالم بيتش إلى أن المشتبه به كان مختبئا بين الشجيرات وكان ترمب على بعد 300-500 متر منه. من جهته، أعلن المدعي العام لمقاطعة بالم بيتش، أنهم بصدد إصدار مذكرات جلب وتفتيش على خلفية الحادث. وفي أول ردود فعل، أكد...

title: Эстонец Яан Руз перешел из Азии в Европу по канату над Босфором
content: Канат длиной 1074 метра был натянут между опор Моста мучеников в Стамбуле на высоте 165 метров. Спортсмен, преодолел путь за 47 минут. По словам самого Руза, Босфор не только объединяет два континента, имеет тысячелетнюю историю и культурную значимость, он также невероятно красив. "Пересекать его по канату - это уникальный опыт, особенно в сочетании с переменчивой погодой. Я вошел в историю и я счастлив", - отметил спортсмен. Издание подчеркивает, что Руз стал первым человеком, который сменил часть света, пройдя по натянутому канату. Учредитель ФГБУ «Редакция «Российской газеты» Главный редактор В.А. title: Ligue 1: Orban Plays 90 Minutes As Lyon Hold Lens
creator: Austin Akhilomen
content: Super Eagles forward, Gift Orban was in action as Lyon played out a goalless draw against Lens in Sunday’s Ligue 1 game. The Nigerian international who was making his second appearance for Lyon, has netted two goals this ongoing season. OL thought they had gained the lead through Gift Orban after Lacazette unselfishly played the ball to his strike partner. However, it turned out to be the wrong decision as the Nigerian forward was in an advanced position with the goal ruled out for offside. Despite this chance, the opening stages of the game were rather even with possession ebbing and flowing Orban had the ball in the back of the net once again but he was again denied by the offside flag. Lens had a late chance to score a winner but Perri was able to get behind the shot and the game ended in a goalless draw.

title: Inter, De Vrij: "C'è tanta delusione per la partita di oggi, ora testa al City"
content: 23 - È Stefan De Vrij il giocatore scelto dall' Inter per commentare la gara pareggiata contro il Monza. Diretta testuale a cura di TMW. 23.35 - Inizia la conferenza stampa di De Vrij. Pareggio che fa arrabbiare, perché non si è vista la vera Inter? "C'è tanta delusione per la partita di oggi, non abbiamo vinto perché non siamo riusciti, soprattutto all'inizio, a fare gol. L'approccio è stato anche abbastanza buono, poi abbiamo fatto più fatica a trovare gli spazi. Loro si sono chiusi e non siamo riusciti ad alzare i ritmi". Ora City e Milan, come ci arrivate? "Guardiamo una partita alla volta, come finora abbiamo pensato soltanto a questa partita di oggi. Da domani guardiamo solo al Manchester City, che conosciamo tutti: andremo lì con fiducia, cercando di fare un'ottima gara". Tante squadre si chiudono con l'Inter, c'è stato anche un problema mentale questa sera? "Sì, penso che dovevamo tenere alto il ritmo e cercare di giocare più velocemente, di trovare l'uomo libero con passaggi sulla corsa forti. Purtroppo ogni tanto abbiamo rallentato e perso il tempo, loro hanno avuto la possibilità di organizzarsi e di mettersi dietro tutti a schermo della linea". Inzaghi ha parlato di leziosità: c'è il rischio che si pensi che basti giocare al minimo? "No, non penso, perché vedo anche come ci alleniamo: sempre a tremila all'ora, sempre al massimo. Le partite le approcciamo allo stesso modo: oggi la prestazione non è stata il massimo e dobbiamo essere chiari, però...

title: Sinopec remporte le prix du meilleur cas de protection environnementale lors de la première conférence sino-européenne sur les meilleures pratiques ESG des entreprises à Francfort
content: FRANCFORT, Allemagne , 15 septembre 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- China Petroleum & Chemical Corporation (Sinopec, HKG : 0386) a reçu le prix du meilleur cas de protection environnementale lors de la première conférence sino-européenne sur les meilleures pratiques ESG des entreprises, qui s'est tenue à Francfort, en Allemagne. L'événement, qui s'est tenu au Congress Center Messe Frankfurt, a récompensé les contributions exceptionnelles de Sinopec au développement durable. Sur le thème Together for the Future , la conférence a présenté les meilleurs cas dans dix catégories, dont la protection de l'environnement, la responsabilité sociale, la gouvernance d'entreprise et l'innovation technologique. L'événement vise à promouvoir le dialogue et la coopération en matière de développement durable entre les entreprises chinoises et européennes et à approfondir la compréhension des avancées de la Chine au sein des communautés industrielles allemandes et européennes. KPMG a été le partenaire de connaissance, fournissant des services professionnels tout au long du processus de sélection. L'événement a été organisé conjointement par plusieurs institutions de premier plan, notamment la Chambre de commerce chinoise pour l'importation et l'exportation de machines et de produits électroniques, le China International Publishing Group, la Chambre de commerce de Francfort, l'Exposition internationale de pièces automobiles de Francfort et l'Association économique...

title: Kaçarken polis memurunu vuran şüpheli tutuklandı!
content: Karacabey İlçe Emniyet Müdürlüğü Asayiş Şubesi ekipleri, dün saat 15.00 sıralarında ‘Uyuşturucu ticareti yapmak’ ve ‘Ruhsatsız silah taşımak’ gibi 10 suçtan kaydı bulunan Ahmet Dipli’yi motosikletiyle giderken durdurdu. Dipli, kimlik kontrolü yapmak isteyen polislerden, motosikleti bırakıp yaya olarak kaçmaya başladı. Kendisini kovalayan ekiplere ruhsatsız tabancasıyla ateş eden Dipli’nin silahından çıkan kurşunlardan biri, polis memuru Murat Can Güleç'in bacağına isabet etti. Şüpheli kısa sürede yakalanıp gözaltına alındı. Yaralanan polis memuru ambulansla Karacabey Devlet Hastanesi’ne kaldırıldı, ilk müdahalesinin ardından da Mustafakemalpaşa Devlet Hastanesi’ne sevk edildi. "KAÇARKEN DE KORKUYLA TABANCAYI ATEŞLEDİM" Polis memurunun sağlık durumunun iyi olduğu ve tedbir amacıyla hastanede tutulduğu öğrenilirken, Ahmet Dipli, emniyetteki işlemlerinin ardından sevk edildiği adliyede çıkarıldığı mahkemece tutuklanarak cezaevine gönderildi. Dipli’nin ifadesinde, “Polisler durdurunca üzerimde silah var, diye korkup kaçmaya başladım. Kaçarken de korkuyla tabancayı ateşledim” dediği öğrenildi.

title: Trampdan sui-qəsdlə bağlı İLK AÇIQLAMA: "Bunu eşitməyinizi istədim"
content: xəbər verir ki, siyasətçinin sözlərindən CNN sitat gətirib. ABŞ-ın keçmiş prezidenti deyib: “Yaxınlığımda atəş səsləri eşidildi, lakin şayiələr nəzarətdən çıxmazdan əvvəl bunu eşitməyinizi istədim: mən təhlükəsizəm və sağlamam”. title: இந்தியாவின் கல்வித் திட்டத்தைப் பின்பற்ற பாகிஸ்தானுக்கு ஆசிய வளா்ச்சி வங்கி அறிவுரை
creator: Din
content: பாகிஸ்தானின் கல்வி முறையை சீா்செய்யவும் அதன் குடிமக்களுக்கு தரமான கல்வியை உறுதியளிக்கவும் இந்தியாவின் ‘உல்லாஸ்’ கல்வித் திட்டத்தை ஏற்றுக்கொள்ளுமாறு அந்நாட்டுக்கு ஆசிய வளா்ச்சி வங்கி அறிவுறுத்தியுள்ளது.

title: ज्येष्ठांंना वरदान
creator: डॉ. दिलीप सातभाई
content: केंद्रीय मंत्रिमंडळाने आयुष्मान भारत प्रधानमंत्री जनआरोग्य योजनेचा विस्तार करत ७० वर्षे आणि त्याहून अधिक वयाच्या ज्येष्ठ नागरिकांना वार्षिक पाच लाख रुपयांपर्यंत आरोग्य विम्याची सुरक्षा प्रदान केली आहे. त्यामुळे आता या ज्येष्ठांना मान्यताप्राप्त रुग्णालयात मोफत वैद्यकीय उपचार मिळण्याचा मार्ग मोकळा झाला आहे. कोविडच्या काळात ज्येष्ठांनी अनुभवलेला त्रास, महागाईमुळे वैद्यकीय उपचारांचा वाढलेला खर्च या पार्श्वभूमीवर हा निर्णय महत्त्वाचा आहे.

title: Čak 60.000 krava i teladi nestalo bez traga! Jedna navodno viđena u Sahari, druga poslužila kao hrana u Zoo vrtu?
content: Nedostaci u praćenju i sumnjive trgovinske prakse koje uključuju hiljade krava ponovo su otkrivene u Austriji. Uprkos rastućoj kritici, ministar poljoprivrede Norbert Totschnig ćuti i ne pruža hitne odgovore, upozoravaju aktivisti za prava životinja. Početkom godine, istraživačka platforma "The Marker" otkrila je da se na hiljade steonih krava izvoze iz Austrije u Alžir , bez ikakvih dokaza o njihovoj lokaciji. Ministarstvo zdravlja takođe potvrdilo da ne postoji nikakva informacija o tome šta se dešava s životinjama nakon izvoza . Ne postoje naknadne provere da li se životinje zaista koriste za povećanje populacije mlečnih krava , kao što se tvrdilo. - Ministarstvo nema podatke o tome koliko se ovih životinja trenutno drži i gde - navodi se u zvaničnom odgovoru. 43 krave na interaktivnoj mapi Kako bi otkrila gde se nalazi približno 60.000 nestalih krava i njihovih teladi, platforma je pokrenula projekat "Cowfinding". Do sada, tim tvrdi da je dokumentovao 43 krave , koje su prikazane na interaktivnoj mapi na sajtu. Razgovori sa farmerima, trgovcima i radnicima u klanicama na licu mesta u Alžiru otkrivaju sistem koji se jedva ili uopšte ne nadgleda. Istraživački tim izveštava da se krave preprodaju na lokalnim stočnim pijacama nakon njihovog dolaska u Alžir, često bez dokumentovanja njihovog mesta boravka. Takođe je otkrivena jedna austrijska krava sa teletom na stočnoj pijaci u pustinji Sahari. Društvene mreže U isto vreme, društvene mreže,...

title: Paul Stanley: KISS avatar show a 'must-see experience'
creator: Staff Writers
content: Paul Stanley has promised the upcoming KISS avatar show will be "beyond anything that anyone else has contemplated". The 72-year-old musician explained he is confident the show will wow fans after KISS' catalogue, brand name and IP were acquired by Pophouse Entertainment, the company behind ABBA's 'Voyage' show. Speaking on Billboard's podcast Behind The Setlist, he said: "People just are thrilled with ('Voyage'). I took my wife last month, and I had seen it last year. So Pophouse understood what we wanted to do and that what we wanna create is something that's state of the art today." He added that the technology has improved since Voyage launched and he is confident that the addition of George Lucas' Industrial Light & Magic, will provide a thrilling experience for fans. He said: ""What I can tell you is that the technology that's being used, which is a furthering of the technology used on the ABBA show, has to be installed and basically a building has to be built around it. "So this isn't something where you're in Kansas City today, and tomorrow you fly with your projector to do it. It demands an arena, so to speak that's really solely used for a show like this." However, Stanley is not impressed by people referring it to as an "avatar" show. He said: "That term seems to get thrown around a lot, but the idea of a simulated concert is not what we wanna do. Frankly, I would find that that boring. What we're creating is an immersive experience that KISS fans will love and...
